T02TD2627E:219b-1: sarba du rga ti pa ri sho dha ne te dzo r'a dza kalpa a'a lo k'a lam ka ra n'a ma /
T02TD2627E:219b-3: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po brtag pa snang ba'i rgyan zhes bya ba /
T02TD2627E:219b-4: gtso chen kun rig sh'akya thub //
T02TD2627E:219b-5: rdo rje 'dzin pa zhi dang khro //
T02TD2627E:219b-6: tshe dpag med dang bde ba che //
T02TD2627E:219b-8: ngan song rnam par sbyong byed pa'i //
T02TD2627E:220a-2: bdag nyid dran pa skyed pa'i phyir //
T02TD2627E:220a-3: ci nus pas ni rnam par dbye //
T02TD2627E:220a-4: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di'i brjod par bya ba dang 'brel pa ni gang zhig yin /
T02TD2627E:220a-5: dgos pa dang dgos pa'i dgos pa ni ci zhig yod ce na /
T02TD2627E:220a-7: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa zhes bya ba ni rgyud yin la /
T02TD2627E:220a-8: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba nas tshangs pa chen po padma'i gdan la bzhugs te zhes bya ba'i bar gyis sh'akya thub pa nyid dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin ston pa'i gleng gzhi'i mdo ni /
T02TD2627E:220a-9: gdul bya mngon par 'dod pa bskyed pa'i phyir gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:220a-10: gdul bya mngon par 'dod pa skyes pa rnams la sh'akya thub pa de mngon sum du byed pa'i thabs ni ngan song gi rgyud thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2627E:220a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis thabs bstan to //
T02TD2627E:220a-12: yang 'di kun rig dang gtsug tor dgu dang /
T02TD2627E:220a-13: tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor ni bar ma la srid pa rjes su 'dzin par byed pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:220a-16: khro bo rdo rje me ni /
T02TD2627E:220a-17: mchog la srid pa rjes su 'dzin par byed pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:220a-18: 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni mchog dang bar ma ma yin pa la srid pa rjes su 'dzin par byed pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:220a-20: srid dang srid min rnam sbyong ba //
T02TD2627E:220a-21: zhi zhing dul la dga' ba che //
T02TD2627E:220a-23: yang 'dir ni kun rig dang bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni /
T02TD2627E:220a-24: sku ston zhing phyag rgya chen po yin la /
T02TD2627E:220a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bstan te /
T02TD2627E:220a-26: 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:220a-27: gtsug tor dang 'chi bdag 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor ni gsung ston zhing chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur la /
T02TD2627E:220a-28: padma'i rigs su bstan te gti mug gis gti mug spang ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:220b-0: tshe @220b dpag med dang khro bo nyi ma dang me dang 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni thugs ston zhing dam tshig gi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur la rdo rje'i rigs yin te /
T02TD2627E:220b-1: khro bas khro ba spang ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:220b-3: lag pa g-yon pa'i thal mo bkan te pang du bzhag la de'i steng du g-yas pa bzhag ste mthe bong gnyis sprad la zhi ba'i lta bas blta ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ste dam tshig yin par bshad do //
T02TD2627E:220b-4: de nyid las bzlog ste stag 'og bsnol la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig lu gu rgyud kyi tshul du bsnol la snying gar gzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:220b-5: thal mo rdzogs par sbyar ba las mthe bong mthe'u chung gnyis bsnyams pa la lhag ma brkyang ba 'di ni padmo'i rigs kyi padmo'i phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2627E:220b-7: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gtso //
T02TD2627E:220b-9: ma rig 'joms pa'i tshangs pa ste //
T02TD2627E:220b-10: 'dod chags zhe sdang dri mthar mdzad //
T02TD2627E:220b-12: yang kun rig dang bde ba chen po ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i tshul /
T02TD2627E:220b-13: sh'akya thub pa gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2627E:220b-14: 'chi bdag 'joms pa sprul pa'i sku'i tshul /
T02TD2627E:220b-15: dkyil 'khor lhag ma rnams ni chos kyi sku'i tshul ston pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:220b-16: 'di nyid las ji skad du bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus rdo rje sems dpa'i skur zhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi ste zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:220b-17: yang 'di'i dbang dang dam tshig dngos grub kyi dkyil 'khor kun rig dang /
T02TD2627E:220b-25: lha chen rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2627E:220b-28: khro bo rdo rje nyi ma me'i dkyil 'khor te bcu gnyis so //
T02TD2627E:220b-29: bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor kun rig gi ras la bri ba dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-2: tshe dpag med kyi ras la bri ba dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-3: klu chen brgyad kyi bsam pa dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-4: 'jigs byed chen po'i bsam pa dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-5: lha chen po'i bsam pa dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-7: bde ba chen po'i bsam pa dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-8: rdo rje nyi ma me'i bsam pa ste dgu'o /
T02TD2627E:221a-9: de kho na ste dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid do //
T02TD2627E:221a-10: dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i gsang sngags dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-11: byin gyis brlab pa'i gsang sngags dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-13: dbang dang dam tshig sbyin pa'i sngags dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-17: sngags kyi de kho na nyid de ci rigs su sbyar ro //
T02TD2627E:221a-18: 'di'i kun rig gi skabs na lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-19: gtsug tor dang bde ba chen po'i skabs nas bshad pa ste phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid do //
T02TD2627E:221a-22: lha chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-25: khro bo rdo rje nyi ma dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-26: me'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs nas bsgom pa'i sgo nas bsgrub pa drug ste ting nge 'dzin gyi de kho na nyid do //
T02TD2627E:221a-27: yang kun rig gi ras ris kyi bzlas pa dang ;
T02TD2627E:221a-28: ro 'am gzugs brnyan la bzlas pa dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-29: gtsug tor dgu'i ras ris dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-30: ro'am gzugs brnyan la bzlas pa dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-31: tshe dpag med kyi ras ris kyi bzlas pa dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-32: klu chen brgyad kyi bzlas pa dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-33: lha chen dang 'jigs byed chen po'i bzlas pa dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-35: khro bo'i sbyin sreg gi skabs kyi bzlas pa dang bcu ni bzlas brjod kyi de kho na nyid do //
T02TD2627E:221a-36: yang kun rig gi skabs nas zhi ba'i don du sbyin sreg dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-37: ro bsreg pa'i don du zhi ba'i sbyin sreg dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-38: gtsug tor dgu'i don du zhi ba'i sbyin sreg dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-42: mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-43: bde ba chen po'i skabs nas zhi ba dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-47: rdo rje nyi ma me'i zhi ba dang /
T02TD2627E:221a-50: mngon spyod dang bcu bzhi ste /
T02TD2627E:221b-0: sbyin @221b sreg gi de kho na nyid do //
T02TD2627E:221b-1: rdo rje nyi ma me ma gtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bcu gcig pa la sogs pa nas spyan drang ba bstan pa ni spyan drang ba'i de kho na nyid do //
T02TD2627E:221b-2: dkyil 'khor de dag dang sbyin sreg dang ras ris la sogs pa rnams las mchod pa bshad pa rnams dang /
T02TD2627E:221b-3: rdo rje nyi ma me'i sbyin sreg gi skabs nas lha rnams mchod cing gshegs su gsol ba'i de kho na nyid bstan to //
T02TD2627E:221b-4: kun rig gi ras bris kyi skabs nas 'jig rten gsum rgyal du bskyed de bdag gi bdag gi de nyid dran pas ni bdag bsrung ba ni srung ba'i de kho na nyid bstan to //
T02TD2627E:221b-5: yang dngos su ting nge 'dzin thabs yin pas de brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:221b-6: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud kyis bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:221b-7: ngan song thams cad kyi rgyud yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba nas brtsams te sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhis bshad pa ngas bshad kyis nyon cig ces bya ba'i bar gyis ngan 'gro sbyong zhing nor bu dri ma med pa lung bstan pa ste dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2627E:221b-8: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2627E:221b-9: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phan pa dang bde ba thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis tshangs pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor du dgod pa'i phyir dang lha rnams bskyed pa'i phyir gsang sngags bshad pa ste dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin ston to //
T02TD2627E:221b-10: de nas bsdu zhing byin gyis brlab pa nas brtsams te las kyi rgyal po mchog 'phags pa gsang zhing sra ba'i mchog mthon po las bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:221b-11: dbang dang dam tshig thob pas thabs 'di nyid la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2627E:221b-12: brtser ldan dngos grub myur du 'grub //
T02TD2627E:221b-13: ces bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2627E:221b-14: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ston to //
T02TD2627E:221b-15: de nyid du dbang dang dam tshig thob pa rnams la /
T02TD2627E:221b-16: ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:222a-0: @222a * // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:222a-1: gnod sbyin rgyu skar gdong la sogs //
T02TD2627E:222a-2: tshig tsam gyis ni dran bzhin du //
T02TD2627E:222a-3: zhi ba la sogs las kun byed //
T02TD2627E:222a-4: ces bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis dngos grub ston to ;
T02TD2627E:222a-6: dbang dang dam tshig thob pa rnams la /
T02TD2627E:222a-7: sdig pa chen po byas pas sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i nang du gyur pa rnams thabs sla bas grol bar bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:222a-8: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis zhes bya ba nas ;
T02TD2627E:222a-9: bde gshegs rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs //
T02TD2627E:222a-10: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis shi ba'i dbang du gyur pa'i cho ga bstan to //
T02TD2627E:222a-11: de nas brgya byin la sogs lhas //
T02TD2627E:222a-12: padma lta bu'i mig phye nas //
T02TD2627E:222a-13: zhes pa nas brtsams te bag yod par gyis la sgrubs shig ces bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis nor bu dri ma med pa dga' ldan du skyes pa dang /
T02TD2627E:222a-15: rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bsdus pa'i don bstan to //
T02TD2627E:222a-16: rgyud phyi ma'i bsdus pa'i don bstan par bya ste de las kyang dang por gtsug tor dgu'i bsdus pa'i don bstan pa ste /
T02TD2627E:222a-17: 'dir dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las bshad pa las phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:222a-18: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba nas brtsams te h'um phat ces pa'i bar gyi gzhung gis dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bstan to //
T02TD2627E:222a-19: las rgyal mchog ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:222a-20: thabs de la 'di nyid du dbang dang dam tshig thob pas 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:222a-21: de nas dkyil 'khor bshad de zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2627E:222a-22: phyag na rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba las thams cad byed pa'i bar gyi gzhung gis slob dpon gyi las dang /
T02TD2627E:222a-23: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga bstan to //
T02TD2627E:222b-0: 'di las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa'i thabs kyis 'grub po zhes bya bar brtag pa gzhan gyi cho @222b gas kyang thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya bas ston to //
T02TD2627E:222b-1: 'di nyid du dbang dang dam tshig thob pa'i slob dpon gyis shi ba'i ro la sogs pa la bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg dang dbang rnams kyis grol bar byed do zhes pa'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir lha dang klu dang zhes bya ba nas brtsams te yongs su grol bar byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis bstan to //
T02TD2627E:222b-2: rtsa ba'i rgyud dang rgyud phyi ma dang phyi ma'i yang phyi ma las gsungs pa'i lha rnams bsgrub pa'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:222b-3: rgyas gdab po zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:222b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes seng ge'i lta stangs kyis zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:222b-5: de las bskyed nas bsnyengs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:222b-6: zhes pa'i bar gyi gzhung gis bstan to //
T02TD2627E:222b-7: yang 'di nyid du dbang dang dam tshig thob pas ras ris mchod de bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir bsnyen pa byas nas las thams cad bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis sgrub par bstan to //
T02TD2627E:222b-8: de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:222b-9: gzhan yin par mi lta'i 'khor 'di nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa las kyi rnam par smin pa ci las gyur pa bstan to //
T02TD2627E:222b-10: gtsug tor dgu'i bsdus pa'i don to //
T02TD2627E:222b-11: da ni tshe tshad med pa'i bsdus pa'i don bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:222b-12: sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin ni gtsug tor du bshad pa nyid do //
T02TD2627E:222b-13: de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa rnams yid rab tu mgu zhing rangs nas zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:222b-14: gsang ba'i bdag pos bshad du gsol //
T02TD2627E:222b-15: zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis bstod cing gsol ba gdab par ston to //
T02TD2627E:222b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes zhes bya ba nas rmad kyi ya mtshan du ma 'jigs rten du snang bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzung gis dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i gsang sngags bstan te dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bstan to //
T02TD2627E:222b-17: de nas bsrung ba dang byin gyis brlab pa ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:223a-0: tshe tshad med pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du dbang dang dam tshig la sogs pa thob pas @223a * //
T02TD2627E:223a-1: thabs de la 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2627E:223a-3: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD2627E:223a-4: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te aa bhi shinytsa h'um zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:223a-5: de nyid du dbang dang dam tshig la sogs pa thob pa la dngos grub sbyin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:223a-6: de ltar dbang bskur nas tshe bsring ba'i rig pa sbyin no zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2627E:223a-7: brtag mi dgos par the tshom med //
T02TD2627E:223a-8: ces bya ba'i gzhung gis tshe tshad med pa'i dngos grub bstan to //
T02TD2627E:223a-9: tshe tshad med pa'i bsdus pa'i don to //
T02TD2627E:223a-10: da ni 'jig rten pa'i lha la srid pa rjes su 'dzin par byed pa'i don du 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor drug bstan to //
T02TD2627E:223a-11: de la dang po rgyal po chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i don brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:223a-12: 'di'i sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin ni gtsug tor du bshad pa las rgyal po chen po bzhi dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:223a-13: rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2627E:223a-14: aom ksha zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2627E:223a-15: las kyi rgyal po mchog ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:223a-16: 'di nyid du dbang dang dam tshig thob pas thabs de la 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:223a-17: de nas de dag dkyil 'khor 'di yin te //
T02TD2627E:223a-19: phyag na rdo rje la yang 'khus par 'gyur //
T02TD2627E:223a-20: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa ston te rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bsdus pa'i don to //
T02TD2627E:223a-21: de nas phyogs skyong bcu rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi don bsdus pa'i don bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:223a-22: de nas zhes bya ba dang po'i sbyor pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don te /
T02TD2627E:223a-23: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
T02TD2627E:223a-24: gtsug tor du gsungs pa las phyogs skyong ba bcu dang bcas pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:223b-0: phyogs skyong ba bcu @223b rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2627E:223b-1: aom pra zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bstan to //
T02TD2627E:223b-2: las kyi rgyal po mchog ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:223b-3: 'di nyid du dbang dang dam tshig thob pas thabs de la 'jug par bya'o zhes pa'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:223b-4: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de zhes bya ba nas bdag nyid kyis kyang yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa bstan to //
T02TD2627E:223b-5: phyogs skyong ba bcu'i bsdus pa'i don to //
T02TD2627E:223b-6: gza' chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bsdus pa'i don brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:223b-7: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2627E:223b-8: de nas zhes bya ba ni dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la ste /
T02TD2627E:223b-9: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni gtsub tor du bshad pa las gza' chen po brgyad rgyu skar dang bcas pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:223b-10: gza' chen po brgyad ces pa nas /
T02TD2627E:223b-11: aom ha zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin ston to //
T02TD2627E:223b-12: las kyi rgyal po mchog ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:223b-13: thabs de la dam tshig dang dbang thob pas 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:223b-14: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de zhes bya ba nas gdon mi za bar 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gyis slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang slob ma dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:223b-15: gza' chen po brgyad kyi bsdus pa'i don no //
T02TD2627E:223b-16: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas klu chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor bstan te de nas zhes bya ba dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2627E:223b-17: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni gtsug tor du bshad pa las klu chen po brgyad dang bcas pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:223b-18: de nas klu chen po nas zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:223b-19: aom phu: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin ston to //
T02TD2627E:223b-20: bsdu zhing byin gyis brlab pa ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:224a-0: @224a * // 'di nyid du dam tshig dang dbang thob pas thabs de la 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de /
T02TD2627E:224a-1: padma chen po 'dab ma brgyad pa zhes bya ba nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' rab tu bsgrub par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:224a-2: klu'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du dbang dang dam tshig thob pas bsam pa'i dkyil 'khor la brten te dgu bsal ba'i dngos grub bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:224a-3: de nas bsgrub pa bshad de zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:224a-4: sprul mgo'i phyag rgyas smos ci dgos //
T02TD2627E:224a-5: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis dngos grub ston to //
T02TD2627E:224a-6: klu chen brgyad kyi bsdus pa'i don to //
T02TD2627E:224a-7: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor ston to //
T02TD2627E:224a-8: de nas zhes bya ba ni dang po'i sbyor ba'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2627E:224a-9: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni gtsug tor du bshad pa las 'jigs byed chen po ma mo brgyad dang bcas pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:224a-10: de nas lha chen po rnams kyi bdag po 'jigs byed chen po byed pa zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:224a-11: aom bha sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin ston to //
T02TD2627E:224a-12: las kyi rgyal po mchog ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:224a-13: 'di nyid du dbang dang dam tshig thob pas thabs de la 'jug par bya'o zhes bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:224a-14: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:224a-15: de ltar brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2627E:224a-16: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis slob dpon gyis las kyi cho ga dang slob ma dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:224a-17: de nyid du dbang dang dam tshig thob pa la sogs pa la las sbyin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:224a-18: de nas las rnams sbyin par bya ste zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2627E:224a-19: byin nas dgod cing grol bar byed //
T02TD2627E:224a-20: skrag nas de ma thag tu gsod //
T02TD2627E:224a-21: ces bya ba'i bar gyis dngos grub bstan te 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi bsdus pa'i don to //
T02TD2627E:224b-0: de nas @224b zhes bya ba la sogs pas lha chen po'i dkyil 'khor ston te /
T02TD2627E:224b-1: de nas zhes bya ba dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2627E:224b-2: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni gtsug tor du bshad pa las tshangs pa la sogs te lha chen po dang bcas pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:224b-3: de nas tshangs pa zhes bya ba nas aom ga zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog bstan to //
T02TD2627E:224b-4: las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:224b-5: de nas dkyil 'khor bshad de zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:224b-6: bum pa'i chus ni dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2627E:224b-7: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis thabs de la 'jug pa'i phyir slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa la sogs pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:224b-8: de nyid du dam tshig thob pa rnams la /
T02TD2627E:224b-9: de nas lha rnams gang dga' ba'i //
T02TD2627E:224b-10: dngos grub rab tu sbyin pa rnams //
T02TD2627E:224b-11: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2627E:224b-12: bde 'dod tshad med gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2627E:224b-13: ces bya ba'i bar gyis dngos grub kyi cho ga ston to //
T02TD2627E:224b-14: de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:224b-15: dbang phyug chen po nyid kyang gsal bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten pa las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs pa'i phan yon ston te /
T02TD2627E:224b-16: lha chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi bsdu pa'i don to //
T02TD2627E:224b-17: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chi bdag 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor ston te /
T02TD2627E:224b-18: de nas zhes bya ba dang po'i sbyor ba'i rjes thogs la ste /
T02TD2627E:224b-19: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gtsug tor du bshad pa nyid yin no //
T02TD2627E:224b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2627E:224b-21: aom sarba sv'a h'a gsang ba'i snying po'i zhes pa'i bar gyi gzhung gis bshad par gsol ba gdab pa dang dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bstan to //
T02TD2627E:224b-22: las rgyal mchog snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2627E:224b-23: thabs de nyid la dbang dang dam tshig la sogs pa thob pas 'jug par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:224b-24: de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:225a-2: phan par bya phyir bla mar dbul //
T02TD2627E:225a-3: zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa la sogs pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:225a-4: de nas byang chub bar du ni /
T02TD2627E:225a-6: dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos //
T02TD2627E:225a-7: zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis rtog pa thams cad kyi dam tshig sems dpar bskyed par bya ba dang byin gyis brlab pa dang dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2627E:225a-9: mchod pa bsgrub pa'i tshogs bstan to //
T02TD2627E:225a-10: de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas brtsams te grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i phan yon ston to //
T02TD2627E:225a-11: de nas lha chen de dag gis //
T02TD2627E:225a-12: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te sdig pa chung du byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis tshe 'di dang ngan 'gror skyes zin pa rnams kyi ming la sogs pa bkug la zhag bdun du dbang bskur ba dang ming nas smos te bzlas pa'i cho ga bya ba bstan to //
T02TD2627E:225a-13: lha yi bu rnam shi ba yin //
T02TD2627E:225a-16: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ngan 'gror skyes zhin pa rnams sbyin sreg bzhis sbyor ba ston te /
T02TD2627E:225a-17: de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams yid mgu nas legs par sgrubs shig ces bya ba'i gzhung gis rtog pa'i rgyal po'i phan yon dang rgyud gtad pa bstan to //
T02TD2627E:225a-18: 'chi bdag 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bsdus pa'i don to //
T02TD2627E:225a-19: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor ston te /
T02TD2627E:225a-20: de nas zhes bya ba sbyor ba dang po'i rjes thogs la ste 'dir phyag na rdo rje nyid sprul pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:225a-21: de nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te badzra h'um aa zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ston to //
T02TD2627E:225a-22: las rgyal po mchog ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:225a-23: bde ba chen po dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du dbang thob pas 'jug par bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:225a-24: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:225b-0: siddha @225b ye h'um zhes bya ba'i bar gyis slob dpon las kyi cho ga dang slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa bstan te /
T02TD2627E:225b-1: de nas las rnams thams cad byed du gzhug cing zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:225b-2: rdo rje las dang mnyam par 'gyur //
T02TD2627E:225b-3: zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis de nyid du dbang dang dam tshig thob pa la dngos grub sbyin pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:225b-4: de nas las rnams bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:225b-5: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las //
T02TD2627E:225b-6: de ltar dbang dang mngon spyod rnams //
T02TD2627E:225b-7: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2627E:225b-8: 'dod pa kun kyang dbang du byed //
T02TD2627E:225b-9: ces bya ba'i bar gyis las ston to //
T02TD2627E:225b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das phya na rdo rje zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:225b-12: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzung gis rtog pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i dus su rgyas gdab pa'i phyag rgya bstan to //
T02TD2627E:225b-13: gzhan yang rtog pa thams cad kyi lha bskyed pa dang zhi pa la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg gi dus su mi mthun pa'i phyogs gzhom pa ni brdung ba'i sngags ni sa zhes bya ba nas kha tham zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis ston te bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i don to //
T02TD2627E:225b-14: gtsug tor nas brtsams te bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyis rgyud phyi ma'i don bstan nas /
T02TD2627E:225b-15: khro bo'i 'khor lo bshad pa rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma bstan te ji skad du /
T02TD2627E:225b-16: lta ngan chags dang bral ba la //
T02TD2627E:225b-17: gsang ba 'di ni mi rigs so //
T02TD2627E:225b-18: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2627E:225b-19: de nas yang dag bshad par bya //
T02TD2627E:225b-20: zhes bya ba gsungs pas 'dir lta ba ngan pa chags pa dang bral ba ni khro bo'i bdag nyid can yin pas de gdul pa'i don du gtso bor khro bo'i bdag nyid can 'di bstan to //
T02TD2627E:225b-21: de nas lha rnams kun mgu nas //
T02TD2627E:225b-23: rdo rje sems dpa'i skur zhugs nas //
T02TD2627E:225b-24: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ston to //
T02TD2627E:225b-25: 'dir de ni gtsug tor du bshad pa las khro bo'i skur bsgyur ba dang bcas pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:225b-26: rdo rje gnyis su med par zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:225b-27: aom badzra k'a la ya tsakra h'um phat ces bya ba'i gzhung gis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog ston to //
T02TD2627E:226a-0: sgo dbye ba sngon du 'gro bas bsdu zhing byin gyis @226a * //
T02TD2627E:226a-2: las kyi rgyal po mchog ni gsang zhing sra ba mthon po las bshad pa bzhin shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:226a-3: 'di nyid du dbang dang dam tshig thob pas thabs de la 'jug par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:226a-4: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor mi bzad pa zhes bya ba nas de bzhin dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis slob dpon las kyi cho ga dang slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i cho ga ston to //
T02TD2627E:226a-5: 'di nyid du dbang dang dam tshig thob pa rnams la dngos grub bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:226a-6: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bsgrub pa bshad de zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:226a-7: bzlas pa'i tshul bzhin bsam par bya //
T02TD2627E:226a-8: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis dngos grub ston to //
T02TD2627E:226a-9: de nas 'brub khung rnams gcig ni //
T02TD2627E:226a-11: rdo rje 'dod pa rtag tu bzlas //
T02TD2627E:226a-12: dbang gi las so zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis sbyin sreg gi cho ga ston to //
T02TD2627E:226a-13: rtog pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la yang mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de bstod nas phyag rgya dgrol te gshegs su gsol bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:226a-14: de nas brgya byin la sogs lha //
T02TD2627E:226a-15: zhes bya ba nas rjes su yi rang ngo zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis bstan to //
T02TD2627E:226a-16: rdo rje nyi ma me'i bsdus pa'i don to //
T02TD2627E:226a-17: de ltar bsdus pa'i don bshad nas //
T02TD2627E:226a-18: sh'akya thub pa nyid dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2627E:226a-19: sbyin sreg dang ras ris la sogs pa snang ba rnams ni brjod par bya ba yin la /
T02TD2627E:226a-20: de ston pa'i gzhung gi cho ga ni rgyud yin te rgyud dang brjod par bya ba gnyis thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i mtshan nyid du 'brel pa'o //
T02TD2627E:226a-21: rgyud la brten nas sh'akya thub pa la mngon par 'dod pa bskyed pa ni dgos pa'o //
T02TD2627E:226a-22: mngon par 'dod pa bskyed pa'i mngon sum du byas pa ni dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'o //
T02TD2627E:226a-23: yang 'di'i mtshan nyid dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i gleng gzhi dang rtsa ba'i rgyud du gtogs pa'i kun rig gi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2627E:226b-0: rgyud phyi mar gtogs pa gtsug tor dgu nas brtsams te bde @226b ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi bar dang /
T02TD2627E:226b-1: rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma khro bo'i dkyil 'khor te bsdus pa'i don rdzogs so /
T02TD2627E:226b-3: // / de la 'di ni ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2627E:226b-4: de la ngan song thams cad ces bya ba ni sems can rnams dmyal ba dang yi dags dang byol song ngo //
T02TD2627E:226b-5: de yongs su sbyong ba ni sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug yongs su sbyong ba'o //
T02TD2627E:226b-6: de yang 'di skad du 'di nyid las /
T02TD2627E:226b-7: ma rig 'joms pa'i tshangs pa ste //
T02TD2627E:226b-8: 'dod chags zhe sdang dri mthar mdzad ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:226b-9: yang ngan song thams cad ni sems can thams cad do //
T02TD2627E:226b-10: de yongs su sbyong ba ni sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i las las grol ba'o //
T02TD2627E:226b-11: ji skad du 'di nyid las kun du snang bar byas pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las rnam par grol te /
T02TD2627E:226b-12: bde ba so sor thob nas zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:226b-13: de'i gzi brjid ni sems can gyi khams kun du dkyil 'khor dang sbyin sreg dang ras ris la sogs pa snang bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2627E:226b-14: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD2627E:226b-15: ae ma'o sems can khams kun du //
T02TD2627E:226b-16: snang byed gzi brjid dpe med bdag / ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:226b-17: rgyal po ni kun las khyad par du gyur pas mdzes shing 'bar bar gyur pas rgyal po ste rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o //
T02TD2627E:226b-18: de yang ji skad du rdo rje rtse mo las /
T02TD2627E:226b-19: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2627E:226b-20: kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gis //
T02TD2627E:226b-22: de nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni brtag pa ste rdo rje rtse mo las /
T02TD2627E:226b-23: gzhan yang gsang bar brtags pas na //
T02TD2627E:226b-24: de phyir brtag pa zhes bshad do //
T02TD2627E:226b-26: gzhan yang sems can rnams dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa rnams ni ngan song thams cad do //
T02TD2627E:226b-27: yongs su sbyong ba ni byang chub kyi spyod pa la bkod pa dang rnam par rtog pa ma lus par spangs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:226b-29: gang phyir ngan song thams cad sbyangs //
T02TD2627E:227a-0: byang chub spyod pa nyid la @227a * //
T02TD2627E:227a-3: sems nyid chos pas sku mi mnga' //
T02TD2627E:227a-4: rnam par rtog pa ma lus spangs //
T02TD2627E:227a-6: de rnams kyis sems can kun la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ni gzi brjid do //
T02TD2627E:227a-8: sems can kun la mi 'jigs pa //
T02TD2627E:227a-9: rdo rje gzi brjid du zhes bshad //
T02TD2627E:227a-11: de'i rgyal po ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2627E:227a-12: brtag pa ni mi rtog pa'i don la brtag pa ste ji skad du rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD2627E:227a-13: de la mi rtog rtog pa'i bdag / rtog pa brtags pa las byung ba //
T02TD2627E:227a-16: de lta bu'i rgyud sdud par byed pa sa bcu pa'i dbang phyug lcang lo can gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa rdo rje 'chang bas blo la bzhag nas 'di skad ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T02TD2627E:227a-17: de la 'di skad ces bya ba ni yang dag par bsdus pa'i bshad ma thag pa'i gzhung dang don gyi ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD2627E:227a-18: bdag gis zhes pas ni bdag nyid yin par ston te bdag nyid kyis thos kyi brgyud de 'ongs pa ma yin no //
T02TD2627E:227a-19: 'dis ni bdag nyid kyis thos pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:227a-20: thos pa zhes bya ba ni thos pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab kyis thos kyi rtogs pas ni ma yin no //
T02TD2627E:227a-21: 'dis ni ma 'ongs pa dang ma rtogs pa nyid du ston to //
T02TD2627E:227a-22: gang gi tshe thos she na dus gcig na zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2627E:227a-23: dus gcig gi dus na thos kyi gzhan du gzhan thos so zhes bya ba yin te 'dis ni thos pa mang bar ston to //
T02TD2627E:227a-24: yang na dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma nyid la kun thos te dus gsum gyi bskal pa rnams so sor snang bas thams cad thos pa ste 'dis ni tshad med pa'i skyes bu yin par ston to //
T02TD2627E:227a-25: yang na dus gcig na bya bas ni rgyud 'di dus gcig na 'byung bas 'byung dka' bar bstan to//
T02TD2627E:227a-26: khyod kyis gang las thos zhes rtog pa dag gi phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba smos te nyon mongs pa dang /
T02TD2627E:227a-29: 'chi bdag gi bdud kyi mtshan nyid can du gnas pa'i bdud rnams bcom pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
T02TD2627E:227b-0: yang na dbang phyug la sogs @227b pa'i yon tan drug dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das so //
T02TD2627E:227b-1: de ltar ston pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan nas gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:227b-2: lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2627E:227b-3: lha'i tshogs thams cad ces bya ba ni 'dir sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams so //
T02TD2627E:227b-4: de rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshal ni ri rab kyi rtse nor bu dri ma med pa'i steng tshal bzhi las dga' ba'i tshal lo //
T02TD2627E:227b-5: mchog tu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o //
T02TD2627E:227b-6: de nyid bshad pa nor bu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste nor bu ni rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:227b-7: gser gyi shing yal ga dang lcug mar bcas pa zhes pa ni shing nyid gser du snang ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2627E:227b-8: shing gel pa dang sman dang me tog ka ma la dang /
T02TD2627E:227b-14: mand'a ra ba chen po la sogs pa sna tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2627E:227b-15: dpag bsam gyi shing rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa zhes pa ni de rnams kyis brgyan pa ste sogs pa'i sgras ni manydzu sha ka la sogs pa bsdus pa'o //
T02TD2627E:227b-16: rgyan sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang lhab lhub dang lnga ldi la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2627E:227b-21: me tog dang lnga ldi yid du 'ong ba bstan to //
T02TD2627E:227b-22: bya mang po skad 'byin pa zhes bya ba ni khu byug dang /
T02TD2627E:227b-24: mthing ril la sogs pa skad yid du 'ong ba ston te 'dis ni byol song yid du 'ong ba ston to //
T02TD2627E:227b-29: rnga bo che la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi sgrar grags pa ste sogs pa'i sgras ni dung dang cha lang la sogs pa bsdu'o //
T02TD2627E:227b-30: 'dis ni rol mo'i cha byad yid du 'ong ba ston to //
T02TD2627E:227b-32: tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha dang lha'i bu mo rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba ni de rnams gnas der yid mthun pa'i sgo nas rtse ba'o //
T02TD2627E:227b-33: sogs pa'i sgras ni tshogs kyi bdag po la sogs pa bsdu'o //
T02TD2627E:227b-34: 'dis ni lha rnams kyi yul yid du 'ong ba ston to //
T02TD2627E:228a-0: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems @228a * //
T02TD2627E:228a-1: dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ni zhes bya ba ni rjes las skyes pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:228a-2: lha'i bzhugs gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan nas brgya byin dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:228a-3: brgya byin ni mgo bo brgya stong sbyin pa nye bar bsags zhes pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2627E:228a-4: tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi mes por grags pa ste /
T02TD2627E:228a-5: 'jig rten mes po tshangs pa yis //
T02TD2627E:228a-6: 'jig rten sgron ma bstod byas te //
T02TD2627E:228a-8: sogs pa ni 'jigs byed chen po la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:228a-10: lha'i bu mo'i 'khor zhes bya ba ni lha ste 'dod khams dang gzugs khams kyi'o //
T02TD2627E:228a-11: rig 'dzin ni rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:228a-12: lha'i bu mo ni sha rtsi la sogs pa ste de rnams kyi 'khor grangs bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang gnod sbyin dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:228a-13: dge sdig bsres ma las gyur pa'o //
T02TD2627E:228a-14: lha ma yin zhes bya ba ni lha dang yid mi mthun pa'o //
T02TD2627E:228a-15: dri za zhes bya ba ni zur phud lnga pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:228a-16: mi'am ci zhes bya ba ni sdong po la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:228a-17: lto 'phye chen po ni khyus 'gro ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:228a-18: klu ni dga' bo dang 'jog po la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:228a-19: sogs pa ni 'byung po dang yi dags dang ma mo la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2627E:228a-20: de lta bu'i 'jig rten pa'i 'khor du ma dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dang sems can gyi tshogs chen po la sems dpa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o //
T02TD2627E:228a-21: bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad la zhes bya ba ni grangs so //
T02TD2627E:228a-22: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni nye bar dgod pa'o //
T02TD2627E:228a-23: blo gros tshad med pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen no ;
T02TD2627E:228a-24: / blo gros mi g-yo ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD2627E:228a-25: blo gros yangs pa ni rdo rje chos so //
T02TD2627E:228a-26: kun du blo gros ni rdo rje las so //
T02TD2627E:228a-27: blo gros mtha' yas ni rdo rje 'khor lo'o //
T02TD2627E:228a-28: blo gros ka ma la ni rdo rje rnon po'o //
T02TD2627E:228a-29: blo gros chen po ni rdo rje khu tshur ro //
T02TD2627E:228b-0: blo gros lha rdzas ni nam mkha'i @228b mdzad do //
T02TD2627E:228b-1: blo gros sna tshogs ni gnod sbyin no //
T02TD2627E:228b-2: sogs pa smos pas ni sems dpa' gzhan rdo rje srung ba la sogs pa bsdus pa'o //
T02TD2627E:228b-3: dang zhes bya ba ni sdud pa'o //
T02TD2627E:228b-4: 'dis ni 'bras bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ston to //
T02TD2627E:228b-5: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni 'khor dang mtshan mar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas pa ste /
T02TD2627E:228b-6: de'i dge 'dun phan tshun mi phyed pa dang /
T02TD2627E:228b-7: ston pa mi phyed pa grangs mthar thug pa med pa rnams kyis bla mar byed /
T02TD2627E:228b-8: mchod cing brjod rab tu mchod cing spel zhes bya ba ni gcig gis gcig bshad pa'o //
T02TD2627E:228b-9: yang na bsti stang byed pa ni /
T02TD2627E:228b-10: gdan bsham pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:228b-11: bla mar byed pa ni gong mar byed pa'o //
T02TD2627E:228b-12: mchod cing brjod pa ni rnam lngas mchod cing rgyan 'dogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:228b-13: rab tu mchod cing spel ba ni de rnams yang dang yang du ni don du byas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:228b-14: des ni rgyu'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor bstan pa'o //
T02TD2627E:228b-15: de 'jig rten pa dang 'bras bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mang po'i dbus na zhes bya ba ni kun nas bskor te bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:228b-16: tshangs pa chen po padma'i gdan la zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa yang yin la padma'i gdan yang yin pas na tshangs pa chen po padma'i gdan te dag cing tshangs la nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig tshig go //
T02TD2627E:228b-17: bzhugs te zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin dang chos 'chad pa dang /
T02TD2627E:228b-18: spyod lam dang gsum snang ba tha dad pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa ste 'dis ni bzhugs pa dang gdan phun sum tshogs pa bstan to //
T02TD2627E:228b-19: gzhan du yang bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:228b-20: 'di skad ces bya ba ni don dam par rang bzhin med par kun rdzob tu yod bzhin pa ste sgro skur gnyis dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2627E:228b-21: ji skad du rdo rje rtse mo las /
T02TD2627E:228b-22: 'jig rten kun rdzob ces bya ste //
T02TD2627E:228b-23: dam pa'i don du rang bzhin med //
T02TD2627E:228b-25: bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni thos nas rtogs pa ste ji skad du rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD2627E:228b-26: dam pa'i don ni bdag yin te //
T02TD2627E:228b-27: gang phyir gzings 'dra'i chos rnams la //
T02TD2627E:228b-28: rnam par dag pa rtogs par 'gyur //
T02TD2627E:229a-1: na zhes pa ni ye shes bzhi'i skad cig ma nyid la ste ji skad du rtsa ba'i rgyud nyid las /
T02TD2627E:229a-2: skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:229a-3: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni ye shes de dag nyid kyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs kun bcom pa ste rdo rje rtse mo las /
T02TD2627E:229a-4: mi mthun pa yi phyogs rnams kun //
T02TD2627E:229a-5: bcom pas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya //
T02TD2627E:229a-7: lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni de dag gi byang chub sems kyi 'dod chags chen po ste /
T02TD2627E:229a-8: gang phyir sems ni bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2627E:229a-11: dga' ba'i tshal mchog tu yid du 'ong ba na zhes bya ba ni chos nyid kyis de bzhin du ro gcig pa'o //
T02TD2627E:229a-13: blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' rab ste ;
T02TD2627E:229a-14: / dman pas 'jigs pa nyid kyi rgyal byed tshal //
T02TD2627E:229a-17: 'dod chags dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02TD2627E:229a-19: nor bu dang gser shing yal ga dang lcug mar bcas pa dang shing gel pa dang /
T02TD2627E:229a-21: me tog ka ma la dang /
T02TD2627E:229a-27: mant'a ra ba chen po la sogs pa sna tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2627E:229a-28: dpag bsam gyi shing rnams kyis mdzes bar byas pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:229a-29: bcom ldan 'das de nyid sman dang shing dang me tog dang mdzes pa'i rgyan yin te /
T02TD2627E:229a-31: sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing //
T02TD2627E:229a-32: nang do cog gi dgra che ba /
T02TD2627E:229a-33: sdu gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes //
T02TD2627E:229a-35: byang chub yan lag me tog phreng //
T02TD2627E:229a-37: bya mang po skad 'byin pa zhes pa ni de nyid skad sna tshogs su snang ba ste /
T02TD2627E:229a-39: phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga bo che //
T02TD2627E:229a-41: lha yi skad dang klu yi skad rnams dang //
T02TD2627E:229a-42: 'gro ba kun gyi skad rnams ji tsam par //
T02TD2627E:229b-0: rnga bo che la @229b sogs pa zhes bya ba ni phyogs bcur chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:229b-2: phyogs bcu'i chos kyi rnga bo che //
T02TD2627E:229b-4: chos kyi dung de sgra chen ldan //
T02TD2627E:229b-6: brgya byin dang zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid gzhan la phan par brtson pa ste /
T02TD2627E:229b-8: brgya byin gzhan la phan brtson pa //
T02TD2627E:229b-9: 'di yis ji ltar gsol ba btab //
T02TD2627E:229b-11: tshangs pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa rnam par grol ba'o //
T02TD2627E:229b-13: mya ngan 'das pa tshangs pa thob //
T02TD2627E:229b-14: grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus //
T02TD2627E:229b-16: lha dang mi'i bu mo sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2627E:229b-17: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2627E:229b-19: sngon chad byang chub sems bzang gang //
T02TD2627E:229b-20: rdo rje sems dpar yang dag bshad //
T02TD2627E:229b-22: gang phyir mchog tu rol pa na //
T02TD2627E:229b-23: sgeg mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin //
T02TD2627E:229b-25: de rnams rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba ni rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi thar pa de nyid de rdo rje rtse mo las /
T02TD2627E:229b-26: thar pa mchog tu bstan pa ste //
T02TD2627E:229b-28: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa na zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis chos thams cad skye ba med par shes pa ste rtsa rgyud las /
T02TD2627E:229b-29: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gzigs nas byin gyis brlabs te zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:229b-30: brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha dang rig 'dzin dang lha'i bu mo'i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang /
T02TD2627E:229b-31: gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang dri za dang /
T02TD2627E:229b-34: klu la sogs pa'i 'khor du ma dang zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi yon tan cha du mar de snang ba ste ji skad du /
T02TD2627E:229b-35: lha dang lha dbang lha yi lha //
T02TD2627E:229b-36: lha min dbang po lha min bla //
T02TD2627E:229b-38: gnod sbyin srin po dam pa bstan //
T02TD2627E:229b-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:230a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid kun du rtog @230a * //
T02TD2627E:230a-1: pa thams cad spangs par 'dod pa'o //
T02TD2627E:230a-2: ji skad du byang chub pa'i rgyud las /
T02TD2627E:230a-3: byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2627E:230a-4: kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
T02TD2627E:230a-5: gang zhig de rtogs 'dod pa ste //
T02TD2627E:230a-6: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
T02TD2627E:230a-8: bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad la 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs pas /
T02TD2627E:230a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi bye brag mthar thug pa med pa nye bar dgod pa'o //
T02TD2627E:230a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros tshad med pa dang /
T02TD2627E:230a-11: blo gros mi g-yo ba dang /
T02TD2627E:230a-15: blo gros ka ma la dang /
T02TD2627E:230a-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba la blo gros tshad med pa ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyi tshogs gnyis dang sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs pa ni rdo rje rin chen no //
T02TD2627E:230a-20: dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las /
T02TD2627E:230a-21: khams gsum pa ni rgyal po che //
T02TD2627E:230a-22: tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa dang //
T02TD2627E:230a-23: sa dang pha rol phyin pa mchog / rdo rje dbang bskur legs 'byung ba'o //
T02TD2627E:230a-25: blo gros mi g-yo ba ni byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa la stong pa nyid las byung ba'i mi g-yo ba phyag na rdo rje ste ji skad du /
T02TD2627E:230a-26: 'gro la yang dag spros pa'i sems //
T02TD2627E:230a-27: bstan pa'i snying po legs bsgoms shing //
T02TD2627E:230a-28: stong nyid de nyid la byung ba //
T02TD2627E:230a-29: rdo rje sems dpa' de bshad do //
T02TD2627E:230a-31: blo gros yangs pa ni bdag med cing gnyis su med pa'i ye shes chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdo rje chos yangs pa ste ji skad du /
T02TD2627E:230a-32: bdag med chos las legs par 'byung //
T02TD2627E:230a-33: gnyis med ye shes dam pa ste //
T02TD2627E:230a-34: chos nyid mchog tu bsam mi khyab //
T02TD2627E:230a-35: rdo rje chos su de bshad do ;
T02TD2627E:230a-37: kun du blo gros ni sems can kun gyi don dang sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa chen po ste rdo rje las so //
T02TD2627E:230a-39: sems can kun don yang dag sbyor //
T02TD2627E:230a-40: sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod chen po //
T02TD2627E:230a-41: dang po sbyor ba dag pa che //
T02TD2627E:230a-42: rdo rje las zhes bya bar bshad //
T02TD2627E:230b-1: blo gros mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mtha' yas pa dang //
T02TD2627E:230b-2: rten 'brel bcu gnyis gnas 'gyur pa mtha' yas pa thob pa rdo rje rgyu'o //
T02TD2627E:230b-4: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos 'khor lo //
T02TD2627E:230b-5: gnyis med thob pa'i mtshan nyid can //
T02TD2627E:230b-6: rten 'brel yang dag bcu gnyis grags //
T02TD2627E:230b-7: rdo rje rgyu zhes bya bar bshad //
T02TD2627E:230b-9: blo gros ka ma la zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:230b-10: zag pa med pa'i shes rab dang //
T02TD2627E:230b-11: ye shes rdo rje rnon po'o //
T02TD2627E:230b-13: rdo rje blo ni snang ba che //
T02TD2627E:230b-14: shes rab ye shes dri ma med //
T02TD2627E:230b-15: zag pa med pa'i shes rab ste //
T02TD2627E:230b-16: rdo rje rnon bor de bshad do //
T02TD2627E:230b-18: blo gros chen po zhes bya ba ni sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba gsang ba chen po rdo rje khu tshur ro //
T02TD2627E:230b-20: sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba ni //
T02TD2627E:230b-21: sgrib pa med cing bla med pa //
T02TD2627E:230b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //
T02TD2627E:230b-23: rdo rje khu tshur de bshad do //
T02TD2627E:230b-25: blo gros lha rdzas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:230b-26: nam mkha' mdzod kyi chos la dbang bsgyur ba yid bzhin nor bu nam mkha'i mdzod do //
T02TD2627E:230b-28: nam mkha'i mdzod ni mdzod chen po //
T02TD2627E:230b-29: chos rnams kun la dbang sgyur ba //
T02TD2627E:230b-30: yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje che //
T02TD2627E:230b-31: rdo rje thog ni bla med pa'o //
T02TD2627E:230b-33: blo gros sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:230b-34: sangs rgyas kyis thabs sna tshogs pa'i sgo nas nyon mongs pa sna tshogs pa za ba'i rdo rje gnod sbyin no //
T02TD2627E:230b-36: sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyis //
T02TD2627E:230b-37: shes rab thabs kyi khro bo che //
T02TD2627E:230b-38: nyon mongs thams cad za ba che //
T02TD2627E:230b-39: rdo rje gnod sbyin de bshad do //
T02TD2627E:230b-41: 'di dag gis sgrub pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bshad de /
T02TD2627E:230b-42: lung las dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer skyong bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:230b-43: sogs pa smos pas ni rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa'i yon tan bsdu'o ;
T02TD2627E:230b-44: / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams mthar thug pa med pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:231a-0: bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub kyi snying po la yod pa'i sa bcu dang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i @231a * //
T02TD2627E:231a-1: yon tan dang ldan pa bstan to //
T02TD2627E:231a-3: pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste //
T02TD2627E:231a-4: pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul //
T02TD2627E:231a-5: mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug ste //
T02TD2627E:231a-6: sa bcu la ni gnas pa po //
T02TD2627E:231a-9: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo yang //
T02TD2627E:231a-10: byang chub snying po yin par dgongs //
T02TD2627E:231a-12: bsti stang du byed bla mar byed mchod cing rjed /
T02TD2627E:231a-13: rab tu mchod cing spel zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis thob par bya ba'i bdag nyid du ston te ji skad du /
T02TD2627E:231a-16: bkur 'os brjed par bya ba mchog / phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab //
T02TD2627E:231a-18: 'khor mang po'i dbus na zhes bya ba ni de nyid dkyil 'khor gyi de nyid kyis 'khor dang gtso bo'i tshul gyis zhugs pa ste /
T02TD2627E:231a-20: sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems //
T02TD2627E:231a-21: bla na med pa rtogs gyur pa'i //
T02TD2627E:231a-22: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shes gang //
T02TD2627E:231a-23: de ni dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs //
T02TD2627E:231a-25: de'i don phyis bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:231a-26: tshangs pa chen po zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa nyid de ji skad du sngar bshad pa de bzhin du shes par bya'o ;
T02TD2627E:231a-27: / padma'i gdan la bzhugs te zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba'i nyes pas ma phog pa dang rnal 'byor can bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:231a-30: tshon gyi nyes pas ma gos pas //
T02TD2627E:231a-31: 'khor ba'i nyes pas ma gos so //
T02TD2627E:231a-32: zhes pa dang rdo rje rtse mo las /
T02TD2627E:231a-33: 'khor lo de la brtag byas nas //
T02TD2627E:231a-34: rnal 'byor can ni mi gsung bzhugs //
T02TD2627E:231a-35: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes gleng gzhi'i de kho na nyid do //
T02TD2627E:231a-38: // / de ltar gleng gzhi bstan nas /
T02TD2627E:231a-39: ngan song gi rgyud thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyud nyid bstan te ;
T02TD2627E:231a-40: ngan song gi rgyud thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:231a-41: ngan song rnams bag chags dang bcas pa 'dzoms zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:231a-42: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang ming 'di skad ces bya ste /
T02TD2627E:231a-43: de'i snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon du mdzad nas so //
T02TD2627E:231b-0: ngan song gi rgyud @231b las rnam par grol ba zhes bya bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od zer zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin skyed par byed pa 'od zer las byung ba'o //
T02TD2627E:231b-1: spro ba dang bsdu ba mang po'i phreng ba zhes pa ni phar spro tshur sdud pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rang bzhin no ;
T02TD2627E:231b-2: / nyid kyi dpral ba'i mdzod spu nas byung nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:231b-3: ston pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas so //
T02TD2627E:231b-4: de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:231b-5: 'od zer gyi snang ba des so //
T02TD2627E:231b-6: stong gsum gyi stong chen po zhes bya ba ni stong spyi phud dang /
T02TD2627E:231b-7: stong gnyis pa bar ma dang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'o //
T02TD2627E:231b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa la rten pa'i phyir dang mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:231b-9: 'di dag thams cad kun du snang bar byas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:231b-10: ma lus par snang bar byas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:231b-11: des kyang ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T02TD2627E:231b-12: nor bu dri ma med pa'i steng du 'khod de bzhag nas zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2627E:231b-13: kun nas snang bar byas nas sems can gyi sems nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las rnam par grol te zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i bag chags dang bcas pa las bkrol ba'o //
T02TD2627E:231b-14: bde ba so sor thob nas dga' ba'i tshal thams cad kun du snang bar byas te zhes bya ba ni rgyu dag pa'i sems can snang ngo zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02TD2627E:231b-15: mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs pas mchod de lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas mgo bos lan brgya phrag stong du phyag 'tshal nas /
T02TD2627E:231b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa gzhi nor bu dri ma med pa'i steng du 'khod do zhes bya ba ni mchod pa dang bskor ba dang /
T02TD2627E:231b-18: spyan sngar 'khod pas drin lan gyi tshul du ston to //
T02TD2627E:231b-19: 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i don 'di skad du zhus pa'o //
T02TD2627E:231b-20: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar gyi don to //
T02TD2627E:231b-21: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni de kho na rtogs nas chos kun rtogs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
T02TD2627E:231b-22: de yang rdo rje rtse mo las /
T02TD2627E:231b-23: de bzhin nyid bden shin tu brtan //
T02TD2627E:231b-24: de kho na nyid gang rtogs pa //
T02TD2627E:231b-25: chos kun rtogs zhes bya ba gang //
T02TD2627E:231b-26: de ni rtogs pas sangs rgyas brjod //
T02TD2627E:231b-28: ae ma'o sangs rgyas ae sangs rgyas //
T02TD2627E:232a-0: zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du @232a * //
T02TD2627E:232a-3: mdzad pa legs zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2627E:232a-4: gang phyir ngan song bdag nyid sbyangs //
T02TD2627E:232a-5: byang chub spyod pa nyid la bkod //
T02TD2627E:232a-7: 'dis ni sbyor ba dang po sgom pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang sdom pa gzung ba sngon du 'gro bas lha la sogs pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod de mi snang bar gyur par bsgom zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:232a-8: de nas phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2627E:232a-9: su zhig gis snyam pa la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2627E:232a-11: bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas nas phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:232a-12: bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer kun du snang bas ngan song gi rgyud las rnam par grol zhing /
T02TD2627E:232a-13: rnam par grol pa'i lam la gzhag pa ni zhes bya ba ni bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol bas byang chub kyi spyod pa nyid la bzhag ste /
T02TD2627E:232a-14: de la bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che'o //
T02TD2627E:232a-15: bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes gsungs pa ni don gnyis kyi dbang gis lan gnyis zhus pa'o //
T02TD2627E:232a-16: lan du bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD2627E:232a-17: lha'i dbang po 'di ni ngo mtshar mi che'o //
T02TD2627E:232a-18: lha'i dbang po 'di ni ngo mtshar mi che ste zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o //
T02TD2627E:232a-19: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad de /
T02TD2627E:232a-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs yang dag par bsags pa'o zhes bya ba ni mngon par byang chub pa dang po'i rgyu dang bcas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:232a-22: de bzhin tshogs ni rdzogs pa'i phyir //
T02TD2627E:232a-23: sems ni zla ba gang dang mtshungs //
T02TD2627E:232a-24: dngos po yod dang med nyid min //
T02TD2627E:232a-25: ji ltar zla ba mtshungs nyid yin //
T02TD2627E:232a-27: lha'i dbang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni tshad med pa'i yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o //
T02TD2627E:232b-0: lha'i dbang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni tshad med pa'i thabs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i zhes bya ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa @232b rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:232b-2: snying po dag pa bzlas nas ni //
T02TD2627E:232b-3: sems ni dbus su rtogs pa na //
T02TD2627E:232b-4: zla ba'i dbus su yang zla ba'i //
T02TD2627E:232b-5: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa mthong ba yin //
T02TD2627E:232b-7: lha'i dbang po sangs rgyas rnams ni shes rab tshad med pa bsags pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:232b-8: shes rab stong pa nyid kyis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus na gnas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:232b-10: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus gnas pa'i //
T02TD2627E:232b-11: rdo rje chen po sems byed cing //
T02TD2627E:232b-12: thang cig so sor brtags pa ni //
T02TD2627E:232b-13: shin tu brtan pa mthong 'gyur nas //
T02TD2627E:232b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni spyod pa tshad med pa'o //
T02TD2627E:232b-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gdul ba'i skye bo tshad med pa'i snod du gyur par mdzad pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:232b-17: rdo rje las sku gsung thugs byung nas spyod pa tshad med pa mdzad cing skye bo'i snod du gyur par mdzad cing 'dus pa las rdo rjer gyur ba'o//
T02TD2627E:232b-19: snying po dag pa bzlas nas ni /
T02TD2627E:232b-20: rdo rje'i lus su rnam bsgom pa //
T02TD2627E:232b-21: des ni sra brtan khong stong med //
T02TD2627E:232b-22: rdo rje'i sku ni thob gyur nas //
T02TD2627E:232b-24: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2627E:232b-25: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:232b-26: gzugs sku chos sku dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2627E:232b-28: snying po dag la blangs nas ni //
T02TD2627E:232b-29: sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgoms pas //
T02TD2627E:232b-30: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i //
T02TD2627E:232b-31: kun mkhyen ye shes thob par 'gyur ;
T02TD2627E:232b-33: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i smon lam gyi stobs dang ldan pa ste zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:232b-34: rdo rje dbyings shin tu brtan pa'i ye shes dbang bskur ba dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:232b-36: rdo rje dbyings ni shin tu brtan //
T02TD2627E:232b-37: de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
T02TD2627E:232b-38: rdo rje'i thugs ka nas phyung ste //
T02TD2627E:232b-39: chos kyi dbang bskur bzhi po yis //
T02TD2627E:232b-40: de tshe thub pa dbang bskur 'gyur //
T02TD2627E:232b-42: lha'i dbang po de lta bas na zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba la sogs pa kun du rdzogs pas de lta bas na zhes bya'o //
T02TD2627E:233a-1: kyi snod ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi don mdzad pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:233a-2: dkyil 'khor gyi don du gnas pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:233a-3: ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du sems can gyi don mdzad pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:233a-4: ngan 'gro sbyang zhing dkyil 'khor du bcug pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:233a-5: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi don mdzad pa yin par shes par bya ste zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i dbang thob pa'i sgo nas te /
T02TD2627E:233a-6: de ltar na 'di la the tshom dang som nyi dang yid gnyis ma byed cig gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnas med do zhes bya'o //
T02TD2627E:233a-7: yang na bsod nams kyi tshogs brgyad dang /
T02TD2627E:233a-8: mtshan dang dpe byad kyi yon tan dang /
T02TD2627E:233a-13: ye shes dang rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang /
T02TD2627E:233a-14: smon lam gyi stobs dang ldan pa'i sgo nas gang zag la bdag med pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2627E:233a-15: nyan thos kyi gzugs la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2627E:233a-16: nyan thos kyi theg pa la sogs pa 'dul bar gyur pa'i rgyu la som nyi la sogs pa ma byed cig ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:233a-17: 'dis ni sbyor ba dang po bsgom pa rnams kyis bdag mngon par byang chub pa bskyed de byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD2627E:233a-18: dbang bskur ba dang ldan pas ngan 'gro nas dgug cing dkyil 'khor du bcug dbang bskur bar bya ste zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:233a-19: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin rang gi stan las langs nas yang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya che zhing che ba byas te /
T02TD2627E:233a-20: phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:233a-21: nga rgyal dang bral ba dang /
T02TD2627E:233a-22: mchod pa dang phyag 'tshal zhing bstod pa byas par ston to //
T02TD2627E:233a-23: 'dis ni gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis mchod cing bstod pa drin lan gyi tshul du sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:233a-24: sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2627E:233a-25: brgya byin nyid sems can gyi tshe phyi ma'i don dang /
T02TD2627E:233a-26: snying rje chung du dang 'bring dang chen po dang /
T02TD2627E:233a-27: bsam pa rdzogs pa'i rgyur shes rab bskyed cig ces yang dang yang du gsol ba btab pa'o //
T02TD2627E:233b-0: @233b byin gyis brlab pa dang zhugs pa'i rang bzhin gang zhe na /
T02TD2627E:233b-1: bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smros te /
T02TD2627E:233b-2: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris zhes bya ba ni ga na pa ti la sog pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02TD2627E:233b-3: brgya byin gyi ris te sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris so//
T02TD2627E:233b-4: 'di nyid nas lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba cig shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas zhes bya ba ni las ci zhig gi stobs kyis tshe 'phos pa'o //
T02TD2627E:233b-5: dgung bdun lags na zhes bya ba ni lha'i zhag bdun la mi'i lo bdun brgya lon pa'o //
T02TD2627E:233b-6: bcom ldan 'das de gang du skyes zhes bya ba ni gnas gang du skyes pa dris pa'o //
T02TD2627E:233b-7: bde ba'am sdug bsngal ci zhig myong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu dris pa'o //
T02TD2627E:233b-9: bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol zhes bya ba ni yid la gcags nas yang dang yang du gsol ba btab pa'o //
T02TD2627E:233b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa lha'i dbang po ji ste dus la bab par shes na zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:233b-11: lha'i dbang po sprul pa yin pa'i phyir dus mkhyen pas so //
T02TD2627E:233b-12: nyon cig ces bya ba ni thos pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab kyis zung shig pa'i don to //
T02TD2627E:233b-13: lha'i dbang pos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'di ni dus la bab pa lags so //
T02TD2627E:233b-14: bde bar gshegs pa 'di ni dus la bab pa lags so zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02TD2627E:233b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD2627E:233b-16: lha'i dbang po lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas myong zhing myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2627E:233b-17: ji lta bu zhig ce na dmyal ba chen por lo stong phrag bcu gnyis kyi bar dang /
T02TD2627E:233b-18: dmyal ba chung du rnams su lo stong phrag brgyad dang /
T02TD2627E:233b-19: byol song dang yi dgas kyi gnas su lo brgya phrag brgyad dang /
T02TD2627E:233b-20: mi'i skye gnas su rna ba dang smra ba'i skyon can du lo stong phrag drug cu dang sdug bsngal brgyud pa dang gzhan la gnod pa byed pa dang las kyi sgrib pa brgyud pas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du sdug bsngal myong zhing myong bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa dang /
T02TD2627E:234a-0: de nas brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu thams cad kyis thos nas shin tu sngangs shing zhes bya ba ni ngag gi sgo @234a * //
T02TD2627E:234a-1: nas skrag ste skyo nas zhes bya ba sems kyi sgo nas kha bub tu 'gyel bar gyur to zhes bya ba lus kyi tshul gyis 'gyel bar gyur pa'o //
T02TD2627E:234a-2: 'dis ni mos pa spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa'i brgya byin la sogs pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:234a-3: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
T02TD2627E:234a-4: sdug bsngal chen po brgyud pa 'di las bcom ldan 'das ji ltar thar bar 'gyur /
T02TD2627E:234a-5: bde bar gshegs pa ji ltar thar bar 'gyur /
T02TD2627E:234a-6: bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di las rnam par grol bar 'gyur /
T02TD2627E:234a-7: bde bar gshegs pa 'di bskyab tu gsol zhes zhus pa dang /
T02TD2627E:234a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD2627E:234a-9: sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis bshad pa 'di nyon cig ces bya ba ni phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02TD2627E:234a-10: sangs rgyas grangs med pas bcom ldan 'das la bskul zhing du mar snang ba'i tshul gyis 'di bshad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:234a-11: 'dis ni gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa rnams kyi lus la dkyil 'khor brtag ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2627E:234a-12: sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so /
T02TD2627E:234a-14: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ston pa ste /
T02TD2627E:234a-15: de nas zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la'o ;
T02TD2627E:234a-16: / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:234a-17: dkyil 'khor sprul zhing gsang sngags gsung pa'i don du slar yang zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2627E:234a-18: me tog mand'a ra ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa me tog dang rgyan gyi khyad par gyis mchod de bskor ba dang phyag 'tshal ba dang legs so zhes bya bas mnyes par byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD2627E:234a-19: bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang zhes bya ba tshe phyi ma'i don dang /
T02TD2627E:234a-20: bde bar bgyi ba dang zhes bya ba tshe 'di'i don dang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gi rgyud gsum las thar bar bgyi ba'i slad du zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:234a-21: dkyil 'khor yod na dbang dang dam tshig yod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:234a-22: legs par bshad du gsol zhes bya ba ni gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2627E:234a-23: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sprul zhing bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:234b-0: de nas gzhan yang sprul pa'i 'khor @234b tshangs pa la sogs pa lha mang po rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD2627E:234b-1: legs so bcom ldan 'das legs so //
T02TD2627E:234b-2: bde bar gshegs pa ci nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis mchan tsam thos pas ngan song gsum gyi lam las rnam par grol te /
T02TD2627E:234b-3: bde 'gro lha'i 'jig rten nas mi'i 'jig rten du skyes nas bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par gsol zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:234b-4: dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang 'bras bu 'di rnams dang ldan pas bshad par gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa'o //
T02TD2627E:234b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2627E:234b-7: brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu de dag bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'og nas 'byung ba byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:234b-8: kha bub tu 'gyel ba bslangs te rgyud sbyangs la dam tshig dang dbang thob par byas nas dkyil 'khor du lha dgod pa'i don du'o //
T02TD2627E:234b-9: ji lta bu zhig la zhe na /
T02TD2627E:234b-10: gdon mi za ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te 'bras bu yod cing don yod la mi chod pa'i rdo rje nges pa bskyed pa'i don du ming de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2627E:234b-11: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon du mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2627E:234b-12: ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig tu zad dam zhe na ma yin te /
T02TD2627E:234b-13: aom badzra aa dhi dhishtha dzny'a na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2627E:234b-14: thugs ka nas phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro snyoms par zhugs nas gsangs sngags gsung pas lha'i bu rnams kyi rgyud sbyang ba dang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa bstan to //
T02TD2627E:234b-15: gzhan yang snyoms par zhugs nas kyang gdon mi za bar mi chod pa'i rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas kyang zhes bya bas ni dbang bskur ba bsdu'o //
T02TD2627E:234b-16: gdon mi za bar zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba la the tshom med pa'o //
T02TD2627E:234b-17: mi chod pa'i zhes bya ba ni de'i 'bras bu chos kyi sku'o //
T02TD2627E:234b-18: rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya ba ni bum pa rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs pas so //
T02TD2627E:234b-19: byin gyis brlabs nas zhes bya ba ni chu'i dbang bskur nas te /
T02TD2627E:234b-20: gzhan yang dbang nyi shu rtsa gcig kun gyis bskur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2627E:235a-0: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yongs su sbyong @235a * //
T02TD2627E:235a-1: ba'i rgyal po ni rgyu dang 'bras bu dang ngo bo nyid dang rten dang gnas sbyong ba ste thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD2627E:235a-2: de ston pa'i sgra la yang nye bar gdags pas de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2627E:235a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'og nas 'byung ba 'di'o //
T02TD2627E:235a-4: rang nyid kyang nges pa'i ye shes las sgra'i gzugs su phyung ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:235a-5: aom sho dha ni zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:235a-6: shuddhe sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
T02TD2627E:235a-7: rig pa chen po 'di bshad ma thag tu ces bya ba ni gsungs pa dang sprul pa'o //
T02TD2627E:235a-8: de'i pan yon sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
T02TD2627E:235a-9: de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2627E:235a-10: de nas zhes bya ba ni kun rig gi gsang sngags gsungs pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2627E:235a-11: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni slar yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:235a-12: gsang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:235a-13: thugs dang yon tan dang gsung dang phrin las so //
T02TD2627E:235a-14: de ston pa'i sgra la yang nye bar gdags pas de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2627E:235a-15: 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba'o //
T02TD2627E:235a-16: aom shodhi ni sho dha ya sarba aa pa y'a na zhes bya ba ni ngan song sbyong ba dang /
T02TD2627E:235a-19: me tog cher rgyas rnams kyi thun mong gi snying po yin no ;
T02TD2627E:235a-20: / sarba sadya bhya h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2627E:235a-22: tra tha aa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:235a-23: rin chen tog la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi snying po ste phyis 'byung ba las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:235a-24: lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying po'i zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems dang sbyin ba dang shes rab dang /
T02TD2627E:235a-25: brtson 'grus dang snying rje la sogs pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:235a-26: de ston pa'i sgra la yang de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2627E:235a-27: aom sarba aa p'a ya bi sho dha ne zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:235a-31: sgrol ma rnams kyi thun mong gi snying po yin no //
T02TD2627E:235a-32: h'um phat ces bya ba dang /
T02TD2627E:235a-33: tram ham aa: zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi snying po'o //
T02TD2627E:235a-34: lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang zhes bya ba ni thugs so //
T02TD2627E:235a-35: nye ba'i snying po'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2627E:235a-36: de ston pa'i sgra la yang de skad ces pa'o //
T02TD2627E:235b-0: @235b aom tra ta ces bya ba ni sdig pa gzhom pa'i snying po'o //
T02TD2627E:235b-1: lha'i dbang po 'di ni gzhan yang ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i snying po'i zhes bya ba ni shar gyi gtso bo'i khyad par gyi snying po'o //
T02TD2627E:235b-2: rdo rje sems dpa' nas brtsams te lhag ma rnams kyi bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang gtsug tor la sogs pa rnams su shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:235b-3: lha'i dbang po gzhan yang mdor na dran pa tsam gyis kyang bsod nams chung ba'i sems can thams cad ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las bde blag tu rnam par grol bar gyur pa ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdu na dran pa tsam gyis grol bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin te /
T02TD2627E:235b-4: lha thams cad bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2627E:235b-8: kun la mchog tu gyur pa'i rtsa ba'i rig pa ste /
T02TD2627E:235b-9: na mo bha ga wa te zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2627E:235b-11: sarba bid ces bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2627E:235b-12: aom bha zhes bya'i mthar thug pa rnams tshe 'di'i phan yon la gnas pa'am shi ba'i lus la gdags pa dang bzlas brjod bya ba dang /
T02TD2627E:235b-13: bha dang sha'i don bsgom pa yin te /
T02TD2627E:235b-14: de gsungs pa lha'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po gsang ba'i snying po 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te de ston pa'i sgra la yang de skad ces bya ste /
T02TD2627E:235b-15: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung bas zhes bya ba ni rgyal rigs la sogs pa du ma ste /
T02TD2627E:235b-16: bu'am bu mo gang yang rung bas zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi dgag pa med pa'o //
T02TD2627E:235b-17: ming tsam nyan tam zhes bya ba ni ming nyid nyan pa'o//
T02TD2627E:235b-18: bcangs sam zhes bya ba ni don dang tshig go //
T02TD2627E:235b-19: bklags sam zhes bya ba ni kha thon nam glegs bam gyis so //
T02TD2627E:235b-20: de 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi gro ga la sogs pa la bris nas kyang mgo bo'i gtsug phud dam dpung pa 'am mgul du btags te 'chang na zhes bya ba ni tshe 'di nyid la gnas pa'i gdags pa gsum bstan to //
T02TD2627E:235b-21: de nyid du gsungs pa tshe 'di nyid la bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:235b-22: de nyid kyi phan yon dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad dam zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2627E:235b-23: dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad ni mid pa bsgags pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:235b-24: dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dang /
T02TD2627E:236a-0: @236a * // 'brel pa'i rmi lam gyi rnam pa'am zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:236a-2: bag chags kyi rmi lam dang ltas bstan pa dang byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:236a-3: des kyang mi 'byung la gzhan yang ngan song dang 'brel pa'i mtshan ma de dag thams cad rmi lam du yang mi 'byung na zhes bya ba ni gnyid ma log pa na lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:236a-4: mnyan pa la sogs pa'i phan yon bshad nas /
T02TD2627E:236a-5: dkyil 'khor du ji lta bar zhugs la zhes bya bas zhugs pa'i phan yon ston to //
T02TD2627E:236a-6: zhugs la zhes bya ba la dang por zhugs la zhugs nas dbang bskur nas gong du bshad pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byed cing sngags kyi don bsgom pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2627E:236a-7: bha dang sha'i don bsgom pa'o //
T02TD2627E:236a-8: lta smos kyang ci dgos te zhes bya ba dang phul du byung ba gsungs pa ste bstan pa'o //
T02TD2627E:236a-9: de nyid bshad pa de dag las sdig pa gang yang nye bar mi 'gyur ngan song du 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2627E:236a-10: de ltar tshe 'di la gnas pa'i phan yon bshad nas /
T02TD2627E:236a-11: tshe 'das pa rnams kyi phan yon gyi dbang du byas nas /
T02TD2627E:236a-12: skyes pa'am bud med dam lha'am klu'am gnod sbyin nam srin po'am /
T02TD2627E:236a-13: byol song ngam yi dags sam sems can dmyal ba la sogs te gang yang rung ba shi ba'i lus dkyil 'khor du btsug ste dbang bskur na zhes bya ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor du bcug cing dbang bskur na zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:236a-14: de nas cir 'gyur zhe na 'bras bu gsungs pa /
T02TD2627E:236a-15: sems can dmyal bar skyes na yang de ma thag par yang thar nas lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:236a-16: lha'i ris der skyes nas kyang /
T02TD2627E:236a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid mngon du byed ces bya ba ni sgro 'dogs pa dang /
T02TD2627E:236a-18: skur pa 'debs pa dang bral ba'i chos nyid thob ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:236a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyen bkur la sogs pa yang byed /
T02TD2627E:236a-21: rgyu nges pa can du yang 'gyur /
T02TD2627E:236a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su yang skye /
T02TD2627E:236a-23: sdig pa thams cad rab tu spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs sam lha'i rigs sam /
T02TD2627E:236b-0: gang yang rung bar bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de bzhin @236b gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
T02TD2627E:236b-1: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa la sogs pa phyir mi ldog pa dang /
T02TD2627E:236b-2: theg pa chen po'i rigs can dang /
T02TD2627E:236b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub dang /
T02TD2627E:236b-4: mchod pa'i sgrib pa la sogs pa spangs pa dang /
T02TD2627E:236b-7: ri lu la sogs pa'i dngos grub gang yang rung ba dang ldan pa'i bde ba thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:236b-9: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phan pa dang bde ba thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdu na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa gnyis su bsdus pas de'i phan pa dang bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:236b-10: 'dis ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog sgom pa rnams kyi khang pa brtsegs ma dang gdan bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2627E:236b-11: kun rig sprul nas thugs kar zla ba la sngags bkod nas lha rnams sprul pa dang /
T02TD2627E:236b-12: sprul cing sgrub pa'i sngags 'bras bu dang bcas pa bstan to //
T02TD2627E:236b-13: ri rab tu sprul ba'i dus ni /
T02TD2627E:236b-14: gtso bo grub pa'i dus su 'khor rnams grub pas /
T02TD2627E:236b-15: gtso bo dang 'khor sprul pa ma bstan to //
T02TD2627E:236b-16: de nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bstan to //
T02TD2627E:236b-17: de nas gtso bo dang tha mi dad par bsams te /
T02TD2627E:236b-18: bsdu ba dang phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T02TD2627E:236b-21: yang ched du brjod pa dang /
T02TD2627E:236b-25: kun gyi phrin las gcig la sbyar ba dang /
T02TD2627E:236b-26: kun gyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa dang /
T02TD2627E:236b-27: gsang zhing sra ba'i mchog mthon po las bstan pa bzhin shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:236b-28: las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2627E:236b-29: / dam tshig dang dbang thob pas thabs 'di nyid la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:236b-30: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las dang ;
T02TD2627E:236b-31: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ston to //
T02TD2627E:236b-32: de nas sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2627E:236b-36: lha rnams grub nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:237a-0: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya @237a * //
T02TD2627E:237a-2: ci zhig byas nas she na /
T02TD2627E:237a-3: bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du bskor ba byas nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:237a-4: bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2627E:237a-6: ngan song gi dbang du gyur pa rnams la phan pa dang bde bar bgyi ba dang ci nas kyang sems can de dag ngan song thams cad kyi sgo las rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyid pa dang /
T02TD2627E:237a-7: bla na ma mchis par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde blag tu rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor bris pas mi rnams la phan pa'i don du ste de'i phyir bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:237a-8: rje btsun bshad du gsol zhes bya ba ni khyad par du bod pas gsol ba btab pa'o //
T02TD2627E:237a-9: de nas zhes bya ba ni gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2627E:237a-10: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:237a-11: kun rig nyid mi yul du sh'akya thub par gyur pa la dgongs nas de skad ces bshad de nges so //
T02TD2627E:237a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes zhes bya ba ni der nges pa'i ye shes te /
T02TD2627E:237a-13: dbyer mi phyed pas rdo rje zhes bya la dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid de /
T02TD2627E:237a-14: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2627E:237a-15: de'i snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon du mdzad pa ste de mdzad nas so //
T02TD2627E:237a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor ni gzugs can dang gzugs med pa la gzugs med de rang gi dkyil 'khor gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
