T02TD2627E:237a-17: de yang chos kyi bcud kyi snying po 'byung ba'i phyir dang snying po lan pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2627E:237a-18: chen po zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro bas ye shes gzugs sku dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:237a-19: 'di zhes bya ba 'og nas byung ba 'di'o gsungs so zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal pa'o //
T02TD2627E:237a-20: gsungs pa'i rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2627E:237a-21: sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems //
T02TD2627E:237a-22: bla na med pa rtogs 'gyur ba'i //
T02TD2627E:237a-23: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shes gang //
T02TD2627E:237a-24: de ni dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs //
T02TD2627E:237a-26: sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems /
T02TD2627E:237b-0: @237b zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD2627E:237b-1: bla na med pa zhes bya ba ni spros pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2627E:237b-2: rtogs 'gyur ba'i zhes bya ba ni khong du chud pa'o //
T02TD2627E:237b-3: de nyid ye shes zhes bya bas ston te sus gsungs she na /
T02TD2627E:237b-4: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i zhes bya ba smos so //
T02TD2627E:237b-5: de ni dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs //
T02TD2627E:237b-6: zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba ste de nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:237b-7: dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du bshad pa'o //
T02TD2627E:237b-8: rang bzhin du bshad pa de yang 'di yin te /
T02TD2627E:237b-9: mi mnyam pa med pas zur bzhi yin no //
T02TD2627E:237b-10: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
T02TD2627E:237b-11: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
T02TD2627E:237b-12: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi dang /
T02TD2627E:237b-13: dbang po lnga zhes bya ba ni sgo bzhi yin no //
T02TD2627E:237b-14: bsam gtan rnams la rta babs bzhi //
T02TD2627E:237b-16: gzugs rnams la kha khyer la brten pa'i lha mo rnams zhes bya'o //
T02TD2627E:237b-17: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'dul ba bskyod pa'i rang bzhin ni /
T02TD2627E:237b-18: rlung gis dar 'phan bskyod nas sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2627E:237b-19: ye shes me long zhes bya'o //
T02TD2627E:237b-20: byang chub kyi yan lag me tog gi phreng ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2627E:237b-21: mi zad pa'i bde ba dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang /
T02TD2627E:237b-22: rin chen mchog nyi ma dang zla ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2627E:237b-23: rnam par thar pa brgyad dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya'o //
T02TD2627E:237b-24: theg pa chen po mdo sdes bskor ba ni rdo rje theg pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2627E:237b-25: 'khor lo ni chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
T02TD2627E:237b-27: mi mnyam med pas zur bzhi ste //
T02TD2627E:237b-28: dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi yin //
T02TD2627E:237b-29: bsam gtan rnams kyang rta babs yin //
T02TD2627E:237b-30: kha khyer la brten rdo rje mchog / lha mos mchod pas gzungs rnams yin //
T02TD2627E:237b-31: sna tshogs pa yi rgyan rnams kun //
T02TD2627E:237b-32: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs pa yin //
T02TD2627E:237b-33: gdul bya bskyod pas sna tshogs mchog / dam chos mchog ni kun du 'gro //
T02TD2627E:237b-34: rlung gis bskyod nas sna tshogs mchog / dar 'phan dril bu sgra sgrogs ni //
T02TD2627E:237b-35: me long ye shes rtags me tog / dra ba dra phyed rin chen mchog / nyi ma zla ba yang dag ldan //
T02TD2627E:237b-36: kun grub mi zad bde ba ste //
T02TD2627E:237b-37: bde ba chen po zhas bshad do //
T02TD2627E:237b-38: de yi nang rim dag gi thig / dkyil 'khor brgyad pa 'dra pha ni //
T02TD2627E:237b-39: 'di na rnam par thar pa brgyad //
T02TD2627E:237b-40: dngos grub kun gyi bde ba ster //
T02TD2627E:237b-41: theg pa chen po byang chub sems //
T02TD2627E:238a-2: rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor ba //
T02TD2627E:238a-3: rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri //
T02TD2627E:238a-6: lte bar bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug / ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:238a-7: yang de nyid kyi byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu dang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang /
T02TD2627E:238a-8: sems can gyi don la chags pa dang /
T02TD2627E:238a-9: byang chub sems dpa' kun mgu bar byed pa'i tshul ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2627E:238a-14: byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu ni //
T02TD2627E:238a-15: sangs rgyas ye shes bla med gang //
T02TD2627E:238a-16: de ni rdo rje sems rang bzhin //
T02TD2627E:238a-17: chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'o //
T02TD2627E:238a-19: bsdu ba yi ni dngos po bzhi //
T02TD2627E:238a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang spyad pa //
T02TD2627E:238a-21: sems can 'gugs pa'i thabs zhes pa //
T02TD2627E:238a-22: rdo rje rgyal po yang dag 'byung //
T02TD2627E:238a-24: sems can smin phyir bcom ldan gyis //
T02TD2627E:238a-25: gang tshe byang chub spyod pa spyad //
T02TD2627E:238a-26: byang chub spyod la rjes chags pa //
T02TD2627E:238a-27: rdo rje chags par yang dag 'byung //
T02TD2627E:238a-29: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing //
T02TD2627E:238a-30: legs so zhes bya rab ster byed //
T02TD2627E:238a-31: byang chub sems dpa' kun mgu byed //
T02TD2627E:238a-32: de ni rdo rje legs par brjod //
T02TD2627E:238a-34: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de nyid sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi shes pa'i mun nag 'joms pa dang /
T02TD2627E:238a-35: chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po dang /
T02TD2627E:238a-36: byang chub sems dpa' kun dbugs 'byin pa go rims bzhin du rdo rje rin chen dang /
T02TD2627E:238a-38: rgyal mtshan dang bzhad pa bzhi yin te /
T02TD2627E:238a-40: byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa gang //
T02TD2627E:238a-41: mkha' mnyam rin chen lta bu ste //
T02TD2627E:238a-42: rdo rje rin chen skal ba che //
T02TD2627E:238a-43: des na rdo rje rin chen brjod //
T02TD2627E:238a-45: ma rig ling tog 'khor ba yi //
T02TD2627E:238a-46: mi shes mun pa 'joms byed cing //
T02TD2627E:238a-47: thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che //
T02TD2627E:238a-48: de ni rdo rje gzi brjid do //
T02TD2627E:238a-50: rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin //
T02TD2627E:238a-51: thar pa'i lam 'gro rgyal mtshan de //
T02TD2627E:238a-52: chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyal mtshan che //
T02TD2627E:238a-53: de ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan brjod //
T02TD2627E:238a-55: rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje bzhad //
T02TD2627E:238a-56: sangs rgyas thams cad bzhad byed cing //
T02TD2627E:238b-0: byang chub sems @238b dpa' kun dbugs 'byin //
T02TD2627E:238b-1: de ni rdo rje bzhad par brjod //
T02TD2627E:238b-2: ces gsungs pa'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de nyid sems can gyis rtogs par byed pa'i rgyu dang /
T02TD2627E:238b-5: tshig dang bral bas smra ba ste /
T02TD2627E:238b-6: bzhi po go rims bzhin du rdo rje chos dang rnon po dang /
T02TD2627E:238b-9: rnal 'byor chen po sangs rgyas chos //
T02TD2627E:238b-10: sangs rgyas sems can rtogs byed pa //
T02TD2627E:238b-11: dag pa de bzhin gshegs snying po //
T02TD2627E:238b-12: de ni rdo rje chos su brjod //
T02TD2627E:238b-14: shes rab rnon po ye shes che //
T02TD2627E:238b-15: shin tu sdug pa'i nyon mongs gcod //
T02TD2627E:238b-16: shes bya'i sgrib pa gcod pas na //
T02TD2627E:238b-17: de ni rdo rje rnon por brjod //
T02TD2627E:238b-19: 'khor lo sangs rgyas gar shes pa //
T02TD2627E:238b-20: chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu brtan //
T02TD2627E:238b-21: dam chos sgrol ba'i bcud las byung //
T02TD2627E:238b-22: de ni rdo rje rgyu zhes bya //
T02TD2627E:238b-24: sangs rgyas kun gyi chos chen po //
T02TD2627E:238b-25: mkha' mtshungs tshig dang bral ba ste /
T02TD2627E:238b-26: tshig med tshig las yang dag byung //
T02TD2627E:238b-28: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid sems can smin pa dang grol ba dang theg pa dman pa spong ba dang /
T02TD2627E:238b-29: nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa dang de bzhin nyid phyin ci ma log pa ste go rims bzhin du /
T02TD2627E:238b-30: rdo rje las dang srung ba dang /
T02TD2627E:238b-34: sems can smin dang grol ba yi //
T02TD2627E:238b-35: sangs rgyas kun gyi las gang dang //
T02TD2627E:238b-36: sangs rgyas las ni bdag med pa //
T02TD2627E:238b-37: de ni rdo rje las zhes bya //
T02TD2627E:238b-38: byang chub sems dpa' srung ba ste //
T02TD2627E:238b-39: theg pa dman pa spang byed cing //
T02TD2627E:238b-40: rtse mo nas ltung srung byed pa //
T02TD2627E:238b-41: de ni rdo rje srung bar bshad //
T02TD2627E:238b-42: sdig pa thams cad zad byed cing //
T02TD2627E:238b-43: nyon mongs thams cad nges par gcod //
T02TD2627E:238b-44: srid pa zad byed gnod sbyin che //
T02TD2627E:238b-45: de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin brjod //
T02TD2627E:238b-47: bden zhing gzhan min de bzhin nyid //
T02TD2627E:238b-48: 'gyur med de kho na nyid gang //
T02TD2627E:238b-49: sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid ye shes //
T02TD2627E:238b-50: de ni rdo rje khu tshur brjod //
T02TD2627E:238b-52: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de nyid sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang /
T02TD2627E:239a-2: gandhe zhes bya ba rnams so //
T02TD2627E:239a-4: gang phyir mchog tu rol pas na //
T02TD2627E:239a-5: sgeg mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin //
T02TD2627E:239a-6: byang chub yan lag 'bras ster bas //
T02TD2627E:239a-7: phreng ba tshul khrims pha rol phyin //
T02TD2627E:239a-9: zhi ba'i chos la rjes mos pas //
T02TD2627E:239a-10: glu ma bzod pa'i pha rol phyin //
T02TD2627E:239a-12: sangs rgyas mchod la mi skyo bas //
T02TD2627E:239a-13: gar ma brtson 'grus pha rol phyin //
T02TD2627E:239a-15: thar pa mchog ni dga' sgrub pas //
T02TD2627E:239a-16: bdug pa shes rab pha rol phyin //
T02TD2627E:239a-17: sangs rgyas nyid 'bras rgyu yin pas //
T02TD2627E:239a-18: me tog bsam gtan pha rol phyin //
T02TD2627E:239a-20: rdo rje mar me thabs chen po //
T02TD2627E:239a-21: smon lam rdo rje byug pa dang //
T02TD2627E:239a-23: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de nyid byang chub kyi sems kyi mtshan nyid 'gugs par byed pa dang /
T02TD2627E:239a-24: byang chub kyi spyod pa'i zhags pa dang theg pa chen por 'ching ba dang /
T02TD2627E:239a-25: chos thams cad skye ba med par 'bab pa ste go rims bzhin du /
T02TD2627E:239a-31: byang chub sems kyis 'gugs pa ni //
T02TD2627E:239a-32: rdo rje lcags kyur yang dag brjod //
T02TD2627E:239a-33: byang chub spyod pa la spyod pa //
T02TD2627E:239a-34: rdo rje zhags par de bshad do //
T02TD2627E:239a-35: theg pa dman pa srung byed pa //
T02TD2627E:239a-36: rdo rje lcags sgrog de bshad do //
T02TD2627E:239a-39: ye shes de gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:239a-40: yang gnyis su med pa'i thugs de nyid snying rje dang /
T02TD2627E:239a-43: btang snyoms dang bzhi ni go rims bzhin du /
T02TD2627E:239a-47: sgrol ma rnams zhes pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:239a-49: sangs rgyas spyan ni byams pa che //
T02TD2627E:239a-50: m'a ma k'i ni snying rje che //
T02TD2627E:239a-51: dkar mo dga' bar rab tu brjod //
T02TD2627E:239a-52: btang snyoms che dang thabs che bar //
T02TD2627E:239a-53: sgrol ma zhes ni brjod pa yin //
T02TD2627E:239a-55: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02TD2627E:239a-58: byang chub kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba bzhi go rims bzhin du ngan song sbyong ba dang /
T02TD2627E:239b-0: byang @239b chub tu ni sems bskyed dang //
T02TD2627E:239b-1: de bzhin tshogs dang shes rab dang //
T02TD2627E:239b-2: byang chub spyod pa rab spyod pa //
T02TD2627E:239b-3: rgyal po bzhir ni yang dag 'byung //
T02TD2627E:239b-5: ye shes de nyid chos thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa ni /
T02TD2627E:239b-6: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD2627E:239b-8: dbus su rnam par snang mdzad ces //
T02TD2627E:239b-9: chos rnams gcig tu bsdus pa yin //
T02TD2627E:239b-11: 'dis ni 'bras bu de nyid las ldog pa'i tshul gyis tha dad pa yin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis tha dad pa yod pa ma yin no //
T02TD2627E:239b-12: 'dis ni gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid thog mar shes par gyis shig ces ston to //
T02TD2627E:239b-13: de ltar nang gi dkyil 'khor gzugs med pa gsungs nas /
T02TD2627E:239b-14: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyi'i dkyil 'khor gzugs dang bcas pa bstan to //
T02TD2627E:239b-15: de nas zhes bya ba ni bar ma chad pa'o //
T02TD2627E:239b-16: yang zhes bya ba ni sdud pa'o //
T02TD2627E:239b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du zhes bya ba ni mi rnams la phan pa'i don du'o //
T02TD2627E:239b-18: phyi'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD2627E:239b-19: gzugs dang bcas shing thams cad 'jug tu rung ba'o //
T02TD2627E:239b-21: mi rnams la phan pa'i don du bshad do //
T02TD2627E:239b-22: gtsug lag khang dang skyed mos tshal //
T02TD2627E:239b-23: mchod rten lha khang kun ra sogs //
T02TD2627E:239b-24: ji bzhin pa yi cho ga yis //
T02TD2627E:239b-25: gnas ni byin gyis brlab pa brtsam //
T02TD2627E:239b-26: zhes bya ba ni gtsug lag khang dang /
T02TD2627E:239b-27: mchod rten dang lha khang dang kun dga' ra ba dang 'bab chu'i 'gram dang /
T02TD2627E:239b-29: byang gi phyogs kyi char ram gang du yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su'o //
T02TD2627E:239b-31: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i don du ni //
T02TD2627E:239b-32: tshigs bcad 'di ni bsgrag par bya //
T02TD2627E:239b-33: sa la rgyu ba'i lha kun dang //
T02TD2627E:239b-34: gang zhig sa la brtan pa kun //
T02TD2627E:239b-35: byams pa'i sems kyis gnas nas su //
T02TD2627E:239b-36: sems can kun la dge don du //
T02TD2627E:239b-37: kun dga'i don du zhu zhing mchis //
T02TD2627E:239b-38: de nas ji ltar 'tsham bzhin du pus mo nub tsam 'og tu brkos la /
T02TD2627E:239b-39: gyo mo la sogs pa bsal la /
T02TD2627E:239b-40: spyan dang rdo re gnod sbyin dang //
T02TD2627E:239b-41: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyi chus bsang gtor bya //
T02TD2627E:240a-2: ba'i chu dang lci bas byug / sa gzung ba dang sbyang ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2627E:240a-3: de nas gos dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan /
T02TD2627E:240a-5: rdo rje gnod sbyin du bskyed /
T02TD2627E:240a-6: mig gnyis su ma dang ta las zla ba dang nyi ma dgod /
T02TD2627E:240a-7: rkang pa la aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed /
T02TD2627E:240a-8: lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bu bzang ste yi ge h'um gi sgra sgrogs shing /
T02TD2627E:240a-9: g-yas nas bskor la dengs zhes brjod /
T02TD2627E:240a-10: mtshams dang ra ba dang dra ba dag kyang bya /
T02TD2627E:240a-11: bdud dang sdang ba bzlog / de nas phur bu byin gyis brlabs la phur bu gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:240a-13: ji bzhin pa yi cho ga yis //
T02TD2627E:240a-15: de nas sbyor ba dang po dang /
T02TD2627E:240a-17: las rgyal mchog bsgoms la dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bteg //
T02TD2627E:240a-18: lha'i gnas su tsandan la sogs pa'i zlum po dang /
T02TD2627E:240a-21: lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug gzhug bya /
T02TD2627E:240a-25: sgo bcad srung ba brtan par bya /
T02TD2627E:240a-26: mchod yon dbul ba sngon du 'gro bas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab /
T02TD2627E:240a-27: mchod pa rnams kyis mchod rang rang gi sngags ci mang du bzlas te /
T02TD2627E:240a-28: bum pa lhag par gnas pa dang slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang /
T02TD2627E:240a-29: phyi rol du gtor ma sbyin pa dang /
T02TD2627E:240a-32: mchod cing gsol ba gdab pa la sogs bya'o //
T02TD2627E:240a-34: gnas ni byin gyis brlab pa brtsam //
T02TD2627E:240a-35: zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
T02TD2627E:240a-36: byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas der ni //
T02TD2627E:240a-37: zhes bya ba ni de nyid du'o //
T02TD2627E:240a-38: phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02TD2627E:240a-39: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi sgo gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2627E:240a-40: phyogs kun mnyam pa grva dang bcas pas gru bzhi pa la phyogs kyi cha re re zhing sgo bzhi yod pas sgo bzhi pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2627E:240a-41: rta babs bzhi dag ldan pa dang //
T02TD2627E:240a-42: them skas bzhi yi phreng ba dang //
T02TD2627E:240a-43: seng ge ba glang rnams kyis brgyan //
T02TD2627E:240a-45: phyogs re re na rta babs re dang /
T02TD2627E:240a-47: seng ge ba glang rnams kyis mdzes par byas pas de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2627E:240a-48: dar dang lnga ldi do shal phreng //
T02TD2627E:240a-49: dril bu dang ni rdza mas brgyan //
T02TD2627E:240b-0: zhes bya ba @240b ni dar gyi lnga ldi dang /
T02TD2627E:240b-1: mu tig gi do shal dang /
T02TD2627E:240b-2: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02TD2627E:240b-3: dril bu g-yer kha la sogs pa dag /
T02TD2627E:240b-4: rnga mas mdzes par byas pa la de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2627E:240b-5: rdo rje rin chen padma dang //
T02TD2627E:240b-6: rgya gram pa yi phyag rgyas brgyan //
T02TD2627E:240b-7: zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs su rdo rje /
T02TD2627E:240b-10: byang du rgya gram gyi phyag rgyas brgyan cing sprul pa'o //
T02TD2627E:240b-11: srang bu rgyan dang ldan pa dang //
T02TD2627E:240b-12: phyi yi sgo khyud rnams kyis brgyan //
T02TD2627E:240b-13: zhes bya ba ni tshangs thig gnyis dang /
T02TD2627E:240b-18: lho phyogs kyi thig ste brgyad dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD2627E:240b-19: sgo khyud ni mdzes pa dang /
T02TD2627E:240b-20: rjes su mdzes pa zhes bya ba ni rtsig par ston pa'i cha gnyis te de rnams kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2627E:240b-21: dgu yi char ni bgos pa las //
T02TD2627E:240b-22: zhes bya ba ni nang gi dkyil 'khor gnas gru bzhi pa cha dgu dang ldan par bgos pa la so //
T02TD2627E:240b-23: sgo dang sgo khyud sum char bya //
T02TD2627E:240b-24: zhes bya ba ni sgo dang sgo khyud la cha chen gcig gnas par byas pas sum cha'i yang su ma char 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:240b-25: rdo rje srad bus thig gdab po //
T02TD2627E:240b-26: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje srang bur byin gyis brlabs pas gdab bo //
T02TD2627E:240b-27: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa //
T02TD2627E:240b-28: zhes bya ba ni dbus kyi yang dbus kyi thig gdab pa'o //
T02TD2627E:240b-29: chos kyi 'khor lo dra ba la //
T02TD2627E:240b-30: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang mtshon cha'i 'khor lo lta bu ma yin pa chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra ba'o //
T02TD2627E:240b-31: yang na lte ba dang rtsibs rten dang rtsibs dang gsum chos kyi 'khor lo gsum dang 'dra ba'o //
T02TD2627E:240b-32: yang na stong pa nyid bcu drug chos yin la de yang 'khor lo ni 'dra ba'o //
T02TD2627E:240b-33: lte bar bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug / ces bya ba ni lte ba dang /
T02TD2627E:240b-35: rtsibs bcu drug tu grangs nges pa'o //
T02TD2627E:240b-36: rim pa gsum dang ldan pa la //
T02TD2627E:240b-37: zhes bya ba'i lte ba'i rim pa dang /
T02TD2627E:240b-38: rtsibs rten gyi rim pa dang /
T02TD2627E:240b-39: rtsibs kyi rim pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2627E:240b-40: rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya ;
T02TD2627E:240b-42: rtsibs byang chub sems dpa'i gnas yin pas gtso bo'i gnas pas nyis 'gyur gyis chung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:240b-43: yang lte ba la bskor ba'i rim pa dang po ni rtsibs rten no //
T02TD2627E:240b-44: gnyis pa ni rtsibs yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:240b-45: rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya //
T02TD2627E:241a-2: /'di ni don slar yang gsal bar bya ste /
T02TD2627E:241a-3: sa yi cha yid du 'ong bar dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur gyi tshad la /
T02TD2627E:241a-4: mig byin gyis brlab cing bsgril ba dang rang rdo rje sems dpar bskyed de /
T02TD2627E:241a-5: grogs po rdo rje las su bskyed nas /
T02TD2627E:241a-6: dang po rang shar du bltas te tshangs thig gdab /
T02TD2627E:241a-7: de'i 'og tu byang du bltas te tshangs thig gnyis pa gdab /
T02TD2627E:241a-8: me'i gnas su gnas la shar gyi thig gdab /
T02TD2627E:241a-9: rlung gi phyogs su bltas te nub kyi thig kyang gdab /
T02TD2627E:241a-10: nyid nyid du 'dug ste shar du bltas te byang du thig kyang gdab /
T02TD2627E:241a-11: me'i mtshams su gnas nas lho phyogs kyi thig gdab /
T02TD2627E:241a-12: de nyid du 'dug ste rlung phyogs su bltas te tshangs thig gdab par bya /
T02TD2627E:241a-13: bde bral gyi phyogs su 'dug ste dbang ldan du kha bltas la zur thig gnyis pa gdab /
T02TD2627E:241a-14: de ltar gu bzhir gnas pa la cha chen bcu drug gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:241a-15: tha mar cha chen gnyis par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:241a-16: dbus kyi bcu po gnyis gnyis gdab /
T02TD2627E:241a-17: nyi shu rtsa bzhi dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD2627E:241a-18: de nas cha phra mo gdab par bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:241a-19: cha chen dgu ru gnas pa la //
T02TD2627E:241a-20: tha mar lnga ba'i phyed bor ba la lhag ma brgyad la bzhi bzhir bgo gsum pa dang de bzhin du lnga pa la yang ngo //
T02TD2627E:241a-21: phyi rol gyi sgo dang nang gi sgo khyud dang logs su 'gyur ro//
T02TD2627E:241a-22: lnga pa'i phyed nang du bor nas phyi rol gnyis su gdab /
T02TD2627E:241a-23: drug pa la cha bran bzhi btab la bdun pa'i nang rol cha chung gcig gdab bo //
T02TD2627E:241a-25: dgu pa dang bcu pa bcu gnyis pa bcu gnyis pa bzhi bzhir gdab bo //
T02TD2627E:241a-26: de nas tshon gyi thig gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:241a-27: lnga pa phyed kyi dang po gdab ;
T02TD2627E:241a-28: / de nas gnyis dor gsum pa gdab //
T02TD2627E:241a-29: drug pa la yang gdab par bya //
T02TD2627E:241a-30: dgu pa'i nang gi cha gcig gdab //
T02TD2627E:241a-31: yang gnyis dor la cha gcig gdab //
T02TD2627E:241a-32: yang gnyis bzhag la cha gcig gdab //
T02TD2627E:241a-33: ngos dang 'gram ma dang ya phugs 'gyur //
T02TD2627E:241a-34: lhag ma ni ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:241a-35: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa la /
T02TD2627E:241a-36: tshangs thig gi phyogs gcig tu bcu gnyis pa yongs su bskor bas rtsibs rten du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:241a-37: de'i nang du phyogs gcig gi bzhi pa btab bas ka bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:241a-38: rtsibs rten gyi phyir rol gsum dor ba la rtsibs drug tu bya ste /
T02TD2627E:241b-0: gtso bo'i gnas pas phyed kyis @241b chung ba nyis 'gyur du bya'o /
T02TD2627E:241b-1: bzhi pa yongs su bskor bas rdo rje'i phreng ba'o //
T02TD2627E:241b-3: dbus kyi phyogs su kun rig gi //
T02TD2627E:241b-5: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kha dog dung dang kunda dang /
T02TD2627E:241b-6: zla ba dang 'dra ba la mchog tu phul du byung ba'o //
T02TD2627E:241b-7: dbyibs dang gdan dang rgyan ci zhig ce na /
T02TD2627E:241b-8: zhal bzhi pa la dro rje yi //
T02TD2627E:241b-9: seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa dang /
T02TD2627E:241b-10: ting nge 'dzin phyag rgyar ldan pa dang //
T02TD2627E:241b-11: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa bri //
T02TD2627E:241b-14: zhal bzhi pa la zhes bya ba sku gcig la zhal bzhi'o /
T02TD2627E:241b-15: de yang 'og nas de'i spyan sngar ngan song kun 'dren shar phyogs la gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:241b-16: seng ge'i gdan la zhes pa seng ge dang padma dang zla ba la'o //
T02TD2627E:241b-17: rdo rje'i bzhugs pa dang zhes sbyar ro //
T02TD2627E:241b-18: 'dis ni rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs par bstan te //
T02TD2627E:241b-19: ting 'dzin phyag rgya ldan pa dang //
T02TD2627E:241b-20: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bri //
T02TD2627E:241b-21: zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang dbu rgyan la sogs pas brgyan par bri ba dang /
T02TD2627E:241b-22: gzhan pa dang dgod ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:241b-23: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de'i spyan sngar te /
T02TD2627E:241b-24: shar du ngan song kun sbyong ba'i rgyal po bri ste phyag gnyis ting nge 'dzin du bsnol ba kha dog ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD2627E:241b-25: zla brgyas dang ba mo'i mdog / rgyan ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD2627E:241b-26: rgyan rnams kun gyis lags rdzogs la //
T02TD2627E:241b-27: rgyal mtshon skyes bu gang ba bri //
T02TD2627E:241b-29: rgyal mchog gang bas mtshan dang dpe byad rang bzhin gyis brgyan par bstan la /
T02TD2627E:241b-30: snga mas ni gsal ba'i rgyan ston to //
T02TD2627E:241b-31: rgyab tu sh'akya'i rigs dbang po //
T02TD2627E:241b-32: gtso bo thub pa bri bar bya //
T02TD2627E:241b-33: zhes bya ba ni nub kyi phyogs su sh'akya thub pa kha dog dmar po chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya can bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:241b-34: g-yon dang g-yas kyi phyogs char ni //
T02TD2627E:241b-35: rgyal mchog rin chen me tog gnyis //
T02TD2627E:241b-36: zhes bya ba ni lho dang byang du'o //
T02TD2627E:241b-37: rin chen po me tog kha dog sngon po mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya can dang /
T02TD2627E:241b-38: byang phyogs su me tog cher rgyas kha dog ljang gu mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya can bri zhing dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:242a-0: 'di dag gi gdam yang glang po che la sogs pa ji skad du bshad pa bzhin shes par @242a * //
T02TD2627E:242a-2: / lo tsa na dang m'a ma k'i //
T02TD2627E:242a-3: de bzhin gos dkar sgrol ma rnams //
T02TD2627E:242a-4: rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma bzhin //
T02TD2627E:242a-5: grva yi phyogs ni kun du bri //
T02TD2627E:242a-10: sgrol ma rnams rang gi rigs gtso bo'i kha dog dang mtshan ma can dang /
T02TD2627E:242a-13: autpala rnams go rims bzhin du phyag g-yas na 'dzin cing /
T02TD2627E:242a-14: grva'i phyogs kun du bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:242a-15: rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du //
T02TD2627E:242a-16: rdo rje sems dpa' mchog / rdzu 'phrul che ba'i sems dpa' rnams //
T02TD2627E:242a-17: go rims bzhin du bri bar bya //
T02TD2627E:242a-18: zhes bya ba ni rtsibs bcu drug pa'i nang thams cad du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa 'bras bu'i byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams te go rims bzhin du bri bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:242a-19: mkhas pas l'a sye la sogs pa //
T02TD2627E:242a-20: mchod pa grva yi phyogs su bri //
T02TD2627E:242a-21: zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi mdog dang //
T02TD2627E:242a-22: dbyibs la bya bas l'a skye la sogs pa mchod pa brgyad nang gi grva dang /
T02TD2627E:242a-23: phyi rol gyi grvar bri zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:242a-24: sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad du //
T02TD2627E:242a-25: zhes bya ba ni shar la sogs pa bzhir /
T02TD2627E:242a-26: sgo ba bzhi ni bri bar bya //
T02TD2627E:242a-28: rta babs khyams ni thams cad du //
T02TD2627E:242a-29: zhes bya ba ni kyang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:242a-31: nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi rta babs kyi gnas dang /
T02TD2627E:242a-32: nang gi khyams nyid kyi nang du bri zhes bya ba ste bstan pa'o //
T02TD2627E:242a-34: byams pa la sogs bri bar bya //
T02TD2627E:242a-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te nang gi khyams nyid du byams pa la sogs pa bcu drug bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:242a-36: rta babs kyi gnas kyi khyams la /
T02TD2627E:242a-37: rim pa gsum gyi rang bzhin bri //
T02TD2627E:242a-38: zhes te dang po la 'khor ba gcod mdzad la sogs pa bcu drug bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:242a-40: nyan thos rgyal ba thams cad dang //
T02TD2627E:242a-42: nyid kyi gcung tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la sogs pa bcu drug bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:242a-43: gsum pa la nyon mongs 'joms pa 'jigs med gdung ba sel ba la sogs pa bcu gnyis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:242a-44: khro bo mngag pa pho nya rnams //
T02TD2627E:242a-45: bri bya yang na ming yang rung //
T02TD2627E:242b-0: zhes bya ba ni khro bo nyid mngag pa yang yin la pho nya yang yin pas @242b de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2627E:242b-1: bri'am yang na ming yang rung //
T02TD2627E:242b-2: zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba'am ming de yi ger dgod pa'ang rung ste phyag mtshan du dgod par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:242b-3: 'dis ni dkyil 'khor rgyal bo mchog bsgom pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:242b-4: shar phyogs kyi sgor 'jig rten gsum snang dang 'jig rten gsum 'jig go ;
T02TD2627E:242b-5: / lho phyogs kyi sgor 'jig rten gsum mthar byed dang 'jig rten gsum 'dul lo //
T02TD2627E:242b-6: nub phyogs kyi sgor bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang /
T02TD2627E:242b-8: byang phyogs kyi sgor mi g-yo mgon po dang rta mgrin bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:242b-9: phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du //
T02TD2627E:242b-10: zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa de nyid kyi phyi rol du mu ran dkar po bri zhing /
T02TD2627E:242b-12: gling bzhi po ni bri bar bya //
T02TD2627E:242b-13: 'dzam bu'i gling du tshangs pa bri //
T02TD2627E:242b-14: byang phyogs su ni dbang phyug che //
T02TD2627E:242b-15: shar dang nub kyi gling du ni //
T02TD2627E:242b-16: brgya byin gtogs 'dod thams cad kyang //
T02TD2627E:242b-17: 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya //
T02TD2627E:242b-19: shar phyogs su brgya byin 'khor dang bcas /
T02TD2627E:242b-20: lho phyogs su tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas /
T02TD2627E:242b-21: nub phyogs su gtog 'dod 'khor dang bcas /
T02TD2627E:242b-22: byang phyogs su ma h'a de ba 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:242b-23: gzhan rnams dag kyang de bzhin te //
T02TD2627E:242b-25: brgya byin nas brtsams te dbang ldan gyi mthar thug par 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:242b-26: de nyid kyi 'khor bshad pa lha min zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:242b-27: lha min zhes bya ba sum brtsegs dang /
T02TD2627E:242b-30: kun du snang ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:242b-31: dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:242b-32: nam mkha' lding gser mig la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:242b-33: gnod sbyin nor 'dzin la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:242b-34: srin po au ba karni pu rnal sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:242b-35: gzhan yang de bzhin du lto 'phye chen po dang /
T02TD2627E:242b-41: rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams dang /
T02TD2627E:242b-44: khro bo ma rungs pa 'tshe ba'i bgegs dang /
T02TD2627E:242b-45: bi na ya ka rnams dang /
T02TD2627E:242b-46: sems can kun la phan par byed ba'i dang srong skal ba chen po rnams dang /
T02TD2627E:242b-47: mkha' 'gro ma'i bud med rnams dang /
T02TD2627E:242b-48: srin po rnal 'byor ma rnams dang /
T02TD2627E:242b-49: 'byung po bzhi'i lha chen po rnams dang /
T02TD2627E:243a-4: dur khrod na gnas pa dang /
T02TD2627E:243a-5: grong khyer na gnas pa rnams kyang bri ste ming du gzhag pa dang /
T02TD2627E:243a-7: thig le tsam du bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2627E:243a-8: 'khor 'di rnams kyi kha dog la sogs ma bshad do//
T02TD2627E:243a-9: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2627E:243a-10: thig btab pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2627E:243a-11: tshon gyi las rnams byas nas /
T02TD2627E:243a-12: tshon dgye ba sngon du 'gro bas lha rnams gzhag cing 'khor rnams ni ming dang /
T02TD2627E:243a-14: thig le tsam du bris kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
T02TD2627E:243a-15: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mkhas pas gzhag ces thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:243a-16: de yang dkyil 'khor la mchod pa'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:243a-23: 'phan dang sna tshogs pa'i na bza' dang /
T02TD2627E:243a-24: gser las byas pa'i bya brgyad dang bcu drug gam ;
T02TD2627E:243a-25: sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang rung ba dang /
T02TD2627E:243a-26: dbang bskur ba'i bum pa chus bkang ba lnga dang /
T02TD2627E:243a-30: mdzes pa'i bshos la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2627E:243a-32: btung ba legs par sbyar ba dang /
T02TD2627E:243a-33: bca' ba sna tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2627E:243a-34: gnod sbyin srin po'i kha zas su gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2627E:243a-39: mi ma yin gyi kha zas su me tog dang /
T02TD2627E:243a-43: li kha ra dang bcas pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:243a-44: slob ma dang bdag dbang bskur ba'i don du rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dri'i chus rab tu bkang ba rdo rje sems dpa'i spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:243a-45: las thams cad pa'i bum pa ni shar phyogs kyi sgor gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:243a-46: bum pa lhag ma rnams ni phyi rol gyi 'khor yug rnams la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:243a-47: gzhan yang chos klog pa bzhi phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:243a-48: de ltar dkyil 'khor kun du legs par bkod nas dgongs ka'i dus nas brtsams te /
T02TD2627E:243a-49: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas lha rnams mchod pa ston te /
T02TD2627E:243a-50: khrus la sogs pa byas nas zhes bya ba ni dang por khrus bya /
T02TD2627E:243a-51: gnas bsrung rkang pa bkrus te nye reg bya /
T02TD2627E:243b-0: sngon du bdag @243b bsrung ba la sogs pa 'gro bas rgyan gdags dris byung //
T02TD2627E:243b-1: rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas bskor ba bya /
T02TD2627E:243b-2: chad pa dang lhag pa zhi bar bya /
T02TD2627E:243b-3: sgo phye la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:243b-4: de nyid dri dang phreng mchod phreng ba can //
T02TD2627E:243b-5: dri zhing kha bkang mchog mdzes pa //
T02TD2627E:243b-6: rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:243b-7: zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
T02TD2627E:243b-8: kyang zhes bya ba'i don ni bsdu pa ste /
T02TD2627E:243b-10: dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang las rgyal mchog bsgoms la /
T02TD2627E:243b-11: mchod pa gsang ba bzlas brjod bya //
T02TD2627E:243b-12: h'um mdzad nga rgyal gyis sgo phye //
T02TD2627E:243b-15: me tog thogs te sgo phyogs 'dug / gtso bo rgyal ba sras kyi 'khor //
T02TD2627E:243b-16: mang po rnams ni spyan drangs te //
T02TD2627E:243b-17: zhes bya ba ni gtso bo'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas dpung bar se gol brdab pa byas la /
T02TD2627E:243b-18: dza:h'um bam ho: zhes brjod de spyan drang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:243b-19: phyag rgya sngags dang bdag ldan pas //
T02TD2627E:243b-20: lcags kyu la sogs bdag sbyor zhing //
T02TD2627E:243b-22: bdag phyag rgya dang sngags dang ldan pa'i sgo nas lcags kyu la sogs pa'i las bya zhing ngo //
T02TD2627E:243b-23: ci zhig spyan drang zhe na /
T02TD2627E:243b-24: dza: h'um bam ho:thugs rje'i bdag / tshur gshegs zhes ni brjod nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:243b-26: gsang ba'i bcing ba bcings nas ni //
T02TD2627E:243b-27: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang /
T02TD2627E:243b-28: chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab pas /
T02TD2627E:243b-29: dam tshig gi bcing bas bcings zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:243b-30: phyag rgya gang zhig gis dgug pa la sogs pa'i las bya ba mdzub mo gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2627E:243b-31: mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du bya //
T02TD2627E:243b-32: zhes bya ba ni mkhrig ma gnyis bsnol te /
T02TD2627E:243b-33: mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du sbrel /
T02TD2627E:243b-34: mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du bya ba ni lcags kyu'o //
T02TD2627E:243b-35: mkhrig ma gnyis mdud pa byas pa //
T02TD2627E:243b-36: zhags pa bzhin du sbyar nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:243b-38: de la lcags sgrog tshul du bya //
T02TD2627E:243b-39: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis gdu bur bcings pa'o//
T02TD2627E:243b-40: mdzub mo gnyis slar nang du bkug nas bskyod par gyur na dbang du 'gyur zhes bya ba ni dril bu'o //
T02TD2627E:243b-41: de nas mtshan ma skyes te mgu nas ni //
T02TD2627E:243b-42: thog ma tha ma med par mngon sum mthong //
T02TD2627E:243b-44: de nas zhes bya ba ni bar ma chad pa ste /
T02TD2627E:243b-45: spyan drangs lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas /
T02TD2627E:244a-0: @244a * // bgegs bas la mchod pa dbul ba sngon du 'gro bas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab /
T02TD2627E:244a-1: dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs nyid la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:244a-2: mtshan ma skyes te zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:244a-3: bsgom pa dang bzlas pa bya bar bstan to //
T02TD2627E:244a-4: de'i 'bras bu khyad par mthong nas mgu nas ni /
T02TD2627E:244a-5: thog mtha' med par dngos po thams cad mngon par shes pa skyes pas mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:244a-6: de nas mthong ba las sogs pa'i lha rnams la /
T02TD2627E:244a-7: aarghas mchog bstan pas gsang la sogs pa yi //
T02TD2627E:244a-8: dbyangs snyan pa yi bstod pa'i lha rdzas kyi //
T02TD2627E:244a-9: mchog gi dam pa rnams kyis legs par mchod //
T02TD2627E:244a-11: aargha byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02TD2627E:244a-12: gsang ba l'a sye la sogs pa brgyad dang /
T02TD2627E:244a-13: bstod pa rnams dbyangs snyan pas 'bul zhing /
T02TD2627E:244a-14: lha rdzas kyi mchog dam pa gong du bshad pa bum pa la sogs pa rnams kyis legs par mchod do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2627E:244a-15: 'di skad du ston pa yin te /
T02TD2627E:244a-16: dang po rdo rje 'dzin ma dang dpal gyi lag gnyis lta bur bcings nas me tog gi phreng ba thogs te /
T02TD2627E:244a-17: yid kyis dkyil 'khor du zhugs la chad pa dang lhag bzhi par bya //
T02TD2627E:244a-18: me tog gi phreng ba dor /
T02TD2627E:244a-20: aom badzra sa tva h'um zhes kyang rgyun mi chad par bzlas pa bya /
T02TD2627E:244a-21: h'um mdzad kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas sgo bzhi phye /
T02TD2627E:244a-22: khrus byas dri dang phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan /
T02TD2627E:244a-24: zhes brjod de stan thog tu 'dug / lce lag pa byin gyis brlab pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD2627E:244a-25: srung pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rdzogs par bya la /
T02TD2627E:244a-26: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir nam mkhar dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:244a-27: de nas dril bu stong pa'i bdag tu brtag pa dang /
T02TD2627E:244a-28: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2627E:244a-29: sdig pa thams cad bshags pa la sogs pa lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod nas mi snang bar gyur pa dang /
T02TD2627E:244a-30: bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mngon du byas nas /
T02TD2627E:244a-31: 'og min du byin nas mngon par byang chub pa lngas rdo rje dbyings su bskyed de byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD2627E:244a-32: dbang bskur ba sngon du 'gro ba dang bcas te snying ga'i dkyil 'khor du /
T02TD2627E:244a-33: ngan song sbyong ba la sogs pa byas nas dkyil 'khor lus la brtags te /
T02TD2627E:244b-0: nam mkha'i @244b phyogs su gnas nas /
T02TD2627E:244b-1: ri rab dang khang pa brtsegs pa la sogs pa bskyed de thabs dang shes rab kyis bdag nyid zhu ba las /
T02TD2627E:244b-2: kun rig gi skur gyur nas /
T02TD2627E:244b-3: thugs ka'i zla ba la lha thams cad bskyed pa las tha mi dang par bsams te bsdu ba sngon du 'gro bas /
T02TD2627E:244b-4: phyag dang ched du brjod pa dang /
T02TD2627E:244b-5: dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas bying yis brlab nas yang ched du brjod pa dang /
T02TD2627E:244b-7: lcags kyu la sogs pas las bya zhing phyag rgya zhis rgyas btab nas /
T02TD2627E:244b-8: ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i las la sbyar te /
T02TD2627E:244b-9: mchod pa bsangs la bzlas par bya ba brjod cing /
T02TD2627E:244b-10: h'um mdzad kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas sgo phye ste /
T02TD2627E:244b-11: gtso bo'i sbyor bas sangs rgyas rnams bsdus la /
T02TD2627E:244b-12: lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas la /
T02TD2627E:244b-13: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal la /
T02TD2627E:244b-14: ra ba dang dra ba byas la /
T02TD2627E:244b-15: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcas de /
T02TD2627E:244b-16: bsrungs pas brtan par byas la /
T02TD2627E:244b-17: mchod yon dbul pa sngon du 'gro bas lha thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2627E:244b-20: phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab la //
T02TD2627E:244b-21: lha thams cad dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur te /
T02TD2627E:244b-22: sgom pa dang bzlas brjod mthong ba gsal ba dang /
T02TD2627E:244b-23: aargha la sogs pa mchod pa rnams lnga dang brgyad dang bstod pa dang /
T02TD2627E:244b-24: byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug la sogs pa rnams kyis pa ra na kham zhes bya bas dbul bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:244b-25: de nas 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma bya //
T02TD2627E:244b-26: sems can bkres shing skom la btung ba dang /
T02TD2627E:244b-27: phyogs na gnas pa rnams la rnam par brtag / de yi gtor ma ji ltar mthun par bya //
T02TD2627E:244b-28: zhes bya ba ni dngos grub gsol pa'i lha rnams mchod pa de nas 'byung po kun zhes bya ba sems can thams cad kyi dkar gsum gyis gtor ma byas te sems can bkres pa la bza' ba dang zhes sbyar /
T02TD2627E:244b-29: skom pa la btung ba dang /
T02TD2627E:244b-30: phyogs skyong phyogs na gnas pa rnams spyan drangs te gtor ma sbyin /
T02TD2627E:244b-31: 'khor rnams la de'i gtor ma ji ltar mthun zhing 'tsham par sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:244b-32: de yang phyi ril du gtor ma sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:244b-33: 'bras chan me tog chu dang bcas //
T02TD2627E:244b-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2627E:245a-0: aa k'a ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs @245a * //
T02TD2627E:245a-1: nas 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las 'byung ba ltar gtor ma sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:245a-2: de nas nye reg dang 'thor 'thung byas la /
T02TD2627E:245a-3: thab khung du me tog gis lha rnams spyan drangs la mar gyi dgang blugs la sogs pa phul la slar spyan drangs te /
T02TD2627E:245a-4: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi pa yi //
T02TD2627E:245a-5: rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che //
T02TD2627E:245a-6: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2627E:245a-7: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD2627E:245a-9: 'di tsam gyis ni slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga ston to //
T02TD2627E:245a-10: de nas sngags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:245a-11: de nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2627E:245a-12: sngags pas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi //
T02TD2627E:245a-13: gnas su slob ma yongs su smin par bya //
T02TD2627E:245a-14: 'gro la phan phyir myur du byang chub sems //
T02TD2627E:245a-15: de dag byang chub mchog sems bskyed du gzhug / de rnams byin brlab byang chub smon lam gdab //
T02TD2627E:245a-16: zab cing rgya che ba yi chos bsgrags la //
T02TD2627E:245a-17: srung ba byas nas brtul zhugs sngo ma gnas pa //
T02TD2627E:245a-18: zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba la phan pa'i phyir myur du byang chub tu 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2627E:245a-19: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2627E:245a-20: rdo rje sems dpar gyis byin brlab cing skyed pa dang /
T02TD2627E:245a-25: phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pas smon lam gdab pa dang /
T02TD2627E:245a-26: lhag par gnas pa'i dus su zab cing rgya che ba'i chos bsgrags la /
T02TD2627E:245a-27: srung skud btags pas srung ba byas nas lhag par gnas pa dang /
T02TD2627E:245a-28: dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i dus su brtul zhugs dang sngom pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:245a-29: rang gi kha nas sngags zlos gzhug par bya //
T02TD2627E:245a-30: dar la sogs pas mig gnyis g-yogs nas ni //
T02TD2627E:245a-31: rdo rje 'dzin mar dpal gyi lag gnyis sbyar //
T02TD2627E:245a-32: me tog rin chen la sogs de brgyan la //
T02TD2627E:245a-33: g-yon gyis lag pa bkang ste gzhug par bya //
T02TD2627E:245a-34: zhes bya ba ni slob dpon rang gi kha nas sngags brjod cing slob ma gzhug par bya ba dang /
T02TD2627E:245a-35: dar dang ras dmar pos stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs byas shing mig gnyis g-yogs nas rdo rje 'dzin mar dpal gyi padmor lag pa gnyis byas la /
T02TD2627E:245b-0: me tog la sogs pa'i phreng bas brgyan la yon @245b 'bul du gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:245b-1: gzhug pa'i sngags bstan pa ni sngags ni 'di rnams yin no zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:245b-2: sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
T02TD2627E:245b-3: de nas sngags 'dis me tog la sogs pa dor bar bya'o zhes bya'o zhes bya ba nas sa ma ya stvam zhes bya ba'i bar gyis me tog dang rin po che la sogs pa dor ba bstan to //
T02TD2627E:245b-4: dor nas ci zhig byed ce na /
T02TD2627E:245b-5: dngos grub tu 'gyur pa ni lha bzung zhing bsgrubs pas 'grub po zhes /
T02TD2627E:245b-6: me tog rin chen la sogs pa //
T02TD2627E:245b-7: gang la pa rigs kyi lha //
T02TD2627E:245b-8: gtso bo'i rigs de bsgrubs nas ni //
T02TD2627E:245b-9: dngos grub 'gyur te the tshom med //
T02TD2627E:245b-11: de nas sngags la mkhas pa yis //
T02TD2627E:245b-12: zhes bya ba slob dpon gyis /
T02TD2627E:245b-13: sngags 'dis dam tshig sbyin bar bya //
T02TD2627E:245b-15: sngags 'di brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:245b-17: h'um zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
T02TD2627E:245b-18: de nas 'dis dam tshig bsgrag par bya'o zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:245b-19: bdag gi de nyid dang ni sngags sogs de bzhin no //
T02TD2627E:245b-20: zhes bya ba'i bar 'di'i don ni /
T02TD2627E:245b-21: slob dpon gyi dam tshig bsgrag par bya ba dang /
T02TD2627E:245b-22: 'di ni dmyal pa'i chu yin te //
T02TD2627E:245b-23: dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed //
T02TD2627E:245b-24: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub thob //
T02TD2627E:245b-26: yang cis te dam tshig 'das na sngar zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi sems dpa' gshegs shing khros pas kyang rang gis brtsams pa bu dang tsha bo la sogs pa brlag par mdzad de /
T02TD2627E:245b-27: skyon de ltar gnas pa de bas na /
T02TD2627E:245b-28: rtag tu khyod kyis dam tshig dang bla ma'i bka' mos pas bsrungs pa bya'o //
T02TD2627E:245b-29: bsrung bar bya ba de nyid gang yin na srog gcod pa dang /
T02TD2627E:245b-30: ma byin par len pa dang /
T02TD2627E:245b-32: 'dod pa log par spyod pa dang /
T02TD2627E:245b-34: sha la sogs pa bza' ba spang //
T02TD2627E:245b-35: sems can gnod par sbyor ba rnams kyang mi bya /
T02TD2627E:245b-37: dus kun du byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02TD2627E:245b-41: lha dang bla ma mi spang /
T02TD2627E:245b-44: lha la phul pa'i rnying pa dang /
T02TD2627E:245b-47: sngags dang lha la mi smad /
T02TD2627E:245b-48: gzhan la gnod pa drag po mi bskul /
T02TD2627E:245b-49: mu stegs can la mi smad /
T02TD2627E:246a-1: chos la som nyi dang yid gnyis mi bya /
T02TD2627E:246a-2: bdag gi de nyid dang sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa la yid gnyis mi bya ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:246a-3: 'di'i slar yang bsgrub pa'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2627E:246a-4: bslab pa lnga yongs su gzung ba'am /
T02TD2627E:246a-5: dge sbyong ngam dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su gzung ba lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas pas /
T02TD2627E:246a-6: slob dpon gyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:246a-7: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02TD2627E:246a-8: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2627E:246a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa //
T02TD2627E:246a-10: mgon po de ring bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2627E:246a-11: dam tshig chen po de nyid gsol //
T02TD2627E:246a-12: sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la gsol //
T02TD2627E:246a-13: de nas yol ba'i mthar rdo rje srung ba yongs su bzlas pa'i ras shin tu dmar bas stod g-yogs smad g-yogs bskon zhing /
T02TD2627E:246a-14: sgo srung bzlas pa'i dar dkar gyi gdong g-yogs bcings la phyag byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2627E:246a-15: me tog thogs pas yang slob dpon la phyag byas la /
T02TD2627E:246a-17: rjes su yi rang ba dang bskul ba dang /
T02TD2627E:246a-18: gsol ba gdab pa yang byas la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:246a-19: gtso bo bdag la sdom pa gsol //
T02TD2627E:246a-20: thub pa'i nyi ma lus pa ;
T02TD2627E:246a-21: / sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2627E:246a-22: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD2627E:246a-23: slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la //
T02TD2627E:246a-24: sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba //
T02TD2627E:246a-26: thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog / gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi //
T02TD2627E:246a-27: gsang ba'i rigs mtho thams cad du //
T02TD2627E:246a-28: slob dpon bdag ni 'jug par mdzod //
T02TD2627E:246a-29: mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2627E:246a-30: skal ba chen po bdag la gsol //
T02TD2627E:246a-31: mtshan rnams kun gyis rab brgyan cing //
T02TD2627E:246a-32: dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD2627E:246a-33: sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba //
T02TD2627E:246a-34: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2627E:246a-35: dbang bskur chen po rmad byung ba //
T02TD2627E:246a-36: sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir //
T02TD2627E:246a-37: bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur //
T02TD2627E:246a-38: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2627E:246a-39: de nas slob dpon gyis rigs la gsol ba gdab ste /
T02TD2627E:246a-40: che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni //
T02TD2627E:246a-41: byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa //
T02TD2627E:246b-0: dam tshig mchog dang gsang ba @246b yi ;
T02TD2627E:246b-2: de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:246b-3: gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa //
T02TD2627E:246b-4: gsang ba chen po 'dzin par ni //
T02TD2627E:246b-5: bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam //
T02TD2627E:246b-6: des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya //
T02TD2627E:246b-8: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD2627E:246b-10: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02TD2627E:246b-11: ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:246b-12: yang aom sarba yo ga tsitta au tp'a da y'a mi zhes bya bas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas /
T02TD2627E:246b-13: snying gar rdo rje bzhag nas /
T02TD2627E:246b-14: su ra re sa ma ya stam ho badzra siddhi ya th'a su kham /
T02TD2627E:246b-16: zhes zlos shing rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas /
T02TD2627E:246b-17: rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2627E:246b-18: rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhis snying ga la sogs pa bzhir byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2627E:246b-19: dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod la yon gyi mchog phul te /
T02TD2627E:246b-20: phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pas dbang bskur la /
T02TD2627E:246b-21: sa ma ya stam zhes bya bas rdo rje 'dzin ma dpal gyi lag pa gnyis su shes par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:246b-22: me tog gi phreng ba thogs la /
T02TD2627E:246b-23: aom badzra aa dhi tishtha h'um /
T02TD2627E:246b-24: aom badzra sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD2627E:246b-25: aom badzra pra be sha badzra h'um /
T02TD2627E:246b-26: aa sa me tri sa me ma h'a sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba 'dis gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:246b-27: de nas sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas snying gar phye la /
T02TD2627E:246b-28: rang gi snying ga na gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus na yi ge aa rdo rje dmar po'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang ldan par bsams nas /
T02TD2627E:246b-29: slob ma'i snying ga na gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su blos bcug la lus thams cad gang bar bsams shing /
T02TD2627E:246b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la /
T02TD2627E:246b-31: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig ces smras gzhug go //
T02TD2627E:246b-32: de nas sems ma rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2627E:246b-33: 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste //
T02TD2627E:246b-34: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
T02TD2627E:246b-35: rdo rje ye shes bla med 'di //
T02TD2627E:246b-36: da lta nyid du 'bab par shog / ces brjod du bcug la /
T02TD2627E:246b-37: badzra aa be sha aa aa aa aa a'a ;
T02TD2627E:246b-38: lan brgya'i bar du bzlas shing dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:246b-39: de nas snang ba dri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:246b-40: me tog gi phreng ba h'um pra t'i tstsha badzra h'um zhes bya bas dor /
T02TD2627E:246b-42: sangs rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD2627E:246b-43: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pas dor ro //
T02TD2627E:246b-44: de nas mgo la bcing ba ni //
T02TD2627E:246b-45: aom pra ti grihna sva mi mam /
T02TD2627E:247a-1: ma h'a ba la zhes bya'o //
T02TD2627E:247a-2: dam tshig bsgrag par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:247a-3: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD2627E:247a-5: bdag gi de nyid dang ni sngags sogs de bzhin no //
T02TD2627E:247a-7: de nas aom badzra h'a spyod gha ta ya h'um zhes bya bas gdong g-yogs dgrol /
T02TD2627E:247a-8: aom badzra p'a shya h'um zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor bstan /
T02TD2627E:247a-9: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya snying gar dgrol lo //
T02TD2627E:247a-10: de ltar slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa bshad nas /
T02TD2627E:247a-11: dbang bskur bar bya ba'i phyir mos pa brtan pa dang ldan pas dam bca' zhing /
T02TD2627E:247a-12: sarba bid kyis ji ltar dbang bskur te ;
T02TD2627E:247a-13: / bum pa la sogs ji snyed mang thogs pas //
T02TD2627E:247a-14: bcu po rnams kyis dbang bcu ci dgar bskur //
T02TD2627E:247a-15: de nas lag tu dril bu rdo rje sbyin //
T02TD2627E:247a-16: 'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun thogs la //
T02TD2627E:247a-17: mi dbang dbang phyug 'khor lo thogs pa dang //
T02TD2627E:247a-18: sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang ni bskur bar bya //
T02TD2627E:247a-19: zhes bya ba ni sdom pa 'dzin pas mos pa brtan pa dang ldan par dam bcas nas /
T02TD2627E:247a-20: aom sarba bid aa bhi shinytsa zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2627E:247a-21: ji ltar gsungs pa'i bum pas dbang bskur zhing /
T02TD2627E:247a-22: gzhan yang dbu rgyan dang dar dpyangs la sogs pa'i phreng ba dang /
T02TD2627E:247a-27: thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes rnams kyis dbang bskur ba ji snyed thogs pas /
T02TD2627E:247a-28: bcu po rnams kyis dbang bcu ci dgar bskur ro //
T02TD2627E:247a-29: de nas lag pa g-yon du dril bu g-yas su rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' dang stong pa nyid du brtags la sbyin /
T02TD2627E:247a-30: 'khor lo rin po che la sogs pa rin po che sna bdun thogs la /
T02TD2627E:247a-31: aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa zhes brjod cing dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:247a-33: mi dbang dbang phyug 'khor lo ste //
T02TD2627E:247a-34: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'thob par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2627E:247a-35: 'dis ni rin po che sna bdun gyi 'bras bu bstan to //
T02TD2627E:247a-36: thams cad kyi thun mong gi 'bras bu ni /
T02TD2627E:247a-37: sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang ni bskur bar bya //
T02TD2627E:247a-39: de nas bka'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2627E:247a-40: las kyi dbang bskur ba yang sbyin te phyis bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:247a-41: de ltar na dbang nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:247a-42: ci'i phyir ji lta bu zhig ce na /
T02TD2627E:247b-0: 'khrud par byed pas brtan @247b par byed pa'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo dang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon la bya'o //
T02TD2627E:247b-1: sngags bsgrub phyir du mos ldan slob ma la //
T02TD2627E:247b-2: sngags pas bka' ni rab tu bgro bar bya //
T02TD2627E:247b-3: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2627E:247b-4: brtser ldan dngos grub myur du 'grub //
T02TD2627E:247b-5: ces bya ba'i bar gyis sngags bsgrub pa'i phyir slob dpon gyis bka' rab tu bsgo zhing /
T02TD2627E:247b-6: slob mas bla ma la yon phul te dam tshig sbyin pa bstan te go sla ba'i phyir ma bshad do //
T02TD2627E:247b-7: slar yang 'di dag gi don bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:247b-8: shar phyogs kyi sgo dang nye bar padma dkar po la gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa legs par bris la /
T02TD2627E:247b-9: de la slob ma rang gis lhar bskyed nas /
T02TD2627E:247b-14: mar mes yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2627E:247b-15: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'don cing /
T02TD2627E:247b-16: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs la /
T02TD2627E:247b-17: aom sarba bid aa bhi shinytsa mam /
T02TD2627E:247b-19: spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:247b-20: de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bum pa dang /
T02TD2627E:247b-21: shar phyogs kyi ngan song sbyong ba'i bum pas dbang bskur zhing /
T02TD2627E:247b-22: aom badzra ka la sha aa bhi shinytsa h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2627E:247b-23: gtso bo'i bum pas dbang bskur zhing /
T02TD2627E:247b-24: buddha ka la sha aa bhi shinytsa aom zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2627E:247b-25: rin chen tog gi bum pa dang /
T02TD2627E:247b-26: aom ratna ka la sha aa bhi shinytsa tr'am zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2627E:247b-27: sh'akya'i dbang po'i bum pa dang /
T02TD2627E:247b-28: aom padma ka la sha aa bhi shinytsa hr'i:zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2627E:247b-29: me tog cher rgyas kyi bum pa dang /
T02TD2627E:247b-30: aom karma ka la sha aa bhi shinytsa aa:zhes bya bas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:247b-31: de nas rin po che la sogs pa'i rgyu las byas pa'i dbu rgyan dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs sam bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gtso bo yin na rin po che'i myu gu /
T02TD2627E:247b-32: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD2627E:247b-37: aom dang aa bhi shinytsa brjod pas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:247b-38: de nas rin po che la sogs pa'i phreng bas dbang bskur ba /
T02TD2627E:247b-39: aom ratna m'a le aa bhi shinytsa tram tram tram tram /
T02TD2627E:247b-40: aom phat b'a lam pa na aa bhi shinytsa tram zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:247b-41: de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2627E:247b-42: aom buddha mu dra aa bhi shinytsa aom /
T02TD2627E:247b-44: aom badzra mu dra aa bhi shinytsa h'um shar du'o //
T02TD2627E:247b-45: lho nub byang rnams su tr'am hr'i: aa:gzhan 'gre /
T02TD2627E:248a-2: de nas dang po'i rdo rje bcings la /
T02TD2627E:248a-3: aom badzra n'a ma aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD2627E:248a-4: aom tram hri aa:zhes bya ba brjod de /
T02TD2627E:248a-5: ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2627E:248a-6: las kyi rdo rje sna tshogs lag tu byin la /
T02TD2627E:248a-7: aom karma badzra aa bhi shinytsa aa:zhes bya bas las kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2627E:248a-8: chos kyi 'khor lo rkang ba'i bar du bcug la /
T02TD2627E:248a-9: aom badzra tsakra aa bhi shinytsa h'um bhr'um /
T02TD2627E:248a-10: aom tsakra aa dhi pa ti stvam /
T02TD2627E:248a-11: aa bhi shinytsa aom h'um tram hri aa:zhes gsum du rigs kyi dbye bas brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:248a-13: de nas rdo rje dril bu gnyis 'khyud pa'i tshul du bzung la /
T02TD2627E:248a-14: aom badzra dha ra na aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD2627E:248a-15: rin po che'i dril bu rin chen rdo rje dang 'khyud pa /
T02TD2627E:248a-16: aom ratna dha ra na aa bhi shinytsa tram /
T02TD2627E:248a-17: padmo'i rdo rje dril bu dang /
T02TD2627E:248a-18: padma dha ra na aa bhi shinytsa hri /
T02TD2627E:248a-19: sna tshogs rdo rje dril bu dang /
T02TD2627E:248a-20: karma dha ra na aa bhi shinytsa aa:/
T02TD2627E:248a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i dril bu dang /
T02TD2627E:248a-22: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ratna aa bhi shinytsa aom zhes bya ba rigs tha dad pa'i sgo nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:248a-23: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gu dya aa bhi shinytsa aom zhes brjod de sku'i gsang ba /
T02TD2627E:248a-24: aom badzra gu hya aa bhi shinytsa h'um zhes brjod de thugs kyi gsang ba /
T02TD2627E:248a-25: aom ratna gu hya aa bhi shinytsa tram zhes brjod de /
T02TD2627E:248a-27: aom padma gu hya aa bhi shinytsa hri zhes brjod de /
T02TD2627E:248a-29: aom karma gu hya aa bhi shinytsa aa aa aa zhes brjod de /
T02TD2627E:248a-31: gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba sbyin pa'o //
T02TD2627E:248a-32: de nas chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa nyid bstan cing /
T02TD2627E:248a-33: aom badzny'a sa ma ya aa bhi shinytsa h'um aa /
T02TD2627E:248a-34: zhes bya bas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:248a-35: de nas ras sam gro ga la sogs pa la /
T02TD2627E:248a-36: 'khor lo rin po che la sogs pa bdun bris la /
T02TD2627E:248a-37: aom ratna aa bhi shinytsa zhes dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2627E:248a-38: de nas lag pa g-yas par rdo rje byin la /
T02TD2627E:248a-39: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02TD2627E:248a-40: di ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02TD2627E:248a-41: sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir //
T02TD2627E:248a-42: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
T02TD2627E:248a-43: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinytsa mi ti shtha badzra sa ma ya stvam zhes bya bas sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:248a-44: aa:zhes bya bas dril bu bskyed la sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:248a-45: de na gdengs ka'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:248b-0: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta a'a dzny'a @248b te d'a si mi gri hna badzra su siddha ye /
T02TD2627E:248b-3: yang lag tu rdo rje byin la /
T02TD2627E:248b-4: las kyi dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2627E:248b-5: aom sarba karma ni ku ru buddha n'a ma h'um zhes brjod de brtul zhugs sbyin no //
T02TD2627E:248b-6: de ltar dbang nyi shu rtsa gcig byin nas slob dpon du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:248b-7: de nas slob dpon dang slob mas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mchod de slob ma rnams yo byad kyis tshim par byas nas bstod cing mchod la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ste /
T02TD2627E:248b-8: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bkrol nas gshegs su gsol te /
T02TD2627E:248b-10: chu bo chen por dor nas bskor ba bya /
T02TD2627E:248b-11: sprul pa'i tshogs lus la bsdu zhing ci bder gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:248b-12: dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2627E:248b-13: de ltar dbang dang dam tshig thob pa rnams la dngos grub la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:248b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:248b-15: de nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2627E:248b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2627E:248b-18: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis /
T02TD2627E:248b-19: lha'i 'jig rten dang bcas pa rnams kyi don dang /
T02TD2627E:248b-23: sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di zhes bya ba smos te 'di sgrub pas na bsgrub pa ste /
T02TD2627E:248b-24: byed pa'am rgyu'i cho ga zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2627E:248b-25: ras la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2627E:248b-26: ras kha tshar bzang po rin la rtsegs pa med par nyos la /
T02TD2627E:248b-27: sbyin med pa'i tshon rtsi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kun rig sngar bshad pa bzhin du seng ge'i gdan la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD2627E:248b-28: zla ba ltar dkar ba zhal bzhi pa ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa /
T02TD2627E:248b-29: rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:248b-30: g-yas phyogs su ngan song sbyong ba rgyan kun gyis brgyan pa ba mo'i mdog lta bu ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya can bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:248b-31: g-yon phyogs su sh'akya thub pa mdog dmar po chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya can bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:248b-32: ngan song sbyong ba'i 'og tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdog zla ba lta bu phyag g-yon na padma bsnam pa phyag g-yas pa padma kha 'byed pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:249a-0: sh'akya thub pa'i 'og tu phyag na rdo rje mdog nam mkha' lta bu g-yas na rdo rje bsnams shing thugs kar @249a * //
T02TD2627E:249a-2: de gnyis kyi bar du sman gyi lha mdog sngon po phyag g-yon na 'bras bu aa ru ra bsnams pa g-yas mchog sbyin can no //
T02TD2627E:249a-3: rta mgrin dang khams gsum rnam rgyal gnyis mdog dmar po dang sngon po rang gi lha la brten par bri /
T02TD2627E:249a-8: sgrol ma rnams rang gi spyan la sogs pa lag tu thogs pa bri /
T02TD2627E:249a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:249a-10: lha mo ni sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:249a-11: de dag gi 'og padma'i rdzing bu dang ;
T02TD2627E:249a-12: de'i nang na chu srin dang /
T02TD2627E:249a-19: srog chags du ma yod pa dang /
T02TD2627E:249a-20: de nas chu las skyes pa'i me tog du ma yod pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:249a-28: de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po nyid thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul gyis 'dug pa bri /
T02TD2627E:249a-29: de nas ri mo'i gzugs de bsnyen pa dang bcas pas mngon par mchod de /
T02TD2627E:249a-30: sgrub pa po bdag nyid kyis rab tu gnas par bya zhing mnga' phul /
T02TD2627E:249a-31: spyan dbye bar bya ste 'di ni 'di nyid kyi cho ga las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:249a-32: bden pas byin gyis brlab pa dmigs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bden pa ste spyan dbye ba'o //
T02TD2627E:249a-33: byin gyis brlab par dmigs pa ste mtshan ma la'o //
T02TD2627E:249a-34: de nas ci ste mtshan ma zhig mthong na ni myur du dngos grub thong 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:249a-35: 'on te ma mthong na ni ring mo zhig nas dngos grub tu 'gyur zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma las skal ba dang ldan pa dang mi ldan pa'i las so //
T02TD2627E:249a-36: mtshan ma gang zhig yin zhe na /
T02TD2627E:249a-37: bzhad pa dang ni rnga sgra dang //
T02TD2627E:249a-38: dril bu'i sgra dang 'brug sgra dang //
T02TD2627E:249a-39: zhes bya ba mchog gi mtshan ma dang /
T02TD2627E:249a-40: de bzhin dge slong bram zhe dang //
T02TD2627E:249a-41: zhes bya ba'i 'bring gi mtshan ma dang /
T02TD2627E:249a-42: 'bras bu mthong na zhes bya ba mtshan ma tha ma las go rims bzhin du myur du mchog dang bar dang tha mar 'grub ces bya'o //
T02TD2627E:249a-43: de nas gzugs de zhes bya ba la sogs pas bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa dang dngos grub ston te /
T02TD2627E:249a-44: gzugs byin gyis brlabs te zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:249a-45: ye shes sems dpa' bcug pas so //
T02TD2627E:249b-0: @249b sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te dbang bskur nas zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2627E:249b-1: ci bdog pa yis mchod par bya //
T02TD2627E:249b-2: rtag tu mngon sum 'dug nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:249b-3: zhes bya ba ni mchod ba sna tshogs kyis mchod cing /
T02TD2627E:249b-4: rnal 'byor gyis dus su rgyun mi 'chad par spyan sngar 'dug ces ston to //
T02TD2627E:249b-5: 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal gyis //
T02TD2627E:249b-6: bdag srung la sogs byas nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:249b-7: bdag gi de nyid dran byed cing //
T02TD2627E:249b-8: zhes bya ba ni h'um bzhi'i sngags kyis bdag srung ba dang /
T02TD2627E:249b-9: khrus kyi cho ga sngon du 'gro bas /
T02TD2627E:249b-10: dkyil 'khor lus la brtags pa'i mthar thug pa byas la 'bum phrag gsum mam yang na drug /
T02TD2627E:249b-11: dngos grub mtshan ma ma byung bar du bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:249b-12: de nas dben pa'i gnas su ni //
T02TD2627E:249b-13: brgyad brgya nyid du tshang bar bya //
T02TD2627E:249b-16: gnas dben par snga ma nyid kyi chogs brgyad brgyar sngags gug skyed dang /
T02TD2627E:249b-17: tsheg bar la sogs pa chad lhag med bar bzlas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:249b-18: de ltar bsnyen pa bstan nas /
T02TD2627E:249b-19: de nas bzlas pa'i mjug tu ni //
T02TD2627E:249b-20: dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams la //
T02TD2627E:249b-21: mchod pa rgya cher byas nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:249b-22: mtshan gcig thog thab bzlas pa bya //
T02TD2627E:249b-23: zhes bya bas sgrub pa bstan te /
T02TD2627E:249b-24: bzlas pa rdzogs pa'i mjug tu dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du bsams la /
T02TD2627E:249b-25: ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pas mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas nas 'bras bu bstan pa ste /
T02TD2627E:249b-26: ci ste gtso bo'am de yi sras //
T02TD2627E:249b-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
T02TD2627E:249b-28: ci ste gtso bo dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'jig rten pa mthong ba las dngos grub rab 'bring gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:249b-29: phyag 'tshal nas dngos grub blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:249b-30: gal te 'bring ngam tha ma'i dngos grub mig sman la sogs pa yin na bla ma dang dkon mchog la skal ba re re phul nas lhag ma bdag spyad /
T02TD2627E:249b-31: dbul ba'i zhing med na bdag nyid kyis spyad /
T02TD2627E:249b-32: mchog gi dngos grub yin na /
T02TD2627E:249b-33: sems can la phan par brtson par bskal pa du mar gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:249b-34: ci ste dngos grub 'thob na las thams cad 'grub par gyur te /
T02TD2627E:249b-35: gnod sbyin rgyu skar gdon la sogs pa tshig tsam gyis bran bzhin du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:250a-1: byas pas sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa thabs sla bas grol ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:250a-2: de nas zhes pa la sogs pas bstan to //
T02TD2627E:250a-3: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD2627E:250a-4: bcom ldan 'das sdig pa bgyis pas sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams ji ltar na dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal ba'i spang ba'i slad du bsgrub par bgyis zhes bya ba ni shi ba rnams ji ltar sbyang zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2627E:250a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD2627E:250a-6: lha'i dbang po nyon cig ; sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can sdig pa chen po byed pa de dag ci nas kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las thabs sla bas grol bar 'gyur ba nyon cig ces bya ba ni nyon la zung shig pa'i don to //
T02TD2627E:250a-8: de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni //
T02TD2627E:250a-9: de ltar yang na bum pa la //
T02TD2627E:250a-10: brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni //
T02TD2627E:250a-11: dbang bskur ba ni rab tu brtag / ces bya ba sngar bshad pa bzhin du /
T02TD2627E:250a-12: bsnyen pa dang sa'i cho ga dang /
T02TD2627E:250a-13: lha rnams mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2627E:250a-14: bum pa la sngags bzlas te /
T02TD2627E:250a-15: lho sgo'i cho ga sngon du 'gro bas dkyil 'khor du bcug cing sngar bshad pa bzhin du dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:250a-17: de nas sdig pa kun sbyangs te //
T02TD2627E:250a-18: dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal las //
T02TD2627E:250a-19: de ni myur du thar par 'gyur //
T02TD2627E:250a-20: sdig las rnam par grol bdag nyid //
T02TD2627E:250a-21: dag par gyur pa'i lha rnams kyi ;
T02TD2627E:250a-22: / rigs su skye bar gyur nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:250a-23: de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas dang //
T02TD2627E:250a-25: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas //
T02TD2627E:250a-28: de yang ci zhig las dbang bskur zhe na /
T02TD2627E:250a-29: de yi gzugs brnyan bri ba ni //
T02TD2627E:250a-30: gur gum gyis ni ming byang rus //
T02TD2627E:250a-33: ngan song kun gyi 'jigs chen las //
T02TD2627E:250a-34: sems can rnams ni dgrol ba'i phyir //
T02TD2627E:250a-37: sngags mkhan gzhan la phan brtson zhing //
T02TD2627E:250a-38: snying rje can gyis dang bskur ro //
T02TD2627E:250b-1: des ni thabs dang po bstan to //
T02TD2627E:250b-3: de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni //
T02TD2627E:250b-4: sngags dang phyag rgyas de dbang bskur //
T02TD2627E:250b-5: lha yi gzugs su brtags nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:250b-6: mchod rten dbus su gzhag par bya //
T02TD2627E:250b-7: zhes bya ba ni gzugs brnyan la sogs pa mdun du gzhag la /
T02TD2627E:250b-8: lce dang lag pa byin gyis brlab pa nas bzung ste srung ba'i 'khor lo dang /
T02TD2627E:250b-9: nam mkhar dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang mchod pa rnams kyis mchod de /
T02TD2627E:250b-10: ji lta ba'i go rims kyis mngon par byang chub pa mngon du byas nas /
T02TD2627E:250b-11: phab ste dkyil 'khor bsre ba byas la gzugs brnyan la sogs pa la 'od zer gyis shes pa bcug ste /
T02TD2627E:250b-12: sdig pa 'joms pa la sogs sngon du 'gro bas rang gi snying gar ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste /
T02TD2627E:250b-13: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2627E:250b-14: sngags dang phyag rgyas dbang bskur te mchod rten gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:250b-17: rang gi lha'am lha gzhan gyi //
T02TD2627E:250b-18: snying po snying gar bris nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:250b-19: lha 'dra bar ni sems bskyed de //
T02TD2627E:250b-20: khyim gyi nang du gzhag par bya //
T02TD2627E:250b-21: zhes bya ba ni dbang dang dam tshig thob pa'i rnal 'byor ba shi bar gyur na /
T02TD2627E:250b-22: shes na rang gi lha'i snying po snying gar bri /
T02TD2627E:250b-23: lha dang 'dra bas sems kyis brtag / ma shes na lhag gang yang rung ba'i snying po snying gar bri /
T02TD2627E:250b-24: lha dang 'dra bas sems kyis brtag / khyim mam dur khrod dam mchod pa'i nang du mchod pa'i nang du gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:250b-25: 'di ni thabs sla ba gsum pa'o //
T02TD2627E:250b-28: gur gum bzang pos sngags bris la //
T02TD2627E:250b-29: rim gyis 'bum ni tshang tsam du //
T02TD2627E:250b-30: mchod rten las ni rab tu bya //
T02TD2627E:250b-31: sdig can sdig ni zad bya'i phyir //
T02TD2627E:250b-32: bye ba snyed ni tshang bar bya //
T02TD2627E:250b-33: de nas ni nges par dmyal gnas nas //
T02TD2627E:250b-34: de byas pa ni grol bar 'gyur /
T02TD2627E:250b-36: // yi dags byol song sdug bsngal las //
T02TD2627E:250b-37: grol nas lha yi nang du skye //
T02TD2627E:250b-41: aom sarba bid ces bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:250b-42: bha zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa gur gum bzang pos ras sam gro gnag por byas pa la 'bum tshang bar tsee tya byas te /
T02TD2627E:250b-44: sdig pa zad par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2627E:250b-45: bye ba snyed du gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:251a-0: de ni dmyal ba dang byol song @251a * //
T02TD2627E:251a-1: dang yi dags las grol te lha'i gnas su skye'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:251a-2: 'di'i don ni cho ga nyid las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:251a-5: de yi ming nas brjod nas ni //
T02TD2627E:251a-6: 'bum phrag stong ngam yang na ni //
T02TD2627E:251a-7: brgya phrag stong du tshang ba dang //
T02TD2627E:251a-8: bye ba snyed du rab bzlas na //
T02TD2627E:251a-9: lha yi gnas su skye bar nges //
T02TD2627E:251a-10: zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba dang po dang dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang /
T02TD2627E:251a-11: las kyi rgyal po mchog dang /
T02TD2627E:251a-12: sgo dbye ba sngon du 'gro bas de'i ming thog mar smos te /
T02TD2627E:251a-13: gong du bshad pa'i sngags 'bum phrag stong dang brgya phrag stong tshang ba dang /
T02TD2627E:251a-14: bye ba snyed du bzlas te dkyil 'khor chen po la mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas mtshan thog thag bzlas na lha'i gnas su nges par skye zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:251a-17: de yi ming nas brjod nas ni //
T02TD2627E:251a-19: yang na stong phrag brgya snyed du //
T02TD2627E:251a-20: sbyin sreg byas par gyur na ni //
T02TD2627E:251a-22: thab khung ji lta ba bzhin du brkos te /
T02TD2627E:251a-23: rdzas gzhag cing bsang ba byas nas rang lhar bskyed de /
T02TD2627E:251a-24: chos kyi yi ge las thab khung byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2627E:251a-25: bha dang sha bkod ba'i bud shing brtsigs te rgyun bzhag gi me sbar nas me lha spyan drang ba sngon du 'gro bas dgang blugs la sogs pa phul te 'bar ba dang tha mi dad par 'gyur pa'i me lha'am /
T02TD2627E:251a-26: yang na me lha'i snying gar rdo rje sems dpa' la dgang blugs la sogs pa phul ba sngags dang ming spel te /
T02TD2627E:251a-27: til gyi sbyin sreg mkhas pas 'bum phrag brgya 'am /
T02TD2627E:251a-28: brgya phrag stong snyed du sbyin sreg byas la /
T02TD2627E:251a-29: lha rnams gshegs su gsol ba'i cho ga byas nas ni zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:251a-31: dmyal ba chen por gyur pa yi //
T02TD2627E:251a-32: sdig pa de las thar bar 'gyur //
T02TD2627E:251a-34: yang dus ji srid du zhe na //
T02TD2627E:251a-35: ji srid mtshan ma shin tu ni //
T02TD2627E:251a-37: mtshan ma yang dag 'byung bar du //
T02TD2627E:251a-38: zhes bya ba de srid du'o //
T02TD2627E:251a-40: til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams dang //
T02TD2627E:251a-41: ba yi 'o mar ldan pa dang /
T02TD2627E:251a-42: dri yis bskus pa'i yam shing gis //
T02TD2627E:251a-43: cho ga bzhin du sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD2627E:251a-45: sdig pa las thar ba'i mtshan ma ni /
T02TD2627E:251b-0: de nas de ni @251b nges par yang //
T02TD2627E:251b-1: lha yi gnas su skyes gyur nas //
T02TD2627E:251b-2: de yi mtshan ma ston par byed //
T02TD2627E:251b-3: yang na lha yi mchog tu 'gyur //
T02TD2627E:251b-4: yang na hom khung nang du ni //
T02TD2627E:251b-5: me yi ltas ni ston byed cing //
T02TD2627E:251b-6: lha yi gnas su skye ba dang //
T02TD2627E:251b-7: sdig pa bcom pa'i mtshan ma ni //
T02TD2627E:251b-8: dkar po nyid dang g-yas su 'bar //
T02TD2627E:251b-9: gyen du 'bar zhing dri ma med //
T02TD2627E:251b-10: zlum zhing rnam par mi 'phro la //
T02TD2627E:251b-11: brtan la glog bzhin dri ma med //
T02TD2627E:251b-12: yang na me lha nyid kyis ni //
T02TD2627E:251b-13: bdag nyid de nyid ston byed cing //
T02TD2627E:251b-15: gzhan mdog dkar zhing lham mer 'bar //
T02TD2627E:251b-16: des na mtshan ma 'di dag gis //
T02TD2627E:251b-17: dmyal ba la sogs rnam grol zhing //
T02TD2627E:251b-18: sdig pa bcom nas bde 'gror ni //
T02TD2627E:251b-19: skyes pa yin par shes par bya //
T02TD2627E:251b-20: zhes bya ba ni thar pa'i mtshan ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:251b-23: khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni //
T02TD2627E:251b-24: cho ga bzhin du brkos pa la //
T02TD2627E:251b-25: rdo rjes mtha' mar bskor ba yi //
T02TD2627E:251b-26: 'khor lo dbus su bri bar bya //
T02TD2627E:251b-27: rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD2627E:251b-28: ji bzhin pa yi phyogs su bri //
T02TD2627E:251b-29: ji bzhin sems dpa' rnams kyang ni //
T02TD2627E:251b-30: 'jig rten rtse la sogs pa bri //
T02TD2627E:251b-31: zhes bya ba ni dang por stegs bu'i tshad khru sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa brtsigs la /
T02TD2627E:251b-32: khru bzhi ba'i smad du zabs su khru do ba'i tshad kyi khung bu brkos la /
T02TD2627E:251b-33: sor bcu drug pa'i phyi rol du sor bcu drug yod pa'i mtho dman dang ldan pa de la rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phreng bas bskor /
T02TD2627E:251b-34: de'i dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa rdo rje rtse gsum bas bskor ba bri /
T02TD2627E:251b-35: lte ba la sogs pa rnams su rigs lnga'i phyag rgya rnams shar la sogs pa ji bzhin pa'i phyogs su rim pa bzhin du bri /
T02TD2627E:251b-36: de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa /
T02TD2627E:251b-37: sems dpa' bcu drug gi rdo rje la sogs pa bri /
T02TD2627E:251b-38: de'i phyi rol grva dang sgo rnams la /
T02TD2627E:251b-39: l'a sya dang lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bri /
T02TD2627E:251b-40: khyams kyi nang du byams pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bri /
T02TD2627E:251b-41: phyi rol gyi khyams la rim pa dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa la rdo rje la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2627E:251b-42: par bu dang gseg shang dang /
T02TD2627E:251b-44: sgo rnams la khro bo'i phyag mtshan rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:251b-45: 'jig rten gtso dang ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi thig le dang ming du bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:252a-0: @252a * // yang bya dang bum pa gang ba dang /
T02TD2627E:252a-1: gtor ma'i snod rnams bkang ba brgyad dam bcu drug snyed dag gzhag bza' ba dang bca' ba'i bshos dang /
T02TD2627E:252a-2: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02TD2627E:252a-4: dar dang lnga ldi rnams gzhag bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:252a-5: dkyil 'khor dam par sbyin sreg gi phyir gzhag pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:252a-6: cho ga shes pas bris nas kyang /
T02TD2627E:252a-7: lha rnams mang po spyan drangs pa //
T02TD2627E:252a-8: zhes bya ba ni cho ga shes pas phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris nas te /
T02TD2627E:252a-9: thugs kyi rang bzhin ston cing dngos po mtshan ma bsreg pa ni thugs gtsor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:252a-10: kyang zhes bya ba ni lhag chad zhi ba sngon du 'gro bas ting nge 'dzin gsum dang /
T02TD2627E:252a-11: bzlas brjod byed cing sgo dbye ba bsdu'o //
T02TD2627E:252a-12: lha rnams mang po spyan drangs ba ni /
T02TD2627E:252a-13: bsdu zhing lcags kyu la sogs pas las bya'o //
T02TD2627E:252a-14: sngags shes pas ni sngags phyag rgya //
T02TD2627E:252a-15: aargham phul ba shes bas kyang //
T02TD2627E:252a-16: zhes bya ba ni mchod yon dbul ba sngon du 'gro bas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab dbang bskur bas kyang zhes pas ston to //
T02TD2627E:252a-17: mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni //
T02TD2627E:252a-18: zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa bsdu na mchod par 'dus pas de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2627E:252a-19: lha yi sbyor bas rab gnas la //
T02TD2627E:252a-21: lha'i nga rgyal gyis gnas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:252a-22: de ltar sbyin sreg gi tshe na lha rnams mchod nas rdzas bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:252a-23: ga bur gur gum la sogs pa //
T02TD2627E:252a-24: mar dang 'o ma til bsgos la //
T02TD2627E:252a-25: nas dang yungs kar 'bras rnams la //
T02TD2627E:252a-26: dri yi chus ni legs bkang ste //
T02TD2627E:252a-27: 'bras chan spod dang la du dang //
T02TD2627E:252a-28: sbrang rtsi kha rar ldan de bzhin //
T02TD2627E:252a-29: brgya phrag du mar yongs bzlas la //
T02TD2627E:252a-30: yam shing la yang de bzhin te //
T02TD2627E:252a-31: rang gi sngags kyis btab pa'i shing //
T02TD2627E:252a-32: khung bu'i nang du gzhug bar bya //
T02TD2627E:252a-33: zhes bya ba la rdzas de rnams kun la aom sarbba bid ces bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:252a-34: bha zhes bya ba'i bar gyi sngags brgya phrag du mar bzlas shing /
T02TD2627E:252a-35: sngags de nyid btab pa'i shing la bha dang sha bkod pa mchod rten gyi dbus su brtsig bar bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:252a-36: ro'i bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:252a-37: dang bo re zhig ngan 'gro las dgug cing sdig pa sbyangs la /
T02TD2627E:252a-38: bye ma dang nyungs kar gyis sbyangs te khrus byas la /
T02TD2627E:252b-0: yangs stegs sngon po'i steng du gzhag pa las bum ba sngon pos bkru zhing mgrin ris dang lam bstan te me tog gi char @252b phab la /
T02TD2627E:252b-1: slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor du bcug la bum pa la sogs pa bsdus te /
T02TD2627E:252b-2: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dang padma la bzhag nas rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bskyed de /
T02TD2627E:252b-3: chu mchog gis bkrus la dris byug cing rgyan sna tshogs pa btags la sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pa la sogs pas bdug cing mchod pa'i khyad par gyis mchod ba ni /
T02TD2627E:252b-4: ro la sngags kyis btab nas ni //
T02TD2627E:252b-5: chu mchog gis ni bkru bar bya //
T02TD2627E:252b-6: bzlas pa'i dri yis byug bar bya //
T02TD2627E:252b-7: gos dang rgyan gyis bklubs nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:252b-8: sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pas bdug / me tog phreng ba sogs pas mchod //
T02TD2627E:252b-10: de 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
T02TD2627E:252b-11: gtsug phud dpung bar de bzhin du //
T02TD2627E:252b-12: sngags bri bas ni gdags par bya //
T02TD2627E:252b-13: zhes bya ba ni sngags bri pas gdags pa mdor bstan to //
T02TD2627E:252b-14: snying ga lkog ma kha phyogs su //
T02TD2627E:252b-15: sarbba bid kyis byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2627E:252b-16: ces bya ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings te ;
T02TD2627E:252b-17: aom sarbba bid badzra aa dhi tishtha dzny'a na sa ma yi h'um /
T02TD2627E:252b-18: zhes bya bas snying ga lkog ma'i phyogs la sogs ba rnams su byin gyis brlab pa ste mdor bstan pa'o //
T02TD2627E:252b-19: sngags khri ba dang byin gyis brlab pa gnyis bshad pa ni /
T02TD2627E:252b-20: dpral ba mdzod spu rna ba gnyis //
T02TD2627E:252b-21: mgo bo gtsug phud dpung ba gnyis //
T02TD2627E:252b-22: sna dang rked pa pus mo bo la //
T02TD2627E:252b-23: long bu sna yi rtse mo dang //
T02TD2627E:252b-24: mig gnyis dang ni gsang ba yi //
T02TD2627E:252b-25: dbang po rnams kyi gnas dang ni //
T02TD2627E:252b-26: de ltar gzhan du yi ge sngags //
T02TD2627E:252b-27: mchog tu dge ba rnams bshad do //
T02TD2627E:252b-29: gnas bco brgyad du 'god pa ste //
T02TD2627E:252b-30: yi ge zhes bya ba bha dang sha'o //
T02TD2627E:252b-31: sngags zhes bya ba sarba bid la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:252b-32: mchog tu dge bar byed pas na de skad ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:252b-33: de nas ro bsreg ba'i rang lhar gyur pa tsam zhig lus pa'i phyir ngan song sbyong ba'i phyir lhar bskyed pa ste /
T02TD2627E:252b-34: 'dis ni kun rdzob mi 'gag ba dang don dam par mtshan ma las 'das pa shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:252b-35: yang na don dam par shes bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:252b-36: skra dang thal ba la sogs pa bsreg ba'i rdzas su dbul ba ni /
T02TD2627E:252b-37: rgyud phyi ma las ston to //
T02TD2627E:252b-39: de nas ngan song sbyong ba'i phyir //
T02TD2627E:252b-40: stan dang bcas te thab dbus su //
