T02TD2627E:252b-41: bzhag pa nyid du bya ba yin //
T02TD2627E:253a-2: btab pa'i gos kyis g-yogs par bya //
T02TD2627E:253a-4: me dang mchod ba'i bya ba bstan ba'i phyir de nas byin rlabs zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te ro dbus su bzhag la de nas byin za dge ba rgyun bzhag gi me blangs la /
T02TD2627E:253a-5: rlung yab kyis sbar la rang gi chos kyi yi ges thab khung byin gyis brlabs te mar gyis sbar la /
T02TD2627E:253a-6: byin za de yang ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02TD2627E:253a-7: me lce stong gis dkrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus su gnas pa la zla ba ltar dkar zhi ba'i lus so //
T02TD2627E:253a-8: bsams ba'am zhe na mtha' yas ba'i me bkug la zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2627E:253a-10: blo mchog ldan ba'i mdun du gzugs mchog gzhag /'bras bu 'thob par 'dod pas me tog gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs la /
T02TD2627E:253a-11: mchod yon sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa lngas mchod de /
T02TD2627E:253a-12: de nas me lha la bsreg bya rnams kyis mchod par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:253a-13: de nas bsreg bya rnams kyis lha thams cad la brgya rtsa brgyad dang /
T02TD2627E:253a-14: gtso bo la nyi shu rtsa gcig brtag / de nas me lha gtso bo la sogs pa gshegs su gsol te yo byad lan gsum gsum dbul /
T02TD2627E:253a-15: de nas phyag na rdo rje pad dkar zhal /
T02TD2627E:253a-16: aargha la sogs pas mchod de /
T02TD2627E:253a-17: de yang phyag na rdo rje dang padma 'dzin cing gnyis kyis zhags pa bsnams pa /
T02TD2627E:253a-18: khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi gzugs zhabs kyi padmo dang ma h'a de ba au ma de ba dang bcas pa mnan pa rgyan rdzogs pa /
T02TD2627E:253a-19: sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan can bsams sam yid kyis bris ba'ang rung /
T02TD2627E:253a-20: de'i snying po h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2627E:253a-21: tshe 'das pa sh'antim ku ru zhes bya ba dang til gyis sbyin sreg byas nas /
T02TD2627E:253a-22: stong ngam bye ba'i tshad du'am /
T02TD2627E:253a-23: mtshan ma byung ba de srid kyi bar du sbyin sreg byas la /
T02TD2627E:253a-24: sdig can gyi rgyud dag par shes nas me lha'i phyag rgya dgrol de gshegs nas me lha mchod de bzod par gsol de nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:253a-25: de ltar mchod pa bya ba bstan nas thal ba'i bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:253a-26: de nas thal bar gyur pa dang //
T02TD2627E:253a-27: rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags kyis ni //
T02TD2627E:253a-28: zhes bya ba sam ha ra na badzra zhes bya bas so //
T02TD2627E:253a-29: cho ga bzhin du bsdu bar bya //
T02TD2627E:253a-30: thal ba de dang rus pa rdul //
T02TD2627E:253a-31: sngags kyis btab ba'i dri chu dang //
T02TD2627E:253a-32: ba skyes 'o ma la sogs lngas //
T02TD2627E:253b-0: sbyong ba'i @253b sngags kyi blo ldan gyis //
T02TD2627E:253b-1: 'bum du bzlas pa brjod nas ni //
T02TD2627E:253b-2: ga bur dri dang bsgos ba yis //
T02TD2627E:253b-3: 'dag ba dang ni bsres nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:253b-4: gzugs su bya ba'am yang na ni //
T02TD2627E:253b-5: mchod rten gyi ni lhar byas nas //
T02TD2627E:253b-6: gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam lnga //
T02TD2627E:253b-7: yang na brgya rtsa brgyad du'am //
T02TD2627E:253b-8: sngags dang phyag rgyas btab nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:253b-9: 'bum phrag nyis brgya'i bar du bzlas //
T02TD2627E:253b-10: zhes bya ba la gzugs su zhes bya ba sku gzugs su'o //
T02TD2627E:253b-11: sngags dang phyag rgyas btab ces bya ba spyan dbye ba byas nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:253b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs te de lta bu mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:253b-15: ci ste mtshan ma de dag ni //
T02TD2627E:253b-16: sdig can blo yis ma mthong na //
T02TD2627E:253b-18: rnal 'byor pa rgyud ma dag bsam mthong na'o //
T02TD2627E:253b-19: 'bum gyi phrag ni brgya stong ngam //
T02TD2627E:253b-20: ji srid mtshan ma byung bar du //
T02TD2627E:253b-21: de bzhin gshegs ba mchod nas ni //
T02TD2627E:253b-22: mnyam par gzhag pas bzla bar bya //
T02TD2627E:253b-23: de yi mthar ni mkhas pas kyang //
T02TD2627E:253b-24: mtshan gcig thog thag mi nyal bzlas //
T02TD2627E:253b-25: zhes bya bas ni sdig pa shin tu che bas dang po dang gnyis pa la mtshan ma ma mthong na 'bum phrag brgya bzlas brjod byas te mtshan thog thag mi nyal bar bzlas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:253b-26: sgrib pa shin tu chung ba rnams ni ro bsreg pa'i dus su'o //
T02TD2627E:253b-27: sdig pa can rnams ni 'bum phrag nyis brgya'i dus na'o //
T02TD2627E:253b-28: shin tu sdig che ba rnams ni 'bum phrag stong gi dus na mtshan ma byung na /
T02TD2627E:253b-29: de'i sdig pa nyid dag par mthong ste lha'i lus su gyur la rang gi rgyud do shes na de byams pa dang /
T02TD2627E:253b-30: snying rjer ldan pas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:253b-32: de ltar yang ro yod pa'i dbang du byas pa bshad nas /
T02TD2627E:253b-33: da ni ro med pa'i dbang du byas pa'i thabs bstan pa /
T02TD2627E:253b-34: yang na med bar gyur na yang //
T02TD2627E:253b-35: bzlas shing bsgom pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2627E:253b-36: ming tsam legs par bris nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:253b-37: mchod rten phreng ba bya ba dang //
T02TD2627E:253b-38: yang na gzugs su bris kyang rung //
T02TD2627E:253b-39: sbyin sreg mngon par dbang bskur nas //
T02TD2627E:253b-40: zhes bya ba ni bzlas shing zhes pa bzlas brjod dang /
T02TD2627E:253b-41: mchod rten phreng ba'i gzugs su bya //
T02TD2627E:253b-43: sbyin sreg bya ba ming bsreg pa dang /
T02TD2627E:254a-2: zhes bya ba mchod rten gyi dbus su gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2627E:254a-4: dbang bskur ba nyid dang bdun ro med kyang 'grub pa'o zhes bya bar ston to //
T02TD2627E:254a-5: snga ma bzhin du 'bras bu ni //
T02TD2627E:254a-6: gdon mi za bar bde 'gror skye //
T02TD2627E:254a-8: gzhan yang thal ba nyungs kar bye ma sogs //
T02TD2627E:254a-9: zhes bya ba thal ba dang nyungs kar dang /
T02TD2627E:254a-10: bye ma dang me tog la /
T02TD2627E:254a-11: rang gi ming smos sngags btab nas //
T02TD2627E:254a-12: zhes bya ba la ming nas thog mar smos te ro la sogs ba la bya ba byas nas /
T02TD2627E:254a-13: song nas kyang phyi'i rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du dor zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:254a-15: de ltar na 'ang sdig can yang //
T02TD2627E:254a-17: zhes bya ba dman pa yang thar bar gsungs na zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:254a-18: mchog rnams smos kyang ci zhig dgos //
T02TD2627E:254a-19: dge ba'i mchog ni bskyed pa dang //
T02TD2627E:254a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD2627E:254a-21: sdig pa nges pa can rnams ni thabs cis kyang mi grol bar dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed par zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:254a-22: bde gshegs rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs //
T02TD2627E:254a-23: zhes bya ba'i bar du ston to //
T02TD2627E:254a-24: de ltar thabs brgyad ston to //
T02TD2627E:254a-25: thams cad kyang thabs sla bas grol bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:254a-26: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la brgya byin la sogs pas bka' stsal pa bden pa nyid du byas nas nor bu dri ma med pa thar te dga' ldan du skyes nas grags pa chen po'i lha dang bcas bas de bzhin gshegs pa la tshe 'di nyid la mchod pa'i phyir sems bskyed de /
T02TD2627E:254a-27: lha rdzas sna tshogs kyis dga' ba'i tshal kun du gang bar byas so //
T02TD2627E:254a-28: lha'i bu ni ma mthong la lha rdzas mthong ba rnams kyis ya mtshan che bar gyur nas /
T02TD2627E:254a-29: 'di ci lags zhes ngo mtshar che bar zhus pa dang /
T02TD2627E:254a-30: bka' stsal pa dri ma med pa'i 'od yin no //
T02TD2627E:254a-32: lha rnams kyis kyang zhus pa /
T02TD2627E:254a-33: dkon mchog la khyad par can du bsngags nas lta bar 'tshal lo //
T02TD2627E:254a-34: zhes gsol ba btab nas 'od kyis snying bskul te 'od mi snang bar gyur nas /
T02TD2627E:254a-35: rdzu 'phrul chen pos dga' ba'i tshal snang bar byas nas /
T02TD2627E:254a-36: bla ma gnyis ma gtogs pa zil gyis mnan nas ched du brjod do //
T02TD2627E:254a-37: padma sgra snyan pa 'byin pa byung ba dang ya mtshan skyes te /
T02TD2627E:254b-0: bsam yas brjod nas lta @254b bar 'tshal zhus pa dang bla ma'i 'od kyis snying bskul te 'od mi snang bar gyur nas /
T02TD2627E:254b-1: bla ma gnyis ma gtogs pa thams cad g-yos te ngo mtshar che ba'i don zhus pa /
T02TD2627E:254b-2: khyad par lnga'i mchod pas mchod de mi snang bar gyur te zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2627E:254b-3: nor bu dri ma med pa dga' ldan du skyes pa bstan to //
T02TD2627E:254b-4: de nas brgya byin dang zhes bya ba la sogs nas bag yod bar sgrubs shig ces bya ba'i bar gyis thams cad la phan pa'i phyir rgyud gtad pa bstan /
T02TD2627E:254b-5: de ltar rtsa ba'i rgyud phyag rgya chen po dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la sogs pa'i gtso bor gyur pa bstan pa'o //
T02TD2627E:254b-6: ci'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyud du mdzad ce na /
T02TD2627E:254b-7: lha thams cad kyi sku dang /
T02TD2627E:254b-12: rtsa bar dang por ston pa dang ldan pas na rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya'o //
T02TD2627E:254b-14: gsang ba lnga ldan gang yin pa //
T02TD2627E:254b-15: dang po nyid du bstan pas na //
T02TD2627E:254b-16: de ni rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya //
T02TD2627E:254b-18: ci'i phyir rgyud ces brjod ce na //
T02TD2627E:254b-19: rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes bya ste //
T02TD2627E:254b-21: zhes gsungs pas rgyun chags pa'am /
T02TD2627E:254b-23: de ltar rtsa ba'i rgyud bstan nas /
T02TD2627E:254b-24: de ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyud phyi ma ston te ;
T02TD2627E:254b-25: ci'i phyir phyi ma zhes bya zhe na /
T02TD2627E:254b-26: snga ma las byung zhing de nyid gsung ba spas pa shes pa'i phyir rgyud phyi ma zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:254b-28: phyi ma snga ma las byung ste //
T02TD2627E:254b-29: de nyid gsungs pa sbas shes pa //
T02TD2627E:254b-30: rgyud ni phyi mar brjod pa yin //
T02TD2627E:254b-32: 'dis rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma ni dga' ba'i tshal 'di nyid du gsungs par shes par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:254b-33: mi'i yul du bab pa la sogs pa la khyad par ma bshad pa dang /
T02TD2627E:254b-34: phyis 'dzam bu gling gi ris 'di nyid na zhes gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2627E:254b-35: ri rab kyi lho phyogs la dgongs pa dang /
T02TD2627E:254b-36: yang phyis ming dang rjes yi rang ngo zhes bya ba gsungs pa ni ;
T02TD2627E:254b-37: rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa yin pas sprul pa'i sku mthong ba'i phyir 'gal ba med pa kho na'o //
T02TD2627E:254b-38: la la dag gnas gang du 'chad pa de dag gis bshad pa'i lung brjod dgos te /
T02TD2627E:254b-39: lung med pa kho na nyid yin te /
T02TD2627E:254b-40: de nyid kyis gang nas kyang ma bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:255a-1: shin tu lkog tu gyur ba'i phyir mi 'thad pa nyid do //
T02TD2627E:255a-2: de nas zhes bya ba ni dang po'i sbyor ba'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2627E:255a-3: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rtsa ba'i rgyud du bshad pa las phyag na rdo rjes sngar bshad pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:255a-4: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:255a-5: ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa phyag gi mthil na gnas pa bzhin du 'dzin pa'am phyag na rdo rje nyid 'dzin pas de skad ces bya ste nges so //
T02TD2627E:255a-6: 'di gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2627E:255a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus zhes bya ba gsungs te sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis so //
T02TD2627E:255a-10: brtag pa'i rgyal po phyi ma 'di //
T02TD2627E:255a-12: brtag pa'i rgyal po pha rol tu phyin pa drug byang chub kyi sems dang bcas ba yin la de ston ba la yang de skad ces bya ste /
T02TD2627E:255a-14: sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir //
T02TD2627E:255a-15: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas //
T02TD2627E:255a-16: pha rol phyin drug spyod bdag / brtan pa rtogs pa nyid yin no //
T02TD2627E:255a-18: brtag pa phyi ma 'di zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa 'di lta bu 'di'o //
T02TD2627E:255a-19: gsungs so zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus bka' stsal to //
T02TD2627E:255a-20: 'dis ni phyag na rdo rje bshad bas /
T02TD2627E:255a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gsungs pa'i phyir bka' nyid du rnam par gzhag pa gsungs so //
T02TD2627E:255a-22: gdul bya rnams kyi bsam ba la dgongs nas de skad ces bshad kyis don la tha dad pa yod pa ma yin no //
T02TD2627E:255a-23: dpa' bo gdan la bzhengs nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:255a-24: dgyes shing rdo rje gsor nas ni //
T02TD2627E:255a-25: sh'akya'i bdag po dgyes mdzad pa //
T02TD2627E:255a-26: thub pa'i gtso la phyag btsal nas //
T02TD2627E:255a-27: zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i dpa' bo gtso bo la gus pas zla ba dang padma'i gdan rang dang 'tsham pa las bzhengs nas byin gyis brlabs pas dgyes shing bgegs zhi ba dang /
T02TD2627E:255a-28: bar chod kyis mi tshugs par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje bsor nas kyang /
T02TD2627E:255a-29: sh'akya'i bdag po sems can gyi don la dgyes par mdzad pa thub pa'i gtsol phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:255a-30: 'dis ni gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis kyang bgegs zhi bar byas nas gnang ba thob nas 'jug pa bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:255b-0: sgrib pa thams @255b cad rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa thams cad de mchod pa'i sgrib ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:255b-1: rnam par dag pa rdo rje zhes bya ba thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2627E:255b-2: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya la /
T02TD2627E:255b-3: de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon du mdzad pa ste /
T02TD2627E:255b-4: de lta bur gyur nas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2627E:255b-5: 'dis ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgom pas zla ba'i dbus su thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid du zhugs nas gtso bo bskyed de /
T02TD2627E:255b-6: phyag rgya brjod pa dang sngags brjod pa dang bcas pa bstan pa'o //
T02TD2627E:255b-7: ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i rang gi snying bo'i 'di thugs ka nas phyung ngo zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2627E:255b-8: ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba ni 'dir gtsug tor ro //
T02TD2627E:255b-9: rang gi snying bo zhes bya ba ni de kho na bskyed pa la bya'o //
T02TD2627E:255b-10: 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo zhes bya ba ni sgra'i rang bzhin 'og nas 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi thugs nges pa can ye shes las bton zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:255b-11: 'dis ni sgom pa bo rnams kyis gtso bo'i thugs kar zla ba la sngags bkod de 'khor thams cad bskyed do //
T02TD2627E:255b-12: ston pa'i sngags nyid badzra h'um phat ces bya ba ni rdo rje gtsug gi'o //
T02TD2627E:255b-13: aom sarbba p'a pam da ha na badzra h'um phat ces bya ba nas brtsams nas ;
T02TD2627E:255b-14: aom ma te sarbba tirya ka ga ti he h'um phat ces bya ba bco lngas bteg pa'i sngags ston to //
T02TD2627E:255b-15: de nas de dag gi yo byad rnams bshad do zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:255b-16: de dag gi zhes pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2627E:255b-17: yo byad rnams zhes pa gsol ka ba dang bran la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2627E:255b-18: bshad do zhes bya ba bzlas pa'i sngags rnams gsungs so //
T02TD2627E:255b-19: de nyid aom sarbba aa ba ya zhes bya ba nas h'um phat ces bya bas ston to //
T02TD2627E:255b-20: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bskyed pa ni /
T02TD2627E:255b-21: rgyud gzhan dang 'di nyid kyi rtsa ba'i rgyud dang /
T02TD2627E:255b-22: phyi ma'i bde ba chen bo'i bshad pa las shes par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:255b-23: ra tontta ma tram padmotta ma hr'i:/
T02TD2627E:255b-24: bi shotta aa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyang /
T02TD2627E:255b-25: na mo bha ga wa te sarbba du rga ti zhes bya ba la sogs ba rtsa ba'i rig pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:255b-26: des ni 'di skad du ston te /
T02TD2627E:255b-27: dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog sgom po rnams kyis ni sh'akya thub pa'i thugs kar thun mong dang khyad par gyi sngags bkod de /
T02TD2627E:256a-1: tor nas brtsams nas rdo rje dril bu'i bar du bskyed ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:256a-2: sbrul pa'i dus su mthong ba'i skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi smon lam dang thugs rje'i mthus ji ltar 'dod pa ltar snang ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:256a-3: de nas bsdu zhing byin gyis brlab pa sngon du 'gro ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2627E:256a-4: las kyi rgyal po mchog ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:256a-5: ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bstan zin to //
T02TD2627E:256a-6: thabs de la 'di nyid du dbang dang dam tshig thob pas 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:256a-7: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las dang slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ston to //
T02TD2627E:256a-8: de nas zhes bya ba ni sngon du bsnyen pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2627E:256a-9: gzhan yang sa bzung ba dang lhag par gnas pa dang bcas pa yang de nas zhes bya bas ston to //
T02TD2627E:256a-10: dkyil 'khor bshad de zhes bya ba ni thig gdab pa dang rdul tshon bri ba'i gzugs can gyi dkyil 'khor bshad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:256a-12: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi gnas gru bzhi pa /
T02TD2627E:256a-13: sgo bzhi pa rta babs dang bcas pa kha khyer dang ldan pa la sogs pa phyi'i dkyil 'khor byas la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:256a-16: ces bya ba legs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:256a-17: de'i nang du ji ltar bri zhe na /
T02TD2627E:256a-18: shin tu mdzes pa'i rtsibs brgyad can //
T02TD2627E:256a-19: lte bar bcas shing rtsibs rten can //
T02TD2627E:256a-20: nang gi rim ba bris nas ni //
T02TD2627E:256a-22: rtsibs brgyad dang ldan pa dang lte ba dang rtsibs rten dang sum rim du bris nas rdo rje phreng bas yongs su bskor ba bri zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:256a-23: de'i nang du ci zhig dgod ce na /
T02TD2627E:256a-24: lte ba'i nang du sh'akya yi //
T02TD2627E:256a-25: dpang po thub pa bri bar bya //
T02TD2627E:256a-26: phyag na rdo rje stobs chen ni //
T02TD2627E:256a-27: dpa' bo de yi spyan sngar bri //
T02TD2627E:256a-28: rgyab tu 'khor los sgyur ba bri //
T02TD2627E:256a-29: g-yas su rgyal po gtsug tor la //
T02TD2627E:256a-30: g-yon par rnam par rgyal ba bri //
T02TD2627E:256a-31: gzi brjid phung po me yi phyogs //
T02TD2627E:256a-32: dbang po'i phyogs su gdugs dkar po //
T02TD2627E:256a-33: rnam par 'thor ba rlung gi phyogs //
T02TD2627E:256a-34: rnam par 'joms ba nri tir bri //
T02TD2627E:256a-35: zhes bya ba gsungs te lte ba'i dbus padma'i lte ba la sh'akya thub pa /
T02TD2627E:256b-0: padma re re bor ba'i gzhi la rdo rje la sogs pa'i shar phyogs su rdo rje @256b gtsug tor /
T02TD2627E:256b-1: lho phyogs su rgyal ba'i gtsug tor /
T02TD2627E:256b-2: nub phyogs su padma'i gtsug tor /
T02TD2627E:256b-3: byang phyogs su sna tshogs gtsug tor /
T02TD2627E:256b-4: shar lho mtshams su gtsug tor gzi brjid /
T02TD2627E:256b-5: lho nub mtshams su gtsug tor rgyal mtshan /
T02TD2627E:256b-6: nub byang du gtsug tor rnon po /
T02TD2627E:256b-7: byang shar mtshams su gtsug tor gdugs dkar bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:256b-10: bshad pa phyi rol bri bya ste //
T02TD2627E:256b-11: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD2627E:256b-12: seng ge rta babs brgyan par bya //
T02TD2627E:256b-13: zhes bya ba gsungs pa ste /
T02TD2627E:256b-14: phyi rol gyi gnas gru bzhi dang sgo bzhi dang seng ge dang glang po che dang rta babs dang kha khyer la sogs pas brgyan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:256b-15: phyi rol gyi gnas rnams su dgod pa ni /
T02TD2627E:256b-16: dpa' bo lcags kyu zhags pa dang //
T02TD2627E:256b-17: lcags sgrog dril bu snyan rnams gzhag / grva yi phyogs ni thams cad du //
T02TD2627E:256b-18: bdug pa la sogs bri bar bya //
T02TD2627E:256b-19: zhes bya ba gsungs te dpa' bos shar phyogs kyi sgor lcags kyu /
T02TD2627E:256b-21: nub tu lcags sgrog / byang du dril bu rnams gzhag / nang gi grva'i phyogs mtshams su ni l'a sye dang phreng ba dang glu mkhan ma dang gar mkhan ma dang bzhi gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:256b-22: phyi'i grva bzhir bdug pa ma dang me tog ma dang mar me ma dang dri chab ma rnams shar lho mtshams nas brtsams te bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:256b-24: byams pa la sogs bri bar bya //
T02TD2627E:256b-26: de ltar dkyil 'khor legs bar bkod nas chad pa dang lhag pa zhi bar bya ste dkyil 'khor du zhugs la me tog gi phreng ba dor te sgo bzhi phye la /
T02TD2627E:256b-27: khrus byas shing lus dri zhim po la sogs pas byugs nas rgyan sna tshogs bas brgyan te /
T02TD2627E:256b-28: lce dang lag pa byin gyis brlabs nas sbyor ba dang po dang dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog dang las kyi rgyal po mchog dang sgo dbye ba rnams so //
T02TD2627E:256b-29: de nas dri zhim la sogs pa //
T02TD2627E:256b-30: rang gi lus la bskus nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:256b-31: rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas ni //
T02TD2627E:256b-32: zhes bya ba kyang du bskur bas phal cher ston to ;
T02TD2627E:256b-33: / de nas gtso bo bdag sbyor bas //
T02TD2627E:256b-34: aom dza: h'um bam ho: bha ga w'an ae hye hi ma h'a ka ru ni ka dri shya ho sa ma ya satvam zhes bya ba las lha thams cad spyan drang ngo zhes bya ba ni bsdu'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:256b-35: de nas gshegs par mos pa bskyed de zhes bya ba ni lcags kyu la sogs pas las bya zhing bgegs bsal ba dang /
T02TD2627E:257a-4: de brtan par bya ba dang /
T02TD2627E:257a-5: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa dang /
T02TD2627E:257a-6: dbang bskur bar mos pa bskyed de mchod pa byas nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:257a-7: bzlas brjod kyi rjes thogs la mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa dang /
T02TD2627E:257a-9: sbyin sreg dang gnang ba nod par byas la /
T02TD2627E:257a-10: de nas slob ma gzhug pa'i bya ba bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:257a-11: de bzhin du bcug ste dbang bskur na zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor du bcug cing dbang nyi shu rtsa gcig gis bskur na zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:257a-12: de'i phan yon ngan song thams cad las rnam par grol te bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dang gong nas gong dus rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:257a-13: dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:257a-14: sangs rgyas su yang gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:257a-15: snga ma bzhin du las thams cad byed cing thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:257a-16: bya ba byas pas rims nad thams cad dang gdon gdug pa can la sogs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:257a-17: phyag na rdo rje'i h'um zhes bya bas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:257a-18: dbang bskur ba tsam gyis ngan song thams cad las thar zhing bde 'gror skye ba dang /
T02TD2627E:257a-19: dbang bskur nas bsgrubs pas mos pa spyod pa la sogs pas bcu gnyis su gong nas gong du 'gro ba dang /
T02TD2627E:257a-20: 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub dang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba dang sngar bshad pa bzhin du zhi ba la sogs ba'i las byed pa dang /
T02TD2627E:257a-21: las phra mo thams cad la sbyar ba tsam gyis 'grub pa dang /
T02TD2627E:257a-22: bye ma dang yungs kar la sogs pas byabs bas pas rims dang gdon dang gdug pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2627E:257a-23: dbang bskur ba de la phyag na rdo rje de'i drung du gnas pas thams cad byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:257a-24: brtag pa gzhan gyi tshogs kyang las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud brtag pa gzhan gyi cho ga las kyang zhes bya ba ni sngar kri yar bshad pa'i lha lngas bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2627E:257a-25: snying po tshig tsam gyis bskyed pa dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du bshad pa'i mngon par byang chub pa dang /
T02TD2627E:257b-0: snying po tshig tsam gyis bskyed pa la sogs pa'i tshogs kyang @257b las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:257b-1: 'dis ni dkyil 'khor 'di'i dbang bskur ba dang dam tshig la mchog tu gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:257b-2: thabs sla bas snga ma bzhin du grol bas lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang srin po la sogs pa ngan song gi rgyud kyi dbang du gyur pa rnams shi ba'i ro'am gzugs brnyan nam /
T02TD2627E:257b-3: ming la sogs te bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg dang dbang rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du zhes bya ba ni thabs sla ba brgyad tshan gnyis po rnams kyis yin te /
T02TD2627E:257b-4: bzlas pa dang po zhes bya ba ni bzlas brjod bya ba nyid dang /
T02TD2627E:257b-5: chu klung du dor ba dang tsha tsha dang gsum bstan to //
T02TD2627E:257b-6: sbyin sreg ces bya ba sbyin sreg nyid dang sbyin sreg chen po dang gnyis so //
T02TD2627E:257b-7: dbang zhes bya ba dbang bskur ba nyid dang /
T02TD2627E:257b-8: mchod rten gyi dbus su gzhag pa dang dur du bskyal ba dang gsum bstan to //
T02TD2627E:257b-9: ngan song thams cad yongs su grol bar byed do zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi phan yon no //
T02TD2627E:257b-10: de nas de rnams su zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyud gsum las gsungs pa'i lha rnams rgyas gdab bo //
T02TD2627E:257b-11: de nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2627E:257b-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes seng ge'i lta stangs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol te zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis bltas te byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir phyag 'tshal nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i don zhus pa'o //
T02TD2627E:257b-13: byin gyis brlab phyir gsol ba btab ste zhus pa'i don to //
T02TD2627E:257b-14: bcom ldan phyag rgya dam pa yi //
T02TD2627E:257b-15: mtshan nyid bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02TD2627E:257b-16: thugs rjes bsgral ba'i thugs mnga' ba'i //
T02TD2627E:257b-17: rgyal ba kun gyis byin brlabs pa //
T02TD2627E:257b-18: zhes bya ba yin te bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs dam pa'i phyag rgyas bcings pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bgyi ba la /
T02TD2627E:257b-19: dmigs su med pa thugs rje chen pos bskul ba'i thugs dang ldan pa la rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bo gnas pa khyod kyis byin gyis rlobs shig ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:257b-20: gsol ba btab nas bshad pa dngos //
T02TD2627E:257b-21: mnyam par gzhag pas dpral bar ni //
T02TD2627E:257b-22: phyag 'tshal ba yi thal mo sbyar //
T02TD2627E:257b-23: sangs rgyas bde gshegs skyes rnams kyis //
T02TD2627E:257b-24: phyag 'tshal ba yi phyag rgyar bshad //
T02TD2627E:258a-0: ces bya ba ni lha'i rnal 'byor dang @258a * //
T02TD2627E:258a-1: ldan pas dpral bar thal mo sbyar zhing phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul du byas na /
T02TD2627E:258a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams kyi phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgyar bshad ces bya bar bstan to //
T02TD2627E:258a-3: rnal 'byor rigs pas mgrin phyogs su //
T02TD2627E:258a-4: thal mo snying gar sbyar ba ni //
T02TD2627E:258a-5: rtag tu padma'i rigs nyid du //
T02TD2627E:258a-6: padma'i phyag rgya yin par bshad //
T02TD2627E:258a-7: ces bya ba ni lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas mgrin pa'i phyogs snying gar thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal na padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:258a-8: rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:258a-9: snying gar gung mo thal sbyar ba //
T02TD2627E:258a-10: rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya 'di ;
T02TD2627E:258a-11: / dam tshig thams cad 'dzin byed pa'o //
T02TD2627E:258a-12: zhes bya ba ni thal mo sbyar nas snying gar gung mo'i rtse mo sbyar ba dang phyag 'tshal ba na rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:258a-13: 'di rnams kyi rigs su nges par aom sarba ta th'a ga ta b'a da bandha nam ka ro mi zhes bya bas phyag 'tshal bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:258a-14: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur g-yon pas thal mor byas la gan rkyal du gzhag pa de'i steng du g-yas pa bzhag ste mthe bong gnyis sprad la zhi ba'i lta bas blta ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ste /
T02TD2627E:258a-15: kun rig dang ngan song sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ste dam tshig yin par bshad do zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya nyid dam tshig ste mi 'da' bar byed pas so //
T02TD2627E:258a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang //
T02TD2627E:258a-18: 'da' bar ru ni mi mdzad pas //
T02TD2627E:258a-19: phyag rgya dam tshig ces su bsgrags //
T02TD2627E:258a-22: lta 'og bsnol la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig lu gu rgyud kyi tshul du bsnol la snying gar gzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya la rdo rje 'dzin ma dpal gyi padma lta bur bya ba ste dam tshig thob par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:258a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yang 'jug pa'i phyag rgya yin no //
T02TD2627E:258a-24: thal mo rdzogs par sbyar ba las mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsnyams la lhag ma brkyang pa'i 'di ni padma'i rigs kyi padma'i phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba ni sh'akya thub pa'o //
T02TD2627E:258b-0: rdo re bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar bsnyams la mthe bong mthe chung gnyis @258b brkyang ba 'di ni /
T02TD2627E:258b-1: phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba rdo rje gtsug tor dang rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:258b-2: de nyid las mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis de bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2627E:258b-3: mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag padmo 'dra bar bkug pa ni ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:258b-4: de nyid las mdzub mo dang srin lag gnyis rin po cher byas pa ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba ni rin chen tog dang /
T02TD2627E:258b-5: dbang bskur ba ste rdo rje gdams pa las byung ba'o //
T02TD2627E:258b-6: mthe'u chung dang mthe bong so sor bsnyams la lhag ma rnams brkyang ba 'di ni sdig pa thams cad sreg pa'i phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba ni ngan 'gro la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i sngon du'o //
T02TD2627E:258b-7: lag pa g-yon ba de bzhin du bskor zhing zhes bya ba 'di ni las thams cad pa'i phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba ni ngan 'gro sbyang ba la sogs pa kun gyi ste snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:258b-8: snyim pa bzed pa gyen du 'thor bar byed pa 'di ni bdug pa'i phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la snyim pa 'og nas gyen du 'thor ba dang /
T02TD2627E:258b-10: dung dang 'dra bar bya ba dang bzhi ni bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i'o //
T02TD2627E:258b-11: de nyid las brkyang ste 'dzin pa ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba ni phyi rol du gtor ma sbyin pa'i tshe rdo rje thal mo brkyang ba sbyin no //
T02TD2627E:258b-12: de nyid las gung mo nang du bkug pa ni aargha'i'o zhes bya ba ni mchod yon gyi'o //
T02TD2627E:258b-13: da ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ston te rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo gnyis bsnyams te tshigs dang po bcag la sor mo thams cad brkyang ba 'di ni rnam par 'thor ba'i phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba gtsug tor rnon pa'i'o //
T02TD2627E:258b-14: de nyid las mthe bong dang mthe chung gnyis bkug pa ni rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba ni gtsug tor rgyal mtshan gyi'o //
T02TD2627E:258b-15: de nyid las 'od zer 'bar ba 'dra ba ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba gtsug tor gzi brjid kyi'o //
T02TD2627E:258b-16: de nyid las spyi bor bskor ba gdugs dkar rgya zhes bya ba ni gtsug tor gdugs dkar po'i'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-0: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis gnyis bsnol la mdud pa gyen du bsnol ba 'di ni 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor sbrul ba'i @259a * //
T02TD2627E:259a-2: rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis rdo rjer byas pa ni mdzub mo gnyis rin po che ltar byas la lhag ma rnams 'od zer 'bar bar byas ba ni rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-3: rin chen zhes bya ba rin chen gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-4: de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la sor mo lhag ma rnams bsdams nas rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-5: g-yas ba mchog sbyin du byas la g-yon pa mi 'jigs pas sbyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yin no zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med kyi'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-6: rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa 'di ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-7: de nyid las mdzub mo g-yas pa bkug pa 'di ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-8: de nyid las me tog 'dra bar byas la 'di ni mda'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-9: de nyid las slar bkug ste mthe bong gnyis rtse sprad pa ni blo gros legs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-10: de nyid las tshigs bar ma bcag pa ni rin po che'i'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-11: de nyid las sor mo rnams 'od zer 'dra bar skyed pa ni gzi brjid kyi'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-12: de nyid las spyi bor gzhag pa ni tog gi'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-13: de las mdun du gzhag pa ni bzhad pa'i'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-14: de nyid las padmo 'dra bar byas pa ni padma'i'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-15: de nyid las rtse mo gnyis bkug pa ni ral gri'i'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-16: de nyid las gdu bu 'dra bar byas pa ni 'khor lo'i'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-17: de nyid las yid tsam padma 'dra bar byas pa ni lce'i'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-18: de nyid las rtse mo yid tsam skyed pa ni rgya gram gyi'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-19: de nyid las shin tu bskyed pa ni srung ba'i'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-20: de nyid las rtse mo gnyis slar bkug pa ni gnod sbyin gyi'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-21: dam du bkug pa ni bsdams pa'o zhes bya ba rnams ni rdo rje sems dpa' nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi mthar thug pa'i bar gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-22: bsdams pa nyid mdun du gzhag pa ni bdug pa'i'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-23: de nyid la gyen du stod pa ni phreng ba'i'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-24: mdun du mthe bong bsnyams te bskor ba ni mar me'i'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-25: de nyid byug pa ltar byas pa ni dri'o zhes bya ba bdug pa la sogs pa bzhi'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-26: sngar bshad pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:259a-27: de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i'o //
T02TD2627E:259b-0: de nyid @259b las rtse mo gnyis sprad pa ni zhags pa'i'o //
T02TD2627E:259b-1: de nyid las gcig la gcig 'khyud pa ni lcags sgrog gi'o //
T02TD2627E:259b-2: de nyid las bskyod pa ni mnyes pa'i'o zhes bya ba ni sgo bzhi'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste las kyi phyag rgya ni sngar rtsa ba'i rgyud du shes bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:259b-3: sku gzugs kyi cho ga yang 'di ni de bzhin byas te zhes bya bas ras ris kyi sgrub pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:259b-4: sku gzugs kyi cho ga yang zhes bya ba ni slar yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:259b-5: 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni rgyud phyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang padma'i rigs 'dir ni zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2627E:259b-6: de bzhin byas te zhes bya ba ni padma'i rdzing bu la sogs pa rnams so //
T02TD2627E:259b-7: cung zad du na bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs bri'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:259b-8: 'jig rten gsum rgyal nyid cung zad na ni don yin no //
T02TD2627E:259b-9: yang na sku gzugs nyid dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris la zhes bya ba ni gtsug tor dgu'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bri ba'o //
T02TD2627E:259b-10: me tog la sogs pas mchod de /
T02TD2627E:259b-11: de'i spyan sngar 'bum tsam cig sngar bsnyen pa byas nas las thams cad bya'o zhes bya ba ni spyan dbye ba sngon du 'gro bas dben pa'i gnas su spyan drang zhing phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa pa dang /
T02TD2627E:259b-13: mchod pa byas la bsnyen pa 'bum byas te mtshan thog thag bzlas nas sngar bshad pa'i dngos grub kyi las thams cad bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:259b-14: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas nor bu dri ma med pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa ci las gyur pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:259b-15: de nas phyag na rdo rje la las kyi rnam par smin pa ci yis nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od de dmyal ba la sogs pa der lhung zhes dris pa dang /
T02TD2627E:259b-16: sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa dang bshad pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2627E:259b-17: 'di ni sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa 'di yin te 'dzam bu'i gling gi rigs 'di nyid na mtha' khob pa rigs ngan du gtogs pa'i rgyal po lus mi bde ba zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur te zhes bya ba'i la sogs pa smos te sngon gyi zhes bya ba rdzogs ldan gyi dus na'o //
T02TD2627E:259b-18: 'dzam bu'i gling gi rigs 'di nyid na zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi lho phyogs gling bzhi pa'i rigs 'di nyid na'o //
T02TD2627E:260a-0: rgyal po lus mi bde ba zhes bya ba ni btsun mo dam pa mdzes ldan ma'i khong du gnas tsam nyid na @260a * //
T02TD2627E:260a-1: lus mi bde ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:260a-2: lhag ma rnams ni go sla bas ma bshad de 'dis kyang nor bu dri ma med pa de nyid kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa dang zhus pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:260a-3: 'dzam bu'i gling du lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i don du zhu ba ma 'brel ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:260a-4: da ni tshe tshad med pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa'i padma'i rigs bshad pa'i rjes thogs la /
T02TD2627E:260a-5: bshad pa de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas tshe tshad med pa'i dkyil 'khor ston to //
T02TD2627E:260a-6: gzhan yang de nas zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba dang po'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2627E:260a-7: 'dir dang po'i ting nge 'dzin ni gtsug tor du bshad pa nyid dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:260a-8: brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis bos nas bstod de gsol ba btab bo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2627E:260a-9: tshul ji lta bu dang ldan pas she na /
T02TD2627E:260a-10: brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams yid rab tu mgu zhing rangs te ba spu'i bu gnas sbu rnams langs shing rgyal ba rgyal ba zhes skad chen pos bos nas so //
T02TD2627E:260a-11: lha'i bu rnams zhes bya ba ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa thob pa sprul pa'i sku mthong ba'i skal ba dang ldan pa'i brgya byin la sogs pa nyid ston to //
T02TD2627E:260a-12: sngar ni rtsa ba'i rgyud du las kyi rnam par smin pa bshad pas rgyal bar 'gyur nas /
T02TD2627E:260a-13: de sangs par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor du bcug cing /
T02TD2627E:260a-14: dbang bskur ba rnams yin te /
T02TD2627E:260a-15: gzhan yang de rnams tshe bsring ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor dang sgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:260a-16: sprul pa ni lha'i dbang po zhes bya ba gang yin pa ste de lta na ni khyod de'i phar gyur to zhes bya ba 'gal lo zhe na ma yin te nor bu dri ma med pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa yang de lta bur snang ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:260a-17: de ltar na thams cad sprul pa dang dngos su 'gyur ro zhe na /
T02TD2627E:260a-19: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du /
T02TD2627E:260a-20: lha dang lha dbang lha yi bla //
T02TD2627E:260a-21: lha min dbang po lha yi bdag / ces pa dang /
T02TD2627E:260a-22: au ma'i khyib [?] thab skye dgu'i bdag / gtogs 'dod rgyal 'dod thub pa che //
T02TD2627E:260a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2627E:260a-25: nga ni dmyal ba'i dmyal ba pa //
T02TD2627E:260b-0: lha'i bu rnams khu bub tu 'gyel ba dang ba spu langs pa dang @260b tshe sgrub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa las gzhan pa nyid do //
T02TD2627E:260b-1: rab tu mgu zhing rangs te zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i khyad par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:260b-2: ba spu langs shing zhes bya ba ni dang po'i dad pa bskyed pas so //
T02TD2627E:260b-3: rgyal ba rgyal ba zhes skad chen por bos nas zhes bya ba ni las kyi rnam par smin pa gsungs pas skrag nas yang dang yang du skad chen por bos pa'o //
T02TD2627E:260b-4: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la ming bcu pa 'dis zhes bya ba ni mtshan don dang ldan pas so //
T02TD2627E:260b-5: mngon par bstod de zhes bya ba ni ming don dang ldan pas brjod pas bstod pas so //
T02TD2627E:260b-6: gsol ba btab bo zhes bya ba ni tshe ring ba dang nad med pa'i don du gsol ba btab bo zhes bya'o //
T02TD2627E:260b-7: bstod pa dang gsol ba btab pa'i rang gi ngo bo ksho taksha /
T02TD2627E:260b-8: khyod ni glang po'i rna ba can //
T02TD2627E:260b-13: ko ta ba go ta ba /
T02TD2627E:260b-14: khyod ni bzang po'i rgyan zhes bya'o //
T02TD2627E:260b-15: ko ta ba sha khyod ni rnam par gnon pa'i zhes bya'o //
T02TD2627E:260b-17: yon tan rin chen 'byung gnas khyod //
T02TD2627E:260b-20: khyod ni bden pa'i sprin chen te //
T02TD2627E:260b-22: ko la ba ko la pa /
T02TD2627E:260b-23: khyod ni gzugs sdug yid kyi rgyan //
T02TD2627E:260b-24: ko la pa sha / khyod ni me lce 'bar ba can //
T02TD2627E:260b-27: khyod ni yid bzhin nor bu ste //
T02TD2627E:260b-30: khyod ni gzugs ni mdzes pa yin //
T02TD2627E:260b-31: zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:260b-32: gzhan yang ngo bo nyid kyi sangs rgyas la sogs pa bcu dang stobs bcu dang dbang bcu dang /
T02TD2627E:260b-33: gzugs bcu ste de bzhin gshegs pa la mnga' ba'i yon tan ston te brjod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:260b-34: de ltar bstod pa bstan nas /
T02TD2627E:260b-35: brgya byin la sogs lha mchog rnams //
T02TD2627E:260b-36: sems can kun la phan pa dang //
T02TD2627E:260b-37: tshe dang nad med 'phel ba'i phyir //
T02TD2627E:260b-38: mgon po khyod la gsol ba 'debs //
T02TD2627E:260b-39: bcom ldan 'das tshe thung ba dang skal ba chung ba rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang tshe bsring ba'i slad du bshad par gsol /
T02TD2627E:260b-40: gsang ba'i bdag po bshad du gsol zhes bya ba yin te brgya byin la sogs pa mos pa spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa'i lha'i mchog rnams sems can kun tshe phyi ma'i don dang /
T02TD2627E:261a-0: tshe 'phel ba dang nad med pa'i phyir @261a * //
T02TD2627E:261a-1: mgon po khyod la gsol ba 'debs kyis tshe thung zhing skal ba chung ba rnams kyi don dang phyi ma la dang 'di'i phan pa dang bde ba dang tshe bsring ba'i slad du yang dang yang du bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa'i don to //
T02TD2627E:261a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes zhes bya ba la sogs pas snying po gsungs pa ston to zhes bya ba ni gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2627E:261a-3: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa 'khor de dag gzigs nas legs so zhes bya bas mgu bar byas te snod dang ldan pa tshangs ba la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams gang khyed kyis 'di lta bu'i spobs pa yang dag par bskyed pa ni legs so legs par sgrubs shig dang bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'khor la gzigs shing mgu bar byas pas snod dang ldan par byas nas spobs pa bskyed pa la dgyes nas legs so zhes bya ba lan gnyis gsungs te ;
T02TD2627E:261a-4: ma yengs par 'dzin du bcug pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2627E:261a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis so //
T02TD2627E:261a-6: sems can thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa spel ba zhes bya ba ni nyi ma dang zla ba yod pa de srid kyi bar du thub pa'o //
T02TD2627E:261a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying bo 'di zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:261a-8: yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa 'og nas 'byung ba'i snying po 'di'o //
T02TD2627E:261a-9: rang gi snying gnas phyung ngo zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i ye shes ston pa'o //
T02TD2627E:261a-10: de nyid aom pu n+ye zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste de'i phan yon ni /
T02TD2627E:261a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi ste sems can dmyal ba dang byol song dang yi dags su skyes pa'i sems can rnams grol bar byed pa nyid kyis rab tu shes so //
T02TD2627E:261a-12: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byas te snang bar byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul du byas nas zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs 'di gsungs ma thag tu ngan song gsum las zhi zhing grol te /
T02TD2627E:261a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus grol zhing zhi bar rang rang shes so //
T02TD2627E:261b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sprul pa'i sku'i rnam par byas nas sangs @261b rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu gnyis yum gyi lhums su gshegs ba dang sku mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul ston ba'i bar mdzad nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:261b-1: kyang zhes bya ba ni mdzad pa gnyis dang /
T02TD2627E:261b-4: mdzad pa nyi shu rtsa bdun dang /
T02TD2627E:261b-5: mdzad pa brgya rtsa bcu dang /
T02TD2627E:261b-6: mdzad pa mtha' yas pa yang mdzad nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:261b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi chos kyi yi ge 'di nyid du zhugs par gyur to zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad de ni 'dir phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02TD2627E:261b-8: thugs kyi chos kyi zhes bya ba ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i ye shes so yi ge zhes bya ba ni de'i rtags zla ba'o //
T02TD2627E:261b-9: de la bkod pa'i yig 'bru la yang yi ge zhes bya ba bshad de ji skad du /
T02TD2627E:261b-10: yi ge byang chub sems yin te //
T02TD2627E:261b-11: gnyis pa sgra zhes bya bar bshad //
T02TD2627E:261b-12: ces bya ba bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:261b-13: 'di nyid du zhugs par gyur to zhes bya ba ni sprul ba'i sku de dag kyang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du zhugs par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:261b-14: 'dis ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog sgom pa rnams kyis phyag na rdo rje lte ba'i dbus su bzhugs pa la snying gnas 'od zer byung ste sngags kyi 'od des brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa bkug nas bstod cing gsol ba btab nas /
T02TD2627E:261b-15: yang rang gi snying gar zla ba la sngags bkod de /
T02TD2627E:261b-16: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rnams mdzad nas sngags dang 'dres pa las zhu bar gyur pa te thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid las gtso bo bskyed par bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:261b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:261b-18: tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje 'od byed pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te bri ba dang zad ba med pas tshe dpag tu med pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rtog pas mi phyed pas /
T02TD2627E:261b-19: rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis dag pas 'od byed pa zhes bya ba yin la /
T02TD2627E:261b-20: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang ming de skad ces bya ste snyoms par byas pa ni de gzhan la sbyin pa'i rnam pa thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:262a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das tshe tshad med pa'i phyag rgya @262a * //
T02TD2627E:262a-2: snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad do zhes bya ba 'og nas 'byung ba 'di bshad do //
T02TD2627E:262a-3: de nyid aom a'a mi ta zhes bya ba nas sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
T02TD2627E:262a-4: de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu ni sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi'o zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2627E:262a-5: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te zhes bya ba ni the tshom med par gzung 'dzin gyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms shing 'khrud pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
T02TD2627E:262a-6: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ming de skad ces bya ba zhing gzhan la sbyin pa'i rnam pa thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:262a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sgrib pa gcod pa zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02TD2627E:262a-8: snying po 'di thugs ka nas phyung ngo zhes bya ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags te /
T02TD2627E:262a-9: de nyid aom ka ka ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:262a-10: 'di bshad ma thag tu yang thams cad de bzhin gyur to zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2627E:262a-11: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2627E:262a-12: sgrib pa thams cad dri med cing //
T02TD2627E:262a-13: zhes bya ba ni gzung 'dzin gyi dri ma dang bral ba so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD2627E:262a-14: de nyid rnam par rtog pa'i rdo rje zhes pa'o //
T02TD2627E:262a-15: de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sbyin pa'i rnam pa thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:262a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sgrib pa rnams ma lus par 'joms pa zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o//
T02TD2627E:262a-17: snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo zhes bya ba ni de skyed par byed pa dang lam sbyang ba'i sngags te /
T02TD2627E:262a-18: aom ratne zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:262a-19: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te phan yon no //
T02TD2627E:262a-20: de nas yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gdon mi za bar mi 'joms pa thams cad rnam par 'joms nas zhes bya ba ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes te /
T02TD2627E:262a-21: sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa la sogs pa 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:262a-22: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa'i rnam pa thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad nas so //
T02TD2627E:262b-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni don yod grub @262b pa'o ;
T02TD2627E:262b-1: / snying po'i gzungs 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no /
T02TD2627E:262b-2: gsang sngags 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan gsum du g-yos shing ya mtshan 'jig rten du snang bas sngags kyi che ba bstan to //
T02TD2627E:262b-3: de nas bsdu zhing byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o ;
T02TD2627E:262b-4: / de nas dkyil 'khor ni 'di yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las dang /
T02TD2627E:262b-5: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ston to //
T02TD2627E:262b-6: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2627E:262b-7: de yang 'dir dang por re zhig nyams dga' ba'i sa phyogs su stan la 'dug la /
T02TD2627E:262b-8: lce dang lag pa byin gyis brlab pa dang rdo rje 'jigs byed nas brtsams te 'og bcing pa'i mthar thug pa dang /
T02TD2627E:262b-10: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod pa la sogs pa dang lha dang lha ma yin gyis bstod de mi snang bar gyur pa'i bar dang /
T02TD2627E:262b-11: stong pa nyid dang aa las zla ba dang sa bon dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang lha'i rnal 'byor dang byin gyis brlab pa dang dbang bskur ba dang phyag na rdo rje thugs yongs su rdzogs pa'i sbyor bas dkyil 'khor bskyed de /
T02TD2627E:262b-12: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dgug pa dang /
T02TD2627E:262b-13: ngan 'gro sbyong zhing dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang dbang bskur nas /
T02TD2627E:262b-14: sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas //
T02TD2627E:262b-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstod pa dang /
T02TD2627E:262b-16: dkyil 'khor lus la brtags ba dang bcas pa ni dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2627E:262b-17: de nas stong pa nyid du bsgom pa dang khang pa brtsegs ma dang 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa'i lte ba la babs te phyag na rdo rje nyid kyi thugs kar /
T02TD2627E:262b-19: ma h'a pu n+ye aa pa ri mi ta pu n+ye dzny'a na samba ro pa tsitte ka ri ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2627E:262b-20: zhes bya ba bkod nas 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas te gsol ba 'debs pa'i lha rnams dang bcas pa thugs ka'i zla bar zhugs pas zla ba dang bcas pa zhu nas shes rab dang thabs su gyur nas sngags de nyid gyur pa las phyag na rdo rjer gyur nas de'i thugs kyi zla ba'i aom a'a: ni ti zhes bya ba la sogs pas mi bskyod pa bskyed de /
T02TD2627E:262b-21: shar gyi rtsibs pa la gdon /
T02TD2627E:262b-22: aom ka ka ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas lho phyogs kyi rin chen 'byung ldan gdon /
T02TD2627E:263a-0: aom ratne zhes bya ba la @263a * //
T02TD2627E:263a-1: sogs pas nub phyogs kyi 'od dpag tu med pa gdon /
T02TD2627E:263a-2: aom aa ka ka zhes bya ba la sogs pas byang phyogs su don yod grub pa gdon /
T02TD2627E:263a-3: h'um tram hr'i aa zhes pas l'a sya la sogs pa brgyad de mtshams kyi cha la gzhag / de nas gtso bo dang tha mi dad pas bsdu /
T02TD2627E:263a-4: phyag dang ched du brjod de dbang blang lcags kyu la sogs pas las bya zhing dbang bskur te tshe bsring ba'i las la sbyar las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin no //
T02TD2627E:263a-5: de nas bzla bar bya ba brjod cing sgo dbye ba sngon du 'gro bas bsdu /
T02TD2627E:263a-6: lcags kyu la sogs pas las bya zhing mchod yon sngon du 'go bas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab /
T02TD2627E:263a-7: dbang bskur mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod de /
T02TD2627E:263a-8: lha thams cad kyi thugs ka'i zla ba la sngags bkod nas bzlas brjod bya /
T02TD2627E:263a-9: thun bzhi'i tha mar bstod pa sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa dang phyag dang dbang bskur ba dang go bgo ba dang dge ba'i rtsa pa bsngo ba dang brjod par gsol ba dang rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bkrol te gshegs su gsol ba dang sprul pa dang lus la bsdu ba brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:263a-10: de nas langs te glegs bam bklag pa la sogs pa ci nus bya'o //
T02TD2627E:263a-11: de ltar byas pas zla ba drug gam lo gcig gam lha rnams las gnang ba thob pa dang 'bum phrag gcig gi bar du byas te sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2627E:263a-12: de nas sngar bshad pa bzhin dus gzung ba dang lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga dang /
T02TD2627E:263a-13: thig byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:263a-15: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD2627E:263a-16: sgo ba bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD2627E:263a-17: rta babs bzhi dang ldan par bya //
T02TD2627E:263a-18: zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:263a-19: phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor spyir lte bar bcas shing sgo khyud dang ldan pa /
T02TD2627E:263a-20: lte ba dang ni sgo khyud ldan //
T02TD2627E:263a-22: nang gi dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi'i lte ba dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:263a-24: dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bya ste //
T02TD2627E:263a-25: rtsibs bzhi pa dang ldan pa la //
T02TD2627E:263a-26: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor ldan par bya //
T02TD2627E:263a-28: de ru lha gang bri zhe na //
T02TD2627E:263a-29: de yi dbus su gtso bo ni //
T02TD2627E:263a-30: phyag na rdo rje dril bsnams shing //
T02TD2627E:263b-1: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bri ba gsungs so //
T02TD2627E:263b-2: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i lte bar gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa zhi ba phyag na rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams shing kha dog dkar po zhal 'dzum par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:263b-3: 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la shar du mi bskyod pa /
T02TD2627E:263b-6: byang du don yod grub pa bri ste thams cad kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha lugs can kha dog dkar po dbu rgyan la sogs pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa g-yas pa mchog sbyin du byed pa /
T02TD2627E:263b-7: g-yon mi 'jigs pa rdo rje'i skyil krung gis so //
T02TD2627E:263b-8: nang gi grva la l'a sye la sogs pa bri'o //
T02TD2627E:263b-9: phyi'i grva la dhuppe la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:263b-10: sgo bzhi la sgom bzhi bri ste g-yon brkyang ba dang /
T02TD2627E:263b-12: mthun pa'i rkang thams cad kyis gnas par bri ste /
T02TD2627E:263b-13: de nas gzhan yang bris pa ltar bar snang las 'ongs te gcig tu bsre ba dang /
T02TD2627E:263b-14: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bum pa'i mchog dang gtor ma dang rta babs dang chos klog pa dang /
T02TD2627E:263b-15: me tog sil ma bkram pa dang bcas pa ni de nas zhes bya bas ston te /
T02TD2627E:263b-16: rnal 'byor bdag nyid zhugs zhes bya ste /
T02TD2627E:263b-17: zhugs nas lhag chad bskang ba dang sgo dbye ba sngon du 'gro bas ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan par gnas pas sgo dbye ba ston to //
T02TD2627E:263b-18: de nas bsdu zhing spyan drang ba ni sngags kyis lha rnams spyan drangs te /
T02TD2627E:263b-19: dza: h'um bam ho:bha ga b'a na badzra ae hya hi sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2627E:263b-20: de nas gtso bo byon pa dang //
T02TD2627E:263b-22: mdor na mchod pa byas nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:263b-24: mdor bsdun lcags kyu la sogs pas las bya zhing bgegs bsal sgo bcad pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du byas nas /
T02TD2627E:263b-25: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab dbang bskur bzlas brjod bya ba rnams ni mdor na zhes bya'o //
T02TD2627E:263b-26: mchod pa byas nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:263b-27: aarga mchog bstabs pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa bya'o //
T02TD2627E:263b-28: kyang zhes bya ba ni gtor ma dang sbyin sreg dang gnang ba nod pa bsdu'o //
T02TD2627E:263b-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa bstan to //
T02TD2627E:263b-31: 'chi bdag sbrul dang 'dra bas 'jigs ldan rnams gzhom pa'i phyir gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:264a-0: aom badzra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya @264a * //
T02TD2627E:264a-1: bas ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcings la rin chen thogs te yang na phreng ba thogs te gzhug / h'um pra t'itstsha badzra h'um zhes bya bas me tog dor /
T02TD2627E:264a-2: badzra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya bas dam tshig sbyin /
T02TD2627E:264a-3: aom badzra h'a syod gha tra ya zhes bya bas gdong g-yogs dgrol /
T02TD2627E:264a-4: aom badzra p'a shya h'um zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor bstan nas snying gar phyag rgya dgrol /
T02TD2627E:264a-5: 'di'i sgrub pa'i go rims ni rtsa ba'i rgyud du bshad zin to //
T02TD2627E:264a-6: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbang bskur ba bstan to //
T02TD2627E:264a-7: de yang dang bor dbu rgyan dang /
T02TD2627E:264a-17: shes rab kyis dbang bskur ba rnams yin te /
T02TD2627E:264a-18: 'di yang rtsa ba'i rgyud du bshad pa de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:264a-19: de ltar dbang bskur na tshe ring ba'i rig pa 'di sbyin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di nyid du dbang bskur ba dang dam tshig thob pa la dngos grub sbyin no zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2627E:264a-20: de ltar sngar bshad pa ltar bskur nas tshe ring ba thob par byed pa'i rig pa 'di slob dpon gyis slob ma la sbyin no //
T02TD2627E:264a-21: de nyid aom bh'um badzra a'a yu she h'um aa zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2627E:264a-22: de nas sgrub pa 'di yin te zhes bya ba ni 'dis sgrub pas na bsgrub ste 'og gnas 'byung ba'i chogs so //
T02TD2627E:264a-23: 'di yin te zhes bya ba ni ston pas rtsom pa'o //
T02TD2627E:264a-24: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje tshe dpag med zla ba'i 'od can zhes bya ba la sogs pas dang po bri ba dang bsnyen pa ston te bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med kha dog dkar po rgyan kun gyis brgyan pa g-yas pa mchog sbyin dang g-yon pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa de las bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bri'o //
T02TD2627E:264a-25: de'i 'og tu rnal 'byor pa thal mo sbyar ba gdong gyen du bltas pa /
T02TD2627E:264a-26: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang bcas pa ras la bris te spyan dbye ba'i cho ga sngar bshad pa bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2627E:264a-27: de'i spyan sngar dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom ste bcom ldan 'das la sems bzhin du 'bum bzlas so //
T02TD2627E:264a-28: de nas zla ba nya ba la zhes bya ba la sogs pas sgrub pa ston te /
T02TD2627E:264a-29: nya'i nub mo dkyil 'khor chen po brtsams te mchod pa byas la ba dmar ser gyi mar snod gsar bar bcug la rdo rje khu tshur g-yon pas mnan la /
T02TD2627E:264b-0: bcom ldan 'das srog @264b dang bcas pa lta bur sems shing mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:264b-1: de nas dri sna tshogs bsnams shing zhes bya ba la sogs pas mtshan ma dang dngos grub ston to //
T02TD2627E:264b-2: de nas dri dang ldan pa 'am rlangs pa 'am /
T02TD2627E:264b-3: du ba'am me 'am 'od zer ram me sgron nam 'od la sogs pa'i mtshan ma byung na mar me de yang mar sar pa la sogs pa rdza sa bcu gcig po gang yang rung ba la bsres te /
T02TD2627E:264b-4: nang par sngar srung ba dang /
T02TD2627E:264b-5: khrus la sogs pas bdag nyid dkyil 'khor brtags pa'i tshul du sbyangs nas /
T02TD2627E:264b-6: lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te 'thungs sam zos na nyi ma dang zla ba yod kyi bar du tshe ring ba rdo rje dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:264b-7: mtshan ma tha ma byung na /
T02TD2627E:264b-8: nad med zo mdog bde skra dkar dang gnyer ba med pa'i tshe lo brgya par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:264b-9: gzhan yang des nyungs kar la sogs pas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las 'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med do //
T02TD2627E:264b-10: de ltar tshe tshad med pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad nas /
T02TD2627E:264b-11: da ni 'jig rten pa'i lha la mos pa'i don du 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor drug bstan te /
T02TD2627E:264b-12: de yang dang por de nas rgyal po bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyal po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ston to //
T02TD2627E:264b-13: de nas zhes bya ba ni dang po'i sbyor ba'i rjes thogs so //
T02TD2627E:264b-14: de yang 'dir gtsug tor du bshad pa las /
T02TD2627E:264b-15: rgyal po bzhi dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:264b-16: de nyid kyi snying gar dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i dus su gtso bo'i thugs kar zla ba la sngags bkod de //
T02TD2627E:264b-17: ngan 'gro sbyong ba'i dus su rgyal po bzhi yang dgug pa dang bcas pa bsgom zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:264b-18: rgyal po bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bshad du gsol zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2627E:264b-19: de yang rgyal chen bzhis mos pa byed pa'i sa thob pa'i phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas sems can ngan 'gro las bskyab ba dang /
T02TD2627E:264b-20: tshe phyi ma dang 'di'i don du rang rang dgod ba'i snying po dang /
T02TD2627E:264b-21: sprul pa la sogs pa bshad kyis /
T02TD2627E:264b-22: de la brten ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal du gsol zhes gsol ba gdab bo //
T02TD2627E:264b-23: rgyal po chen po dag legs kyis shod cig dang ngas rjes su yi rang zhing byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni khyod kyis zhus pa bzhin du ngas byin gyis brlab cing bshad pa'o zhes bya'o //
T02TD2627E:265a-1: gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po la bos te zhes bya ba nas rang rang gi snying po phul te /
T02TD2627E:265a-2: aom bee gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i'o //
T02TD2627E:265a-3: aom dhi dri za'i rgyal po'i'o //
T02TD2627E:265a-4: aom bi grul bum gyi rgyal po'i'o //
T02TD2627E:265a-5: aom khya klu'i rgyal po ste 'di dag gis de rnams dgod pa la sogs pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:265a-6: sgo ba rnams kyi ni dza: h'um bam ho:zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:265a-8: sbyor ba dang po bsgom pa la khang pa la brtsigs ma dang gdan bskyed la rgyal po bzhi dang bcas pa bsams nas snying po de rnams kyis rgyal po gnas rnams su bkod de /
T02TD2627E:265a-9: phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka las sgo ba bzhi bton nas bsgom pa ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2627E:265a-10: de nas bsdu zhing byin gyis brlab pa ni las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:265a-11: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:265a-12: slob dpon gyi las dang slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa ston te /
T02TD2627E:265a-13: de yang rgyal po chen po de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad pa ni /
T02TD2627E:265a-14: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa nang gi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2627E:265a-15: de'i lte ba la snga ma bzhin du rdo rje 'dzin pa zhi ba bri pa'o //
T02TD2627E:265a-16: byang phyogs kyi rtsibs la lus ngan po ne'u le'i rgyal ba thogs pa rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa sboms pa seng ge'i gdan la gser gyi mdog can bum pa bzang po'i kha nas chu 'bab pa dang /
T02TD2627E:265a-17: dpag bsam gyi shing dang bcas par bri'o //
T02TD2627E:265a-18: shar phyogs kyi rtsibs la yul 'khor srung pi wang bsgreng ba ljang gu rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2627E:265a-19: lho phyogs kyi rtsibs la lus 'phags ral gri lag na thogs pa bri'o //
T02TD2627E:265a-20: nub phyogs kyi rtsibs la mig mi bzang rdo rje dang zhags pa 'dzin pa mgo bo la sbrul mgo bdun gyis bskor pa mig dmar zhing shin tu 'bur ba bri'o //
T02TD2627E:265a-21: sgo bzhi'i phyogs su lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bri'o //
T02TD2627E:265a-22: de nas dgongs ka'i dus la bab pa dang rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rnal 'byor pa nyid du zhugs la lhag chad zhi bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2627E:265a-23: me tog dor ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas ting nge 'dzin gsum dang yang sgo phye ste dang po rdo rje 'dzin pa spyan drang /
T02TD2627E:265a-24: de nas aom bee zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2627E:265a-25: btags pas rgyal po spyan drang /
T02TD2627E:265b-0: @265b lcags kyu la sogs pas las bya /
T02TD2627E:265b-2: dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa bya ba dang cho ga bzhin du phyi rol tu gtor ma dbul sbyin sreg bya zhing gnang ba nod ces bya ba ston to //
T02TD2627E:265b-3: de nas sngags mkhan sngags 'di dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzhug pa dang dbang bskur ba phan yon dang bcas pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:265b-5: aom badzra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di dang /
T02TD2627E:265b-6: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas rigs bzhi po gang yang rung ba me tog gam /
T02TD2627E:265b-7: rin chen thogs su gzhug go //
T02TD2627E:265b-8: de nas pra t'itstsha ba ma ho dha ma zhes bya bas dor ro //
T02TD2627E:265b-9: gang la babs pa de 'dis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:265b-10: de nas sngar bshad pa bzhin du padma la bzhag ste /
T02TD2627E:265b-11: phyi rol du gnas pa'i bum pa bzhis dbang bskur zhing phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgyar bskyed la dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2627E:265b-12: de nas dbang nyi shu rtsa gcig po kun snga ma bzhin du bskur nas rgyal por gyur pa dang /
T02TD2627E:265b-13: rgyal po yang gling gcig dang /
T02TD2627E:265b-14: gling bzhi la dbang bskur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:265b-15: phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgyar bskyed pa bzhin du gzhan yang rgyal po bzhi'i phyag rgya bskyed de lan bzhir dbang bskur zhing zhugs na rdo rje 'dzin pa dang rgyal po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pas rtag tu skyong ba dang gzhan gyi gnod pa dang nad dang 'chi bdag gi 'jigs pa dang mu ge la sogs pa'i gnod pa 'joms so //
T02TD2627E:265b-16: rgyal po bzhis khyad par du zhi ba dang mngon spyod dang dbang dang rgyas pa byed de /
T02TD2627E:265b-17: de ltar ma byas na phyag na rdo rje la 'khrus par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:265b-18: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyogs skyong ba bcu rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ston te /
T02TD2627E:265b-19: de nas zhes bya ba ni phyogs skyong bcu dang bcas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste mdor na dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin te de'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2627E:265b-20: phyogs skyong ba bcu rnams kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2627E:265b-21: phyogs skyong ba bcu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te sems can gyi don du rang gi snying po dang dbul bar gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02TD2627E:265b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas rang gi snying po phul ba /
T02TD2627E:265b-23: aom ai zhes bya ba nas aom bra zhes bya ba'i bar brgya byin dang /
T02TD2627E:266a-3: phag rnams kyi snying po yin ta 'dis ni 'di rnams dgod pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:266a-4: de nas bsdu zhing byin gyis brlab pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2627E:266a-5: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las dang slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa ston te /
T02TD2627E:266a-6: de yang ting nge 'dzin gsum dang sa dang lhag par gnas pa byas pa de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa la sogs pa'i dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bris la /
T02TD2627E:266a-7: de'i lte ba la rdo rje 'dzin pa snga ma bzhin gzhag / phyogs skyong rnams shar la sogs ba'i char brgya byin la sogs pa gzhag / lte ba la spyan sngar nyi ma dang phag kyang gzhag / sgo rnams su lcags kyu la sogs pa yang gzhag / de nas ting nge 'dzin gsum la sogs pa dang sbyan drang ba dang mchod pa bya /
T02TD2627E:266a-8: de nas slob ma gzhug pa'i don du yang bdag nyid gcig pu zhugs nas /
T02TD2627E:266a-9: gnang ba nod pa'i mthar thug par bya zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2627E:266a-10: slob ma rnams ni gzhug byas shing //
T02TD2627E:266a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang dbang bskur ba dang phan yon ston to /
T02TD2627E:266a-12: dang po slob ma rnams sngar rtsa ba'i rgyud du bshad pa bzhin du gzhug cing /
T02TD2627E:266a-13: phyogs skyong ba'i bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur te /
T02TD2627E:266a-14: dbang bskur ba gzhan rnams kyis kyang dbang bskur te snying po sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:266a-15: de nas bsgrubs na 'grub par the tshom med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:266a-16: de nas de dag mgu nas ni //
T02TD2627E:266a-17: 'di skad du ni tshig gsol to //
T02TD2627E:266a-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brgya byin la sogs pas zhus pa ste dbang bskur ba'i phan yon yin te go sla bsam bshad do //
T02TD2627E:266a-19: de nas gza' chen po brgyad ces bya ba la sogs pas gza' chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor ston to //
T02TD2627E:266a-20: de nas zhes bya ba la de nas zhes bya ba ni dang po'i sbyor ba ste /
T02TD2627E:266a-21: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba ni phyag na rdo rje gza' chen po rgyu skar dang bcas pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:266a-22: gza' chen po brgyad ces bya ba la sogs pa la gza' 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rang rang gi snying po phul ba la byin gyis brlabs nas rang rang gi snying po bzlas pa ni /
T02TD2627E:266a-23: aom aa zhes bya ba nas aom ra zhes bya ba'i bar pa bsangs dang /
T02TD2627E:266b-4: spen pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2627E:266b-5: smin drug la sogs rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang bcas pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:266b-6: de nas bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlab pa ni snga ma bzhin te ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum mo //
T02TD2627E:266b-7: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad do zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las ston te de yang ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis bsnyen pa byas nas sa dang lhag par gnas pa'i rjes la thig gdab pa sngon du 'gro bas ji skad du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2627E:266b-8: nang gi chos kyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa lte ba dang bcas pa bris la /
T02TD2627E:266b-9: dbus kyi padmo'i lte ba la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i khro bo gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:266b-10: padma 'dab ma brgyad kyi mtshams bzhi bor ba'i phyogs bzhi la rdo rje dang /
T02TD2627E:266b-14: rtsibs la shar du pa bsangs /
T02TD2627E:266b-17: byang du gza' lag / shar lhor mig dmar /
T02TD2627E:266b-21: sgo bzhir lcags kyu la sogs pa khros pa bri /
T02TD2627E:266b-22: khor yug gi phyi rol du smin drug nas bra nye'i mthar thug par rgyu skar bdun bdun phyogs re rer bri'o //
T02TD2627E:266b-23: 'dir l'a sye la sogs pa rnams mi bri ba ni 'jig rten pa'i lhar dngos grub stsol ba'i rgyur gyur pas mchod pa bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:266b-24: de nas khrus la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pas lcags kyu la sogs pas las bya zhing /
T02TD2627E:266b-25: mchod pa dang gnang ba nod pa snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2627E:266b-26: de nas slob ma rnams gzhug ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzhug pa dang dbang bskur ba'i phan yon dang bcas pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:266b-27: aom badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsum gyis gzhug pa'i khyad par bstan to //
T02TD2627E:266b-28: lhag ma ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
T02TD2627E:266b-29: de nas gza' brgyad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pas dbang bskur rdo rje'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur /
T02TD2627E:266b-30: dbang bskur ba lhag ma rnams kyis kyang dbang bskur /
T02TD2627E:266b-31: gza' yi dam 'di ltar bzung ste snying po don tsam gyi sgo nas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:266b-32: 'dir sgrub pa'i khyad par ma bshad pa ni rgyu ni gsum yin te /
T02TD2627E:267a-0: dbang dang dam tshig kho na gtsor zung shig / dbang gi 'bras bu gza'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa gsum @267a * //
T02TD2627E:267a-2: klu'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa gsum ni dbang dang dam tshig dang dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa kho na'o //
T02TD2627E:267a-3: 'di ltar bstan pa de yang des 'dul ba'i gang zag la sogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2627E:267a-4: de nas phan yon gza' rnams kyis 'dod pa thams cad sgrub po //
T02TD2627E:267a-5: rgyu skar dang skad cig dang yud tsam dang thang gcig dang /
T02TD2627E:267a-6: dus gcig dang zla tshigs dang sbyor ba dang khyim dang dus sbyor dang 'jug phod la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni rgyu skar de dag nyid skad cig la sogs pa la dbang ba dang /
T02TD2627E:267a-7: dus drug pa la sogs pa nas zla tshigs la dbang ba dang /
T02TD2627E:267a-8: dpal la sogs pa'i 'byor pa dang /
T02TD2627E:267a-9: khyim dang dus sbyor ba la sogs pa 'grub pa dang 'jug phod bzang ngan byed pa dang zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:267a-10: lhag ma rnams ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02TD2627E:267a-11: de nas klu chen brgyad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas klu'i dkyil 'khor ston te /
T02TD2627E:267a-12: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2627E:267a-13: de yang snga ma las klu chen brgyad dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:267a-14: klu chen brgyad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2627E:267a-15: rang gi skad cig tsam gyis mtshon pa'i sgras bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byas te snying po dbul bar zhus pa dang /
T02TD2627E:267a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rang rang gi snying po phul ba /
T02TD2627E:267a-17: aom phu: zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:267a-18: aom phu: zhes bya ba'i bar mtha' yas dang /
T02TD2627E:267a-20: karko ta dang rigs ldan dang /
T02TD2627E:267a-21: nor rgyas dang dung skyong dang padma dang chu lha rnams kyi yin no //
T02TD2627E:267a-22: de snga ma bzhin du bshad pas dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bstan to //
T02TD2627E:267a-23: de nas bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlab pa ni snga ma bzhin du las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin no //
T02TD2627E:267a-24: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las bstan to //
T02TD2627E:267a-25: de yang sngon du bsnyen pa dang sa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga dang /
T02TD2627E:267a-26: thig gdab pa dang bcas par bya ba la de nas zhes bya'o //
T02TD2627E:267a-27: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad de /
T02TD2627E:267a-28: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa kha dog dkar po de'i lte bar rdo rje 'dzin pa khro bo dbu la sbrul mgo bdun mtha' yas pa yod par bri'o //
T02TD2627E:267b-0: dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams nas mtha' yas nas chu lha'i bar mthar thug par padma re re la sbrul @267b mgo bdun bdun mgo la yod pa /
T02TD2627E:267b-1: chung mas lag pa g-yas pas mgul nas 'khyud par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:267b-2: 'di dag dang phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang sgo la sogs pa med na ni rgya mtsho chen po la brten pa'i dbang du byas nas dus de la dgongs nas bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:267b-3: de'i phyir padma yang chu dang 'dam las skye ste 'di dag kyang padma la gnas pa nyid do //
T02TD2627E:267b-4: gzhan dag tu ni gzhal yas khang dang bcas par yang bshad do //
T02TD2627E:267b-5: gzhan yang bum pa brgyad dang /
T02TD2627E:267b-6: gtor ma dang shin tu mdzes pa'i bshos dang /
T02TD2627E:267b-7: 'byung po'i gtor ma mar dang 'o ma dang sbrang rtsir bcas par bri'o //
T02TD2627E:267b-8: de nas khrus bya ba sngon du 'gro bas zhugs la ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:267b-9: sbrul mgo'i phyag rgyas rang gi skad mtshon pa phu: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod de /
T02TD2627E:267b-10: lcags kyu la sogs pas las bya ba snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:267b-11: de nas bu ni rgyal po dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob ma gzhug pa ston to /
T02TD2627E:267b-12: de nas rgyal po dang rgyal rigs rtsa ba'i rgyud du bstan pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor du bcug nas dug gi nyes pa bsal ba'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:267b-13: phu: zhes bya bas drangs pa'i sngar bshad pa'i sngags rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2627E:267b-14: de nas aom be'u zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i snying po tsam brjod nas klu rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:267b-15: de nas de dag mgu nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla ba'i phyir ma bshad do //
T02TD2627E:267b-16: klu'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du dbang thob pa rnams la dngos grub bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:267b-17: de nas sgrub pa bshad ces bya ba la sogs pas dngos grub bshad de /
T02TD2627E:267b-18: de yang dang por gnas dpen par khrus byas pa sngon du 'gro bas bdag rdo rje 'dzin par bsams te /
T02TD2627E:267b-19: de'i dbul sbrul mgo de las lha rdzas kyi 'od zer gyi phreng ba dkar po bdud rtsi 'bab pa lta bur bsams ta /
T02TD2627E:267b-20: phu: zhes bya ba thun mong gi snying po 'bum bzlas la bsnyen pa byas te /
T02TD2627E:267b-21: de nas klu'i dkyil 'khor bsams te mchod la dug gis zin pa'am /
T02TD2627E:267b-22: g-yan pa'am 'tshe ba la sogs pas zin pa la dbu'i lha rdzas 'od zer gyi phreng bas bkang ste /
T02TD2627E:268a-0: de'i don du phu: zhes bya bas klu'i dkyil 'khor bsams te lag pa sbrul mgo'i zhags pa 'dra bas drang zhing @268a * //
T02TD2627E:268a-1: phu: zhes brjod la 'od zer gyi rlung gis gtor la /
T02TD2627E:268a-4: tha mar dus pa la gnas pa'i dug rnams phu: zhes bya ba dang sbrul mgos drangs na 'drongs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don ni sgrub pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:268a-5: de nas las thams cad byed cing dug rims dang dug sbyar ma la sogs kyi dus su snga ma bzhin du spyar na khu tshur gyis kyang 'byin te /
T02TD2627E:268a-6: sbrul mgo'i phyag rgya smos ci dgos //
T02TD2627E:268a-7: zhes bya ba khyad par du gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:268a-8: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor ston to //
T02TD2627E:268a-9: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2627E:268a-10: lha chen po rnams kyi bdag po 'jigs byed chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'jigs byed rang gi 'khor bud med brgyad dang bcas pas bskor bas phyag byas te zhus pa'i don to //
T02TD2627E:268a-11: skrag cing smyo ba la sogs pa la phan gdags pa'i slad du snying po phul la gsol pa btab pa dang /
T02TD2627E:268a-12: bshad par gnang nas 'jigs byed chen po kho nas 'jigs pa'i sgra phyung ste smras pa ni aom bhe ra zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2627E:268a-13: aom ba sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i bar yin te /
T02TD2627E:268a-18: gzhon nu ka rti ka dang /
T02TD2627E:268a-21: tshogs kyi bdag po khros pa dang bcas pa /
T02TD2627E:268a-22: chung ma dang bcas pa rnams kyi snying po yin te /
T02TD2627E:268a-23: dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin ston te gang gi phyir 'jigs byed chen po kho nas smras she na /
T02TD2627E:268a-24: bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po ni /
T02TD2627E:268a-25: brgyad po de dag bdag ngag nyan //
T02TD2627E:268a-26: zhes bya ba gsungs te gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ngag nyan pa'o //
T02TD2627E:268a-27: ting nge 'dzin gsum pa ni de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:268a-28: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las ston te de bzhin du bsnyen pa la sogs pa thams cad byas pa phyi'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'i nang du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa lte ba dang bcas pa bris nas /
T02TD2627E:268a-29: rdo rje 'dzin pa khro bo 'jigs byed chen po chung ma dang bcas pa zhabs 'og tu non par bri /
T02TD2627E:268a-30: shar phyogs kyi rtsibs su brgya byin la sogs pa /
T02TD2627E:268b-0: lho'i phyogs kyi rtsibs @268b la tshangs pa khros pa /
T02TD2627E:268b-1: nub phyogs kyi rtsibs la gtogs 'dod khros pa /
T02TD2627E:268b-2: byang phyogs kyi rtsibs la gzhon nu karti ka khros pa /
T02TD2627E:268b-3: shar lho'i rtsibs la tshogs kyi bdag po khros pa /
T02TD2627E:268b-4: lho nub kyi mtshams su bhridgi ri ti khros pa /
T02TD2627E:268b-5: nub byang gi mtshams su dga' byed dbang phyug khros pa /
T02TD2627E:268b-6: byang shar gyi rtsibs la stobs bzangs khros pa chung ma dang bcas ba bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:268b-7: rgyud 'dir ni lha rnams kyi kha dog dang phyag mtshan dang gdan dang dbyibs la sogs ba ma bstan pa ni 'gro ba 'dul ba rnams kyi phyag mtshan la sogs pa nges pa med pa'i phyir ma bstan to //
T02TD2627E:268b-8: yang dkyil 'khor du dgod pa'i dus su ni bya ba dang spyod pa dang /
T02TD2627E:268b-9: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gzhan rnams las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:268b-10: 'dir yang sgo ba rnams ni khro ba dang ldan par bri la /
T02TD2627E:268b-11: sngar bshad pa bzhin du bum pa la sogs pa rnams gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:268b-12: de nas ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pas sgo dbye ba la sogs pa lcags kyu la sogs pas las bya ste khrag gis bkang pa'i thod pas mchod pa dang /
T02TD2627E:268b-13: sha chang gi gtor ma dang /
T02TD2627E:268b-14: snod mgo'i thod rnams khrag chang gis bkang ba gzhag / bum pa brgyad 'jigs byed kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams kyis mchod cing phyi rol du gtor ma byin la gnang ba nod pa'i bar du bya'o //
T02TD2627E:268b-15: de nas 'jig rten gsum rgyal po'i //
T02TD2627E:268b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob ma gzhug pa ton to //
T02TD2627E:268b-17: slob dpon gyi las rnams kyi rjes thogs la 'dir 'jug pa'i phyag rgya ni drag po yin pa'i phyir 'jig rten gsum rgyal gyi phyag rgyas sngar bshad pa bzhin du bcug la /
T02TD2627E:268b-18: bum pa'am mgo'i thod pa brgyad kyi khrag lce la myang du gzhug cing dbang bskur ba thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2627E:268b-19: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di nyid du dbang thob pa la sbyin par ston to //
T02TD2627E:268b-20: de nas dang por re zhig bud med kyi khyim mam /
T02TD2627E:268b-21: shing gcig par lce dang lag pa byin rlabs nas brtsams te 'jig rten gsum rgyal du bskyed nas mchod de /
T02TD2627E:268b-22: aom bhee ra zhes bya ba 'bum phrag bzhir bzlas pa nas tha mar mtshan yal nas su gnas te de nas sgra thos nas khrag gi thod pa phul te 'jigs byed de mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:269a-1: rgyal h'um zhes bya ba dran par byed cing thod pa bkang ste yang phul na grub nas ci 'dod ces bya bar smra bar byed de sa sbyin pa ma gtogs par khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi nga rgyal du bsgoms pas gsol ba btab na khu ba la sogs pa thams cad sbyin par byed do //
T02TD2627E:269a-2: mi skrag par bya ste skrang na de ma thag tu gsod do //
T02TD2627E:269a-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas lha chen po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ston te /
T02TD2627E:269a-4: de nas zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin te tshangs pa la sogs pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:269a-5: tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2627E:269a-6: lha chen po rnams kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag byas te zhus pa'i don rang gi snying po bshad par 'dod pa la byin gyis brlab par gsol ba btab nas /
T02TD2627E:269a-7: rang gi snying po smras pa zhes bya ba nas kra zhes bya ba'i mthar thug par te dbang phyug chen po dang /
T02TD2627E:269a-11: gzhon nu kati ka dang tshogs kyi bdag po dang bhridgi ti ti dang stobs bzangs rnams kyi yin no //
T02TD2627E:269a-12: 'di'i bshad pa snga ma bzhin dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2627E:269a-13: ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:269a-14: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las bstan to //
T02TD2627E:269a-15: bsnyen pa la sogs pa thams cad byas la de nas tshe dpag tu med pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa bris la /
T02TD2627E:269a-16: lte ba la rdo rje 'dzin pa khro bo /
T02TD2627E:269a-17: shar gyi rtsibs la dbang phyug chen po //
T02TD2627E:269a-19: nub kyi rtsibs la tshangs pa /
