T02TD2627E:269a-21: rang rang gi chung ma dang bcas pa bri ste lcags kyu la sogs pa bzhi yang khros pa dang bcas pa bris la /
T02TD2627E:269a-22: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams nas stobs bzangs dang /
T02TD2627E:269a-25: gzhon nu karti ka gzhag / bya dang bum pa la sogs pa thams cad kyang snga ma bzhin du gzhag / de nas zhugs pa sngon du 'gro bas ting nge 'dzin gsum dang phyag rgya bzhis rgyas bdab pa la sogs pa mchod pa'i mthar thug pa thams cad dga' ba chen pos mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:269a-26: de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa ni //
T02TD2627E:269b-0: zhes bya ba la @269b sogs pas slob ma gzhug pa'i las la sogs pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:269b-1: 'dir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya bcings la snga ma bzhin du bcug nas /
T02TD2627E:269b-2: aom pra t'i tstsha zhes bya ba la sogs pas me tog dor ba /
T02TD2627E:269b-4: bstan par bya ba la sogs pa thams cad snga ma bzhin du'o //
T02TD2627E:269b-5: de nas sngags kyis btab pa'i bum pa brgyad kyis dbang bskur /
T02TD2627E:269b-6: dbang bskur ba lhag ma yang rtsa ba'i rgyud du bshad ba bzhin shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:269b-7: de nas lha rnams gang dga' ba'i //
T02TD2627E:269b-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di nyid du dbang dang dam tshig thob pa la dngos grub sbyin pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:269b-9: gang la dga' ba'i sngags byin la snga ma bzhin du rdo rje 'dzin pa bsams te 'bum phrag gnyis bsnyen pa byas nas shes pa'i gnas su dkyil 'khor chen po bsams te bsgrubs na nas phyed na lha 'ongs nas ci 'dod pa sbyin gyis soms te smros shig / de nas lha la gsol ba ci 'dod pa gdab bo /
T02TD2627E:269b-10: de nas bla ma dang slob dpon la cha re dbul ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud du bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:269b-11: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis po mtha' dag tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu lam bco lnga dang /
T02TD2627E:269b-12: 'jig rten pa'i yon tan mtha' dag kyang bstan te go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02TD2627E:269b-13: 'jig rten pa'i drug bar du ci'i phyir bstan zhe na /
T02TD2627E:269b-14: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang sku gsum dang rigs gsum gyi bsdus pa'o //
T02TD2627E:269b-17: tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bstan pa de dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang por ston to //
T02TD2627E:269b-18: de nas de dag la 'jug pa yang byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i sa yan chad thob pa yin pas sbyor ba'i lam la gnas pa thob pa'i rang bzhin can rgyal po bzhi dang phyogs skyong bcu dang /
T02TD2627E:269b-19: gza' chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor dang dbang dang dam tshig dang gtso bor gyur pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:269b-20: sbyor ba'i lam mngon par rtogs pa dang 'brel ba'i rang bzhin la gzhan gyi don byed pa gtso bor 'gyur bas /
T02TD2627E:269b-21: klu chen po brgyad dang 'jigs byed chen po dang /
T02TD2627E:269b-22: lha chen po'i dkyil 'khor gtso bor gyur pa bstan to //
T02TD2627E:270a-0: de dag byang chub sems dpa' mos pas spyod pa'i sa la gnas @270a * //
T02TD2627E:270a-2: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD2627E:270a-3: de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang rgyal po bzhi dang 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad dang /
T02TD2627E:270a-4: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /
T02TD2627E:270a-5: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang po dang nor bzangs po chen po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa rnams dang zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:270a-6: de nas yang sa bcu dang sangs rgyas kyi sa la sku gsung thugs nyid du 'byung bas 'chi bdag 'joms pa gsung dang /
T02TD2627E:270a-7: bde ba chen po sku dang /
T02TD2627E:270a-8: khro bo thugs kyi dkyil 'khor te gsum gyis bshad do //
T02TD2627E:270a-9: de ltar na rgyu 'bras kyi go rims su bshad nas zhes bya ba yin la /
T02TD2627E:270a-10: grangs kyang nges pa 'di tsam gyis bstan to //
T02TD2627E:270a-11: de ltar 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor drug bshad nas /
T02TD2627E:270a-12: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chib bdag 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor ston te /
T02TD2627E:270a-13: de nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin sbyor ba dang po'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2627E:270a-14: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gzigs nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mthu chen po'i rig bshad du gsol zhes bya ba sbyar ro //
T02TD2627E:270a-15: de yang phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis 'khor la gzigs te 'dzum pa dang /
T02TD2627E:270a-20: rtse ba dang rmad kyi ya mtshan snang bar gyur to //
T02TD2627E:270a-21: de la lha rnams dam par gyur nas phyag 'tshal te 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu dris pa dang /
T02TD2627E:270a-22: phyag na rdo rjes gsan nas lha rnams la 'chi bdag 'joms bar byed pa'i rig pa thos sam zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
T02TD2627E:270a-23: phyag 'tshal zhing mgu zhing dang ba'i dad pa skyes te legs so zhes bya ba sngon du 'gro bas tshe bsring zhing 'chi bdag zhi bar bya ba dang ngan song grol bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2627E:270a-24: 'khor ba spangs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bgyi ba'i slad du rig pa bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:270a-25: snga ma ni tshe 'di la gnas pa'i don du bshad pa kho na yin la /
T02TD2627E:270a-26: 'di ni 'di dang phyi ma gnyis ka nas thams cad yin pa'i phyir khyad par de yod do //
T02TD2627E:270b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes lha rnams kyis gsol ba'i tshig gsan nas zhes bya ba ni sngar gsol ba @270b btab pa'i tshig gsan nas so //
T02TD2627E:270b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rig sngags 'di nyid sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo zhes bya ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i rig sngags 'di nyis sku las 'od zer /
T02TD2627E:270b-3: thugs las nges pa'i ye shes phyung ngo zhes bya ba'i don to ;
T02TD2627E:270b-4: / de nyid aom pu n+ye zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:270b-5: snying po rig pa'o zhes bya ba ni snying po ni ye shes lnga'o //
T02TD2627E:270b-7: de ston pa'i sgra la yang de skad ces gdags so //
T02TD2627E:270b-8: 'dis ni thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la bri ba'i rig pa dang bzlas brjod du bya ba bstan to //
T02TD2627E:270b-10: nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o zhes bya ba ni mngon sum pa'i rgyu'i rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2627E:270b-11: de'i sgra yang snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2627E:270b-12: phyag na rdo rje'i snying po'o //
T02TD2627E:270b-13: aom bhrum sv'a h'a snying po'o //
T02TD2627E:270b-14: nye ba'i snying po rig pa zhes byas pa la snying po ni gzugs kyi sku'o //
T02TD2627E:270b-15: nye ba'i snying po ni rig pa'o//
T02TD2627E:270b-16: mngon sum pa'i rgyu ye shes te de'i sgra yang snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2627E:270b-18: aom grum sv'a h'a snying po yang dag par bskul ba'o zhes bya ba ni thugs rjes thugs yang dag par bskul ba'i rig pa'o //
T02TD2627E:270b-19: de'i sgra yang snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2627E:270b-21: aom tram sv'a h'a snying po dam ba'o zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te sgral yang de bzhin no //
T02TD2627E:270b-22: nam mkha'i snying po'i rig pa'o //
T02TD2627E:270b-24: gsang ba'i snying po'o zhes bya ba ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes te spyan ras gzigs kyi rig pa'o //
T02TD2627E:270b-25: 'di dag gis ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bstan to ;
T02TD2627E:270b-26: / snga ma bzhin du bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:270b-27: las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:270b-28: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bstan te zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las bstan te snga ma bzhin du bsnyen pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris te /
T02TD2627E:270b-29: nang gi dkyil 'khor du 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi ba bris la dbul su de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang tshogs dang gzi brjid tshad med pa gzhag pa bhr'um zhes bya bas so //
T02TD2627E:270b-30: spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje ste hri zhes bya ba'i snying pos gzhag go //
T02TD2627E:271a-0: byang phyogs su khro bo ste krum @271a * //
T02TD2627E:271a-1: zhes bya ba'i snying pos so //
T02TD2627E:271a-2: lho phyogs su nam mkha' snying po'i snying po ste /
T02TD2627E:271a-3: tram zhes bya ba'i snying pos so //
T02TD2627E:271a-4: nub phyogs su spyan ras gzigs te hri zhes bya ba'i snying pos so //
T02TD2627E:271a-5: kun gyi 'od la aom pu n+ye zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rig pa bri'o //
T02TD2627E:271a-6: dbang bskur ba'i bum pa lnga dang /
T02TD2627E:271a-7: mchod pa'i bum pa brgyad dang /
T02TD2627E:271a-8: tram zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi bzlas brjod byas te gzhag go //
T02TD2627E:271a-9: bdug pa la sogs pa'i mchod rdzas kun la /
T02TD2627E:271a-10: krum zhes bya ba'i bzlas pas gzhag /
T02TD2627E:271a-11: gzhan yang mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad dang sgo ba bzhi snga ma bzhin du bri'o //
T02TD2627E:271a-13: dgongs ka'i dus la bab pa dang //
T02TD2627E:271a-14: zhes bya ba ni de nas sngags mkhan bdag nyid zhugs la bde bar gshegs pa sras dang 'bangs su bcas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor te rig pa dang lhan cig spyan drang ngo //
T02TD2627E:271a-15: de nas bdag nyid dbang bskur te //
T02TD2627E:271a-16: skyil krung bcas te 'dug la stong phrag brgyar bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa'am rdo rje 'dzin pa'am /
T02TD2627E:271a-17: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug kyang rung ste mngon sum du mthong nas 'dod pa'i mtshan ma so sor thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:271a-18: ci ste mnyam par ma bzhag na yid kyis thams cad nus par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:271a-19: de nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2627E:271a-24: ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya ma ti kra ma tha ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya dh'a ra a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal bskyed la zhes bya ba ni sngags pa nyid zhugs la lhag chad zhi bar byas nas ting nge 'dzin gsum sngon du 'gro bas sgo phye ste /
T02TD2627E:271a-25: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rig pa dang lhan cig spyan drang ngo //
T02TD2627E:271a-26: de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas las bya /
T02TD2627E:271a-32: sbyin sreg dang gnang ba nong pa'i bar du bya'o //
T02TD2627E:271a-33: de nas slob ma 'jug pa'i cho gas zhugs te /
T02TD2627E:271a-34: bdag nyid dbang nyi shu rtsa gcig bskur nas /
T02TD2627E:271a-35: skyil krung bcas nas 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo mngon sum du mthong nas 'bras bu mchog thob po //
T02TD2627E:271b-0: bzlas brjod ma byas kyang yid kyis las thams cad byed nus bar @271b 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:271b-1: de nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2627E:271b-2: rdo rje 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas 'jug pa yin no zhes bya ba'am /
T02TD2627E:271b-5: khro bo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jug pa ni nga yin zhes nga rgyal bskyed la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:271b-6: de nas slob ma rnams gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa ston te de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud du bshad pa bzhin du ye shes dbab pa'i mthar thug pa byas la 'dir me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:271b-7: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pra t'i tstsha ho sa ma ya stv'am /
T02TD2627E:271b-8: de nyid brjod la mgo la bcings gdong g-yogs dgrol //
T02TD2627E:271b-9: lha ngo bstan 'jug pa'i phyag rgya snying gar bstan /
T02TD2627E:271b-10: dbang bskur bar bya ste snga ma bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sgor ba zhag la /
T02TD2627E:271b-11: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi shinytsa badzra dh'a tu aa dzny'a h'um bhr'um /
T02TD2627E:271b-12: zhes bya ba dang gtso bo'i bum pas dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2627E:271b-13: aom badzra badzra aabhi shinytsa h'um h'um /
T02TD2627E:271b-14: zhes byas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bum pas dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2627E:271b-15: aom ratna aa bhi shinytsa h'um tram /
T02TD2627E:271b-16: zhes bya bas nam mkha'i snying po'i bum pas dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2627E:271b-17: aom padma aa bhe shinytsa h'um hr'i:/
T02TD2627E:271b-18: zhes pas spyan ras gzigs kyi bum pas dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2627E:271b-19: de nas karma aa bhi shinytsa h'um krum zhes bya ba dang khro bo'i bum pas dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2627E:271b-20: dbang lhag ma nyi shus kyang dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2627E:271b-21: de la dam tshig ni 'di yin no //
T02TD2627E:271b-22: dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub kyi sems dang bla ma mi spang ngo //
T02TD2627E:271b-23: srog chags mi gsad ma byin par mi blang /
T02TD2627E:271b-24: brdzun du smra bar mi bya /
T02TD2627E:271b-25: gzhan gyi bud med la mi spyad //
T02TD2627E:271b-26: bla ma'i grib ma la mi 'gom //
T02TD2627E:271b-27: slob dpon du yon tan can ma yin pa mi gzung /
T02TD2627E:271b-28: slob dpon gyi mtshan nas mi brjod /
T02TD2627E:271b-29: sngags dang phyag rgya dang lha la mi smad gal te glen pas smad na nad kyis thebs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:271b-30: snying po dang lha'i grib ma dang phyag rgya dang gom bas mi 'gom /
T02TD2627E:271b-31: dkon mchog gsum dang bstan pa la gnod pa dang bla ma la smod pa rnams ngan sngags kyis gsad par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:271b-32: log par lta ba dang sdig pa spyod pa dang sems can la gnod pa dang dam tshig la sdang ba rnams snying rje chen pos ngan sngags kyis gsad par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:272a-1: pa can gyi nor blangs la //
T02TD2627E:272a-2: phongs pa rnams la sbyin par bya //
T02TD2627E:272a-3: bla ma la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2627E:272a-4: dam tshig bsgrub pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2627E:272a-6: dam tshig can la phan pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2627E:272a-7: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la mchod pa'i phyir du 'jungs pa rnams kyi nor da brog go //
T02TD2627E:272a-8: sems can la phan par 'dod pas bla ma'i nor dang /
T02TD2627E:272a-9: srog chags kyi srog bsrung ba'i phyir brdzun du smra bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:272a-10: sangs rgyas mnyes par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig srung ba dang bsgrub pa'i phyir gzhan gyi bud med bsten par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:272a-11: de dag kyang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD2627E:272a-12: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas thams cad spyad cing bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur te mnyes par mi 'gyur na /
T02TD2627E:272a-13: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i thabs kyis smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:272a-14: de nas bka'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:272a-15: de nas las kyi rdo rje lag tu byin la las kyi dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:272a-16: dbang bskur ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud du bstan pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:272a-17: de nas bla ma la lus dang nor dang dbyig dang 'bru dang stan dang bran dang khang pa dang rgyal po yin na rgyal srid dang bu dang bu mo dang chung ma dang ma dang sring mo dang tsha bo dang /
T02TD2627E:272a-18: gzhan yang ci bzhed pa thams cad rang la phan pa'i phyir bla ma la dbul lo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:272a-19: de nas byang chub bar du ni //
T02TD2627E:272a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dngos grub ston te /
T02TD2627E:272a-21: 'di nyid du dbang dang dam tshig thob pa de nas byang chub thob pa'i bar du sangs rgyas nyid dang /
T02TD2627E:272a-22: byang chub sems dpa' dang 'jig rten pa'i mthu chen rnams sgrub par 'dod pas slob dpon la dngos grub rnams gsol ba gdab bo //
T02TD2627E:272a-23: de nas slob ma la phan pa'i phyir slob dpon ser sna med cing sems dad pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma la dngos grub rnams sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba sbyin no //
T02TD2627E:272a-25: chos rnams thams cad dngos med par //
T02TD2627E:272a-26: sems kyis bsgom pa byas nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:272a-27: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02TD2627E:272a-28: rang gi sa bon de dbus su //
T02TD2627E:272a-29: bsams nas dam tshig phyag rgya dag / bsams shing de bzhin de nyid du //
T02TD2627E:272a-30: sgrub pa yis ni bsgyur bar bya //
T02TD2627E:272a-31: lha yi rnal 'byor tshul du bsgyur /
T02TD2627E:272b-0: @272b de nas rang gi sa bon dang //
T02TD2627E:272b-1: phyag rgyas phyag rgya de byin brlab //
T02TD2627E:272b-2: lag 'og go rims ji bzhin du //
T02TD2627E:272b-3: sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2627E:272b-4: de nas nga rgyal bskyed nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:272b-6: chos rnams thams cad ces bya ba ni mtshan nyid 'dzin pas na chos te dngos po thams cad do //
T02TD2627E:272b-7: dngos po med par zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang bral bas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2627E:272b-8: rgyu dang bral ba de yang rgyu yod pa las skye'am med pa las skye'am gnyi ga las skye zhe na /
T02TD2627E:272b-9: ci dang por yod pa las ma yin te ngo bo nyid yongs su grub zin pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus gzhan du skye ba don du mi rigs so //
T02TD2627E:272b-10: gzhan du gal te yod pa skye bar 'gyur ba ni skyes zin pa'ang skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:272b-11: med pa las kyang mi skye ste shin tu gzugs med pa'i ri bong gi rva la sogs pa dang 'dra zhing skye bar 'jug pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:272b-12: gzhan du 'di dag thams cad med par 'gyur zhing gang gi phyir dngos po'i phyogs gang yang rung ba 'ga' zhig las kyang dngos po thams cad rtag tu skye bar thal bar 'gyur bas rgyu dang 'bras bu nges pa med par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:272b-13: gal te so so'i nus pa nges par mi 'gyur bar dngos po 'di rnams kyi nus pa so sor nges par gyur na ni dngos po de rnams las cung zad cig skye bar 'gyur bas khyad par med pas kyang thams cad med pa yin no zhe na /
T02TD2627E:272b-14: de ni mi rigs te 'bras bu rnams dang 'dres pa'i gzugs rnams rkyen du gyur na ni de'i tshe de rnams kyis so sor nges pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel par 'gyur bas 'bras bu gang zhig la nges par nus pa yin /
T02TD2627E:272b-15: de lta na nus pa nges pa med pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:272b-16: de bas na thams cad las thams cad skye bar thal bar 'gyur bas bzlog dka' bar 'gyur ba dang yod pa dang med pa'i phyogs su smras pa'i nyes pa dang 'dres par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:272b-17: gnyi ga las kyang mi skye ste gcig la ngo bo nyid gnyis su 'gyur ba med de /
T02TD2627E:272b-18: gcig pa nyid dang gnyis pa nyid ni phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir de yang /
T02TD2627E:272b-19: yod dang med pa'i don la yang //
T02TD2627E:272b-20: rkyen ni rung ba ma yin te //
T02TD2627E:272b-21: yod na rkyen gyis ci zhig bya //
T02TD2627E:272b-22: med na gang gi rkyen du 'gyur //
T02TD2627E:273a-2: med dang yod min mi sgrub pa //
T02TD2627E:273a-3: ji ltar sgrub byed rgyu zhes bya //
T02TD2627E:273a-4: de ltar yin na mi rigs so //
T02TD2627E:273a-5: rkyen rnams so so 'dus pa las //
T02TD2627E:273a-6: 'bras bu de ni med pa nyid //
T02TD2627E:273a-7: rkyen rnams las ni gang med pa //
T02TD2627E:273a-8: de ni rkyen gyis ji ltar skyed //
T02TD2627E:273a-9: ci ste de ni med par yang //
T02TD2627E:273a-10: rkyen de dag las skye 'gyur na //
T02TD2627E:273a-11: rkyen dag las kyang 'bras bu ni //
T02TD2627E:273a-12: ci yi phyir na skye mi 'gyur //
T02TD2627E:273a-14: sems kyi bsgom pa byas nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:273a-15: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du don bsgom zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2627E:273a-16: snga ma las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom zhes bya ba ni rang gi sems nyid zla ba dang po dang gnyis par bsgom pa'o //
T02TD2627E:273a-17: rang gi sa bon de dbus su //
T02TD2627E:273a-18: bsams shing dam tshig phyag rgya dag / ces bya ba ni dbus su rang gi sa bon las dam tshig gi phyag rgya bskyed par bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:273a-19: bsam zhing de bzhin de nyid du//
T02TD2627E:273a-20: sgrub pa pos ni bsgyur bar bya //
T02TD2627E:273a-21: zhes bya ba ni sku gsung thugs dpag tu med pa 'dus pa'o //
T02TD2627E:273a-22: lha yi rnal 'byor tshul du bsgyur //
T02TD2627E:273a-23: zhes bya ba ni de nyid las lha'i sku rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:273a-24: de nas rang gi sa bon dang //
T02TD2627E:273a-25: phyag rgya phyag rgyas de byin brlab //
T02TD2627E:273a-26: ces bya ba ni byin gyis brlab pa rang gi sa bon /
T02TD2627E:273a-27: aom sarba bid badzra aadhi tishtha dzny'a na sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba dang phyag rgya gnyis bcings te /
T02TD2627E:273a-28: snying ga la sogs pa'i gnas bco brgyad du byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02TD2627E:273a-29: lhag 'og go rims ji bzhin du //
T02TD2627E:273a-30: sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2627E:273a-31: zhes bya ba ni snying gar dkyil 'khor gzhan du sprul te zhugs nas de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan ngang /
T02TD2627E:273a-36: brtul zhugs sbyin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:273a-37: de nas nga rgyal bskyed nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:273a-38: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po la sogs pas rgyas btab nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:273a-39: kyang zhes bya ba ni mchod pa bsdu'o //
T02TD2627E:273a-40: 'di skad du ston pa yin te /
T02TD2627E:273b-0: rigs rnams kyi zlos pa pos khrus kyi cho ga sngon du 'gro ba las lha la sogs pa mchod de mi snang bar gyur bar byas la dang po chos thams cad rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sgo nas stong pa @273b nyid du bsgom /
T02TD2627E:273b-1: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2627E:273b-3: sa bon las dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer zhugs pa dang gzugs nyid rdzogs par byed pa dang /
T02TD2627E:273b-4: rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te sngags brjod la byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD2627E:273b-5: snying gar sprul te 'jug pa dang /
T02TD2627E:273b-6: dbang rnams kyis dbang bskur ba dang rgyas gdab pa dang mchod pa yang bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:273b-7: mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub byas na //
T02TD2627E:273b-8: zhes bya ba ni bsnyen pa dang mtshan thog thag tu bsgoms nas zhes bya ba'i don to//
T02TD2627E:273b-11: dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos //
T02TD2627E:273b-13: 'dis ni rtog pa thams cad kyi dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed pa dang dngos grub kyi cho ga ston to //
T02TD2627E:273b-14: de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor 'dir gzhug pa'i phan yon bstan te go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02TD2627E:273b-15: de nas lha de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pas dbang bskur ba dang bzlas brjod ston te /
T02TD2627E:273b-16: bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas zhus pa'i don tshe thung ba dang /
T02TD2627E:273b-17: ngan song du skyes par 'gyur ba ma mchis na ji ltar bsgrub ces zhus pa dang /
T02TD2627E:273b-18: lhan du dkyil 'khor du chug cig / chos kyi yi ge zlos su chu gcig / de tshe ring bar 'gyur /
T02TD2627E:273b-20: ngan song las grol bar 'gyur zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:273b-21: tshe 'di la gnas pa'i don bshad nas /
T02TD2627E:273b-22: pha rol tu 'phos pa rnams kyi don du ngan song du skyes zin pa rnams ming la sogs pa la bkug la lan bdun du dkyil 'khor du bcug la dbang bskur na ngan song las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2627E:273b-23: shi ba'i ming nas smos te sngar bshad pa'i rig pa'i rgyud nyid 'bum phrag stong gi bar du bzlas brjod byas pa la yang kha dog du klog pa'i tshul gyis byas na /
T02TD2627E:273b-24: mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pa yang 'byang bar 'gyur na sdig pa chung du lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes phan yon gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:274a-0: lha'i bu rnams zhi ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ngan @274a * //
T02TD2627E:274a-1: song du skyes zin pa rnams sbyang ba ston te zhi ba'i hom khung tha ma khru gang bar ma khru do mchog khru bzhi pa zlum po nyid du byas nas ming dang sngags spel te nyungs kar gyis brgya phrag stong du sbyin sreg byas na ngan song las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:274a-2: de'i sha dang rus pa dang skra dang thal ba dang gzugs brnyan la sogs pas brgya phrag stong du sbyin sreg byas na yang ngan song las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:274a-3: thab khung la sogs pa la ci zhig bri zhe na /
T02TD2627E:274a-4: de'i dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dang 'od zer dkar po bri //
T02TD2627E:274a-5: 'khor yug la rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od zer dkar po bri /
T02TD2627E:274a-6: de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa la shar phyogs su rdo rje gzhag / byang du rgya gram /
T02TD2627E:274a-7: lho phyogs su rdo rje rin chen /
T02TD2627E:274a-9: sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyir phyag rgya sna tshogs pa gzhag par bya ste mu rang dkar po'i nang du phyi rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya bri ba ni gza' dang skar ma dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang bcas pa bri /
T02TD2627E:274a-10: gtso bo gang zhig tu gzhag ce na /
T02TD2627E:274a-11: ri mo 'am lugs ma yang rung /
T02TD2627E:274a-12: shar phyogs kyi rtsibs la rdo rje can dang lhan cig gzhag / gzhan yang byang du bum pa dang gtor ma dang lha bshos rab tu bkang ba gzhag / mdor na thig gtab [?] nas cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya /
T02TD2627E:274a-13: de nas dkar po'i gos gon rnal 'byor dang ldan pas ngan song gi rgyud na gnas pa'i sems can drang zhing sdig bzhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang dag pa'i sems kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2627E:274a-14: rdzas ci zhig gis bya zhe na /
T02TD2627E:274a-15: mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang /
T02TD2627E:274a-16: chan dang 'bras yos dang yungs kar dang de'i rus pa la sogs pa bsres te sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2627E:274a-17: rus pa la sogs pa med na ming nas smos te bya'o //
T02TD2627E:274a-18: de ltar zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis bde 'gror skyes nas /
T02TD2627E:274a-19: rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg mkhas pas rgyas par bya dgos te zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rnal 'byor pas khru do pa dang khru bzhi pa dang /
T02TD2627E:274a-20: mchog la khru brgyad pa byas nas ho ma khung khru bzhi pa mu ran dang ldan pa de'i dbus su padma dang rin po che'i 'od zer ser po dang ldan par bri'o //
T02TD2627E:274a-21: de'i khor yug tu rin po che /
T02TD2627E:274a-23: phyi rol du rtsibs chen po bzhi la /
T02TD2627E:274b-2: byang du sna tshogs rdo rje /
T02TD2627E:274b-3: shar du 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gtso bo'i ri mo la sogs pa bri'o //
T02TD2627E:274b-4: grva rnams su lha mo brgyad kyi phyag mtshan /
T02TD2627E:274b-5: sgor lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:274b-6: de nas gos ser po bgos nas mtho ris na gnas pa dran par byed cing de la phan zhing rgyas par bya ba'i phyir rgyas pa'i las snga ma bzhin du byas nas /
T02TD2627E:274b-7: de'i tshe dang dpal dang gzi brjid dang longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir de ltar rgyas ba'i las bya'o //
T02TD2627E:274b-8: de nas dbang du bya ba'i las bshad pa ni /
T02TD2627E:274b-9: de nas phan phyir nges par yang ;
T02TD2627E:274b-10: / dbang du bya ba'i las bshad do //
T02TD2627E:274b-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rgyas par bya ba nas dbang du bya ba'i las ni thab khung gzhu'i dbyibs 'dra ba dang /
T02TD2627E:274b-13: bar ma khru do mchog khru bzhi par byas la de'i dbus su padma dmar po bris la /
T02TD2627E:274b-14: lte ba la mda' dang gzhu bri /
T02TD2627E:274b-15: 'khor yug tu mda' dang gzhu bri /
T02TD2627E:274b-16: sngags shes pas mu ran la yang mda' dang gzhu bri /
T02TD2627E:274b-17: phyi rol lhag ma rnams zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang 'dra bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:274b-18: de nas sems can de dran par byas te gos dmar po gon la padma'am 'bras bu dmar po tshon gyis sbrus nas mar dang gur gum dang bsres nas /
T02TD2627E:274b-19: tsandan dmar po'i phye ma'i sbyin sreg byas na thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:274b-20: de nas mngon spyod bstan pa ni //
T02TD2627E:274b-21: de la gdon rnams gzhom pa'i phyir //
T02TD2627E:274b-22: mngon spyod kyi las ni brtsam par bya /
T02TD2627E:274b-23: dbang du gyur pa de la gzhom pa'i phyir mngon spyod brtsam par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:274b-28: dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu pa mu khyud la rtse gsum pa dang /
T02TD2627E:274b-29: rgya gram dang rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang /
T02TD2627E:274b-30: phyogs gcig rtse gsum pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD2627E:274b-31: dgra sta dang rdo rje rtse gcig pas bskor /
T02TD2627E:274b-32: phyi rol du lha'i gnas 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa dang l'a skye la sogs pa'i gnas dang /
T02TD2627E:274b-33: rdo rje rigs kyi gnas sum rim du bya /
T02TD2627E:274b-34: bya dang gtor ma dang bum pa dang bshos cha rnam pa mang po dang /
T02TD2627E:275a-0: chang dang khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa gzhag / de nas lus @275a * //
T02TD2627E:275a-1: can gyi sdig pa dang bgegs gzhom pa'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:275a-2: gos nag po bgos shing khro bo tshad mar byas la 'jig rten gsum rgyal du bskyed de snga ma bzhin du sbyin sreg byas nas /
T02TD2627E:275a-3: de nas de'i lus la sdig pa bcom nas bgegs dang bral te mtho ris lha dang mi'i nang na ci dga' bar spyod do //
T02TD2627E:275a-4: de nas thab kyi go rims dang po zhi ba dang de las rgyas pa 'byung bas rgyas pa dang /
T02TD2627E:275a-5: de nas dbang du bya ba de nas mngon spyod kyi las yin te /
T02TD2627E:275a-6: go rims 'di dag nyid kyis ni //
T02TD2627E:275a-7: de nas gang gi phyir byas pa //
T02TD2627E:275a-8: de yi phyir yang de bzhin 'gyur //
T02TD2627E:275a-10: tshe 'di nyid la gnas pa rnams kyi go rims phan yon dang bcas pa /
T02TD2627E:275a-11: gzhan dag gi las rnams kyang /
T02TD2627E:275a-12: snga ma bzhin du de ltar bya //
T02TD2627E:275a-13: des ni sems can rnams la yang //
T02TD2627E:275a-16: de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas brtag pa'i rgyal po'i phan yon dang /
T02TD2627E:275a-17: rgyud gtad pa bstan te go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02TD2627E:275a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor ston te /
T02TD2627E:275a-19: de nas zhes bya ba sbyor ba dang po'i rjes thogs la ste /
T02TD2627E:275a-20: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba ni phyag na rdo rje nyid yin par gzung ngo //
T02TD2627E:275a-21: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rje sngags dang phyag rgya dang snying po thams cad ces bya ba ni gsung dang thugs dang las dang sku thams cad do //
T02TD2627E:275a-22: stan par ba ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor yod pa las bstan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:275a-23: nyid kyi snying po 'di bshad do //
T02TD2627E:275a-24: zhes bya ba ni nyid kyi ye shes nges par bstan pa'i sgras gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:275a-25: de'i gnas la'ang bya ba ste de nyid aom badzra bhi h'um /
T02TD2627E:275a-27: aom a'a: h'um kun du bzang po'i'o //
T02TD2627E:275a-28: badzra h'um phat phyag na rdo rje'i'o //
T02TD2627E:275a-29: aom badzra kro dha badzra h'um phat /
T02TD2627E:275a-31: aom badzra dhi sgrib pa rnam par bsal ba'i'o //
T02TD2627E:275a-32: aom badzra h'um aa rgya gram bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2627E:275b-0: 'di dag gis kyang dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog sgom pa pos snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor lus la brtags @275b pa'i bar byas nas khang pa brtsegs pa dang gdan bskyed la kun rig gi dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin bsams la /
T02TD2627E:275b-1: dbus su bde ba chen po'am /
T02TD2627E:275b-2: rdo rje sems dpa' bsams la thabs dang ye shes rab kyi mtshan nyid las sngar bshad pa'i ye shes las sku /
T02TD2627E:275b-3: de'i thugs kar zla ba la yig 'bru rnams bkod de bskyed ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:275b-4: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2627E:275b-5: de nas bsdu zhing byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa las rgyal po mchog ces pa'i ting nge 'dzin snga ma bzhin shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:275b-6: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las ston to //
T02TD2627E:275b-7: sngon la bsnyen pa byas pa dang /
T02TD2627E:275b-8: sa lhag par gnas pa dag /
T02TD2627E:275b-9: chog thams cad spyad de de nas dkyil 'khor bshad pa ni /
T02TD2627E:275b-10: rtsa ba'i rgyud ltar dkyil 'khor bris la kun rig gi gnas su rdo rje 'am /
T02TD2627E:275b-12: bde ba chen po gang rung cig bri /
T02TD2627E:275b-13: de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje g-yas phyogs su rdo rje bsdams pa /
T02TD2627E:275b-14: nub phyogs su rnam par gsal ba /
T02TD2627E:275b-15: byang phyogs su rgya gram bsnams pa /
T02TD2627E:275b-16: de'i phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du /
T02TD2627E:275b-17: shar phyogs su ngan song sbyong ba /
T02TD2627E:275b-18: lhor rin chen tog / nub phyogs su sh'akya'i dbang po /
T02TD2627E:275b-19: byang phyogs su me tog cher rgyas /
T02TD2627E:275b-20: de'i phyi rol 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams la sems dpa' bcu drug po go rims bzhin du bri /
T02TD2627E:275b-21: khyams dang grva'i char byams pa dang /
T02TD2627E:275b-22: l'a sye la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2627E:275b-23: sgo gnyis pa'i nang du dpe med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bri /
T02TD2627E:275b-24: rim pa gnyis pa la kun dga' bo la sogs pa'i nyan thos gsum pa la rang sangs rgyas bri'o //
T02TD2627E:275b-25: mu ran dkar po'i nang du 'khor yug la rang rang gi bu dang chung mas bskor ba'i tshangs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2627E:275b-26: gza' dang skar ma'i lha rnams dang /
T02TD2627E:275b-29: de'i phyi rol gyi mtshams kyi char shar lhor dmyal ba /
T02TD2627E:275b-32: byang shar du mi'i 'gro ba bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:275b-33: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhir shar phyogs su 'dod chags bya /
T02TD2627E:275b-34: lho phyogs su zhe sdang sbrul /
T02TD2627E:275b-35: nub phyogs su gti mug phag / byang phyogs su bud med kyi gzugs bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:276a-2: phyi rol gyi sgor 'jig rten gsum mthar byed pa la sogs pa stobs kyi dam pa rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:276a-3: dri rnam pa lnga'i chus bkang ba'i gser gyi bum pa dang gtor ma dang lha bshos dang /
T02TD2627E:276a-4: me tog dbang bdug pa dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang 'phan dang bla re dang rnga ma dang dril bu dang /
T02TD2627E:276a-5: rdo rje nor bu dang do shal dang nyi ma la sogs pas brgyan zhing gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:276a-6: 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams kyi rang bzhin gzugs sdug pa la sogs pa lngas dkyil gyi 'khor nye 'khor kun du dgang ngo //
T02TD2627E:276a-7: de nas sbyor ba dang po la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sgo phye ste /
T02TD2627E:276a-8: spyan drangs la lha rnams mchod pa'i mthar thug pa byas pa'i rjes thogs la gnang ba nod mnos nas bdag nyid zhugs la bdag nyid dbang bskur la zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:276a-9: sngom gnas dam tshig ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa ston to //
T02TD2627E:276a-10: slob ma sdom pa la gnas shing dam tshig la gnas pa bla ma la mos pa stong pa nyid la mi 'jigs pa /
T02TD2627E:276a-11: rigs kyi skyon dang bral ba /
T02TD2627E:276a-18: rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang yid dang mthun pa'i slob mas snga ma bzhin du gsol ba btab ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sngags 'dis byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste /
T02TD2627E:276a-21: aom badzras ma ya pra be sha ya h'um /
T02TD2627E:276a-22: sngags 'dis me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:276a-23: aom badzra p'a ni pra ta'i tstsha badzra sa tva ma h'a su kha h'um ha ho sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2627E:276a-24: rang gi lha'i sngags dang phyag rgyas mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:276a-25: de nas dam tshig sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:276a-26: aom ji ste khyod kyis su yang rung ba la smras na /
T02TD2627E:276a-27: phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje 'bar bas khyod kyi mgo bo 'gas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:276a-28: 'dis dam tshig gi chu blud do //
T02TD2627E:276a-29: aom badzras ma ya hri tram h'um aa /
T02TD2627E:276a-31: aom badzra tsakshu p'a shes ham /
T02TD2627E:276a-32: aom ta dzny'a na be ta la na te /
T02TD2627E:276a-34: de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bstan la rtsa ba'i rgyud du bshad pa bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02TD2627E:276b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar @276b dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:276b-1: aom badzra p'a ni sva ya ti /
T02TD2627E:276b-2: aa nu ra ga te aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD2627E:276b-3: zhes phyag na rdo rje'i bum pas dbang bskur /
T02TD2627E:276b-4: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa sarba aa bhi she ka te h'um /
T02TD2627E:276b-5: rdo rje sems dpa'i bum pas dbang bskur /
T02TD2627E:276b-6: aom buddha dharm'a bhi shinytsa sarba buddha bi shi ka ta aom h'um /
T02TD2627E:276b-7: kun du bzang po'i bum pas dbang bskur /
T02TD2627E:276b-8: aom ratn'a bhi shinytsa sarba ratn'a bhi shi ka ta aom hri /
T02TD2627E:276b-9: rdo rje bsdams pa'i bum bas dbang bskur /
T02TD2627E:276b-10: aom padm'a bhi shinytsa sarba padm'a bhi she ka ta hri /
T02TD2627E:276b-11: rna pa gsal ba'i bum pas dbang bskur /
T02TD2627E:276b-12: aom karm'a bhi shinytsa sarba karm'a bhi she ka ta aa /
T02TD2627E:276b-13: sna tshogs rdo rje bsdams pa'i bum pas dbang bskur /
T02TD2627E:276b-14: dbang bskur ba lhag ma ni rtsa ba'i rgyud du bstan pa bzhin shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:276b-15: de nas lus la sogs pa yon du phul nas bka' nod par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:276b-16: de'i sngags aom sarba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:276b-17: de nas las thams cad byed du bcug cing dngos grub thams cad kyang sbyin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas dngos grub bstan to //
T02TD2627E:276b-18: bde bas bde ba bskyed nas ni //
T02TD2627E:276b-19: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po lhag pa'i lha thob pas bde ba chen po'i skur bskyed nas ni zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:276b-20: dkyil 'khor bzhi yi dbus su ni //
T02TD2627E:276b-21: kun du bzang ngam bde chen po//
T02TD2627E:276b-22: bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms nas kyang /
T02TD2627E:276b-23: snying gar h'um zhes bya ba nas //
T02TD2627E:276b-24: zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa bzhi'i dbus su bde ba chen po snga ma bzhin du bsgoms nas snying gar zla ba'i thog tu h'um zhes bya ba dang po'i bsnyen pa la mtshan ma thob kyi bar du bsams te mtshan thog thag bsams nas zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:276b-26: rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur //
T02TD2627E:276b-27: dpal ldan las rnams kun byed cing //
T02TD2627E:276b-28: kun du bzang por bdag nyid 'gyur //
T02TD2627E:276b-29: de ltar 'gyur bar the tshom med //
T02TD2627E:276b-31: gzhan yang 'chi bdag 'joms ba'i skabs su bshad pa bzhin du lha'i rnal 'byor rdzogs par bskyed la /
T02TD2627E:276b-32: h'um las phyag na rdo rjer bsgyur la snying gar 'di nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms te bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa bsgoms na phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:276b-33: h'um las sangs rgyas gzugs gyur na //
T02TD2627E:277a-2: snying gar 'khor lo rab bsgoms na //
T02TD2627E:277a-4: zhes gsungs pa'i don yin no //
T02TD2627E:277a-6: rdo rje khro bor mnyam gzhag ste //
T02TD2627E:277a-7: snying ga'i dbus su phat ces bya //
T02TD2627E:277a-8: h'um zhes bya bas bskor bsams te ;
T02TD2627E:277a-9: / khro bo stobs chen nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD2627E:277a-10: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du bsams te khro bor bsgyur la rang gi zla ba'i steng du phat ces bya ba h'um zhes bya bas bskor bar bsams te bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa bsgoms na khro bo stobs po che nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:277a-11: rdo rje bsdams par bdag bsgyur la //
T02TD2627E:277a-12: snying gar aom zhes bya ba yis //
T02TD2627E:277a-13: bskor ba'i h'um dang hri zla ba //
T02TD2627E:277a-15: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin rdo rje rin chen du bsgyur la /
T02TD2627E:277a-16: h'um hri gnyis zla ba'i dbus su bsams la /
T02TD2627E:277a-17: aom zhes bya bas bskor ba snying gar bsams la bsnyen pa dang sgrub pas rdo rje rin chen du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:277a-18: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje chos su bsgoms la snying ga'i dbus su tram zhes bya ba aom aom zhes bya bas bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa'i dus su zla ba la bsgoms pas phyag na padmo dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:277a-19: rdo rje bsgoms nas snying gi ni//
T02TD2627E:277a-20: dbus su hra'i zhes bya ba la //
T02TD2627E:277a-21: aom zhes bya bas bskor bsams na //
T02TD2627E:277a-24: gzhan yang snga ma bzhin du rdo rje las su bskyed la /
T02TD2627E:277a-25: aa las 'khor lo'i dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje dbus su h'um dang ldan pa aom zhes bya bas bskor ba bsnyen pa mtshan thog thag bzlas na rdo rje las dang mnyam par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:277a-26: 'khor lo rgya gram h'um ldan pas //
T02TD2627E:277a-27: aa: zhes bya ba bskyed nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:277a-28: aom zhes bya bas bskor bsams na //
T02TD2627E:277a-29: rdo rje las dang mnyam par 'gyur //
T02TD2627E:277a-31: rdo rje las rnams bshad bya ste //
T02TD2627E:277a-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pas las bshad de /
T02TD2627E:277a-33: de nas bshad par bya'i las rnams ni /
T02TD2627E:277a-34: zhi ba dang rgyas ba dang dbang dang mngon spyod kyi las rnams bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg gi sgo nas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:277b-0: zhi ba'i rnal 'byor pa rdo rje sems dpa' bsgyur la zhi ba'i las @277b brtsam zhing /
T02TD2627E:277b-1: dus ngan par bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg byed cing 'od zer sprin gyis de'i lus la 'og nas 'byung ba'i brdung ba'i sngags brjod cing 'phro bar gyur par bsgoms la shar du kha bltas nas gzhan gyi nyes pa sel bar byed la sems can la phan par dga' bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la mchod cing kun du bzang po'am bde ba chen po bsams nas nang par re re snga ma bzhin thams cad byas pas sdig pa zhi bar 'gyur zhes bya bar gnas so //
T02TD2627E:277b-2: rgyas pa ni 'od zer ser po dang ldan pa'i rin chen 'dzin du bsams la /
T02TD2627E:277b-3: zas dkar gsum bza' zhing nyi ma'i gung la rgyas pa'i las shis te /
T02TD2627E:277b-4: thab khung rin chen lta bur brkos la bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:277b-5: sngags pas snga ma bzhin du 'od zer ser pos lus dgong ngo zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2627E:277b-6: dbang du bya ba ni lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas thab khung padmo 'dra bar byas pa spyan ras gzigs su bdag bsgyur la nyi ma rgas pa'i mthar dbang du bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:277b-7: de yang lha gang dag gi rnal 'byor gyis 'grub par bstan pa ni /
T02TD2627E:277b-8: 'dren pa kun tu bzang pos ni zhi ba'i las bya'o //
T02TD2627E:277b-9: rdo rje rin chen gyi rnal 'byor ni rgyas gdab pa dbang bskur ba 'grub bo //
T02TD2627E:277b-10: rdo rje dpal gyi rnal 'byor ni rnam par rgyal ba dang longs spyod dang /
T02TD2627E:277b-11: dbang phyug dang dpal mnyam pa med pa 'grub bo //
T02TD2627E:277b-12: rdo rje nyi ma ni gzi brjid dang mdog shin tu 'bar ba gtso bor 'grub bo //
T02TD2627E:277b-13: bzhad pa ni dga' mgu rangs pa gtso bor 'grub bo //
T02TD2627E:277b-14: rdo rje chos ni chos thams cad brtags nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa gtso bor 'grub bo //
T02TD2627E:277b-15: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i rigs rnon pos gcod pa nyid du 'grub bo //
T02TD2627E:277b-16: ma rungs pa rnams rtsad nas gcod pa 'khor los gtso bor 'grub bo //
T02TD2627E:277b-17: mi smra ba smra bar mdzad cing ma rungs pa lkugs pas rdo rje smra ba gtso bor 'grub bo //
T02TD2627E:277b-18: rdo rje las kyi rnal 'byor gyis mchod pa dang sems can gyi don bya bar gtso bor 'grub bo //
T02TD2627E:277b-19: rdo rje srung bas bsrung pa gtso bor 'grub bo //
T02TD2627E:277b-20: ma rungs pa thams cad za ba rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gtso bor 'grub bo //
T02TD2627E:277b-21: rdo rje khu tshur gyis bcings nas gtso bor 'grub bo //
T02TD2627E:278a-1: 'byor gyis zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang /
T02TD2627E:278a-2: mngon spyod rnams la gcig dang bzhi dang bzhis gtso bor 'grub bo zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:278a-3: gzhan yang de dag gi thun mong gi 'bras bu ni /
T02TD2627E:278a-4: bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg gi las kyi dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:278a-5: zhi ba la 'od zer gsal bas bsgrub pa'i dngos po gang bar bsgom zhing /
T02TD2627E:278a-6: zhi ba lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi zhes bya'o //
T02TD2627E:278a-7: rang gi lus gser btsom lta bu dang /
T02TD2627E:278a-8: nyi ma shar ba lta bur bsams la rgyas pa'i las bya'o //
T02TD2627E:278a-9: 'od zer ser pos dgang bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:278a-10: spyan ras gzigs kyi rnal 'byor gyis hri dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer btang bas bsgrub par bya ba'i snying la kun du bskor nas byed cing bsams na 'dod pa thams cad dbang du byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:278a-11: de ltar las rnams bshad nas de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pas rtog pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i dus su rgyas gdab pa ston te /
T02TD2627E:278a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD2627E:278a-13: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir the tshom thams cad gcod pa ngan song thams cad bzlog pa'i rtog pa dam pa 'di bshad pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba ni dga' nas lan gnyis su zhus pa'o //
T02TD2627E:278a-14: de nas phyag na rdo rjes phyag rgya'i le'u 'di bshad do zhes bya ba ni bde bar byed pas na phyag rgya ste 'og nas 'byung ba'o ;
T02TD2627E:278a-15: / le'u zhes bya ba ni gos dang 'dra ba ste cho ga dang rim pa dang rnam par 'byed pa dang dum bu zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:278a-16: 'di bshad do zhes pa ni gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:278a-17: lag pa gnyis mdun du bzhag la aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs te zhes bya ba ni lag pa gnyis mdun du bzhag nas aa las zla ba h'um las rdo rje bskyed de thim pa'o //
T02TD2627E:278a-18: h'um zhes bya ba dang aa zhes zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi byin gyis brlabs la zhes bya ba ni h'um a'a:zhes brjod pas so //
T02TD2627E:278b-0: lag pa gnyis kyi thal mo gnyis ka la aa la sogs pa'i yi ge bcu drug @278b kun du gang zhing 'phro bar bya ste zhes bya ba ni zla ba la g-yas skor gyis aa a'a la sogs pa bcu drug 'od zer dang bcas te zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:278b-1: mthe bong gnyis la aom zhes bya ba bzhag nas gung mo gnyis la h'um zhes bya ba gzhag / mdzub mo gnyis la h'um zhes bya ba gzhag / srin lag gnyis la hri zhes bya ba gzhag / mthe bong la aa zhes bya ba bzhag ste de ltar yi ge rnams gzhag par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin par mos pa bskyed de zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa la aom las rnam par snang mdzad /
T02TD2627E:278b-2: h'um la sogs pa la ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bskyed /
T02TD2627E:278b-3: g-yon phyogs la aom las rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma /
T02TD2627E:278b-4: h'um la sogs pa la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bskyed de zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:278b-5: chos thams cad gcig la gcig 'dres pa dang gdan rjes su mthun par byas te zhes bya ba ni bde bar gshegs pa yab yum rnams badzra aanydza li zhes bya bas rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba dang bdag gis kyang de'i don bsgom zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:278b-6: lag pa gnyis padma lta bur sbyar ba byas nas /
T02TD2627E:278b-7: aom zhes bya ba gnyis brkyang ba dang aa zhes bya ba gnyis ba kug ste /
T02TD2627E:278b-8: de bzhin du h'um zhes pa dang /
T02TD2627E:278b-9: hri zhes bya ba gnyis gshibs te brkyang ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las thams cad dang ldan pa'i dam tshig gi'o zhes bya ba ni mthe bong gnyis brkyang mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag gnyis padma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar bya /
T02TD2627E:278b-10: gung mo gnyis gshibs te brkyang ba ni sdig pa sbyang ba la sogs pa las thams cad las mi 'da' ba'i phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:278b-11: de nyid rnon po dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD2627E:278b-12: de las rab tu 'khor lo dang 'dra ba dang 'khor lo'i zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo de nyid rnon po ltar byas te bskor na 'khor lo'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:278b-13: de nyid las khar gzhag pa ni sgra ste 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs so zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo de nyid khar gzhag pa sgra'i ste phyag rgya'i tshig tu 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:278b-14: de nyid gnyis su byas nas las kyi phyag rgyar byas nas las kyi'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:279a-0: rdo rje thal mo de nyid gnyis su byas nas rdo rje khu tshur du byas te rang rang gi snying @279a * //
T02TD2627E:279a-1: gar sbyar na las su 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:279a-2: g-yon pa mgo thod thogs 'dra dang //
T02TD2627E:279a-3: g-yas pa mdung rtse gsum pa zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa mgo thod thogs pa 'dra bar byas la g-yas pa mthe bos mthe'u chung mnan te /
T02TD2627E:279a-4: lhag ma gsum mdung rtse gsum pa ltar byas pa ni ma mo dang gshin rje'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:279a-6: g-yas pa aom zhes bya ba gzhag / ces bya ba ni g-yon pa padma kha 'dzum pa lta bu byas la /
T02TD2627E:279a-7: g-yas pa'i mtho bong kha'i phyogs su gzhag pa ni tshangs pa'i'o //
T02TD2627E:279a-8: g-yon pa 'khor lo dbyug rtse gsum ;
T02TD2627E:279a-9: / zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa 'khor lo thogs pa ltar byas la /
T02TD2627E:279a-10: g-yas dbyug to rtse gsum ltar byas pa ni dbang phyug chen po'i'o //
T02TD2627E:279a-11: aa dang aom ni rtse sprad pa //
T02TD2627E:279a-12: lhag ma gsum ni rdo rje can //
T02TD2627E:279a-13: zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'i mthe'u chung dang mthe bong rtse sprad nas lhag ma gsum rdo rjer byas pa ni brgya byin gyi'o //
T02TD2627E:279a-14: h'um dang aom gnyis gzhur byas la //
T02TD2627E:279a-15: lhag ma mdar byas mda' can gyi'o //
T02TD2627E:279a-16: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo dang mthe bong gnyis gzhur byas la sor mo lhag ma mdar byas pa ni mda' gzhu can gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:279a-17: lag pa g-yas g-yon la 'khor lor bya //
T02TD2627E:279a-18: 'di ni nyi ma zla ba'i zhal //
T02TD2627E:279a-20: g-yon pa bgrad pa zla ba yi //
T02TD2627E:279a-21: g-yas pa bgrad pa nyi ma'i'o //
T02TD2627E:279a-22: thal mo dam sbyar sor mo spro //
T02TD2627E:279a-23: gza' lag rtag tu se gol gtogs //
T02TD2627E:279a-24: zhes bya ba ni thal mo sbyar ba sor mo 'khrol ba ltar byed cing se gol gtogs pa ltar byed pa ni gza' lag go //
T02TD2627E:279a-25: de nyid tshig dbang gsungs pa ste //
T02TD2627E:279a-26: mchu la tshig 'bru 'dra bar gzhag / ces bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo nyid mchu las tshig dbyung ba 'dra bar gzhag pa ni phur bu'o //
T02TD2627E:279a-27: pa bsangs ni mnyam nyid sbyar //
T02TD2627E:279a-28: zhes bya ba ni thal mo mnyam nyid sbyar ba pa sangs dang mig dmar gyi'o //
T02TD2627E:279a-29: spen pa dbyig pa 'dzin par bya //
T02TD2627E:279a-30: zhes bya ba ni dbyug pa 'dzin pa ltar byed pa ni spen pa'i'o //
T02TD2627E:279a-31: ba lang sna ni chu srin 'dra //
T02TD2627E:279a-32: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo dang mthe bong gnyis glang po che dang chu srin gyi sna 'dra ba sgra gcan gyi yin par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to//
T02TD2627E:279b-1: de nyid bskor na glog phreng gi //
T02TD2627E:279b-2: bla 'og gzhag pa sprin phyag rgya //
T02TD2627E:279b-3: zhes bya ba ni me stag 'phro ba ltar byas ba rgyu skar gyi'o //
T02TD2627E:279b-4: de nyid bskor ba glog gi'o //
T02TD2627E:279b-5: thal mo gnyis bla 'og tu gzhag pa sprin gyi'o //
T02TD2627E:279b-6: 'di dag snying po phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2627E:279b-7: las kyi phyag rgya yang 'di dag yin no zhes bya ba ni thugs dam tshig snying po'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:279b-8: 'jig rten pa'i las kyi phyag rgya yang 'di dag nyid do //
T02TD2627E:279b-9: de nyid las srin lag sbas pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i zhes pa ni rdo rje thal mo de nyid las mdzub mo'i tshigs bar ma bcag pa ste dbang bskur ba rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2627E:279b-10: de nyid las h'um zhes bya bas tshigs bar ma bcag pa ni dbang bskur ba sbyin par byed pa ste /
T02TD2627E:279b-11: nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:279b-12: de nyid las h'um zhes bya ba ni gshibs la srin lag padma 'dra bar byas pa 'di padma 'byung ba'i chags pa'i phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis gshibs srin lag padma 'dra bar bya ba ni rnam par gsal ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:279b-13: mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag gnyis bsgreng ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste de nyid las h'um zhes bya ba dang //
T02TD2627E:279b-14: hri zhes bya bas gshibs te bsgreng ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:279b-15: de nyid las padma 'dra bar byas pa ni bde ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:279b-16: de nyid las 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshul du byas pa ni kun du bzang po'i phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo padma 'dra bar byas pa dang //
T02TD2627E:279b-17: 'od zer 'phro ba ni bde ba chen po dang kun du bzang po'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:279b-18: de nyid nang du bkug na ni //
T02TD2627E:279b-19: khro bo sna tshogs gzi can no //
T02TD2627E:279b-20: zhes bya ba ni thal mo nang du bkug pa khro bo'i'o //
T02TD2627E:279b-21: de nyid las shin tu bsdams pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa'o //
T02TD2627E:279b-23: hri zhes bya ba'i sa bon ni gnod sbyin gyi'o zhes bya ba sor mo rnams bsdams pa rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rgyu dang /
T02TD2627E:279b-24: brkyang nas mgul du 'khyud pa srung ba'i dang //
T02TD2627E:279b-25: mdzub mo mche ba gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:279b-26: h'um zhes bya ba lcags kyur byas pa ni bkug pa'o //
T02TD2627E:279b-27: de nyid mdar byas pa ni 'dod pa'o //
T02TD2627E:279b-28: aom dang h'um gnyis sbyar ba dgyes pa'o zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyur byas pa rgyal po'i'o //
T02TD2627E:279b-29: mdzub mo gnyis mdar byas pa chags pa'i'o //
T02TD2627E:280a-1: mdzub mo gnyis se gol gtogs pa ni legs pa'i'o //
T02TD2627E:280a-2: de nyid dkyil 'khor lta bur byas pa ni gzi brjid kyi'o //
T02TD2627E:280a-3: de nyid nor bu 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal mtshan gyi'o //
T02TD2627E:280a-4: bskor na gzhag pa ste de nyid khar gzhag na dgyes shing 'dzum par mdzad pa ya mtshan no zhes bya ba rdo rje bsdams pa las 'od zer 'bar ba ltar byas pa gzi brjid kyi'o //
T02TD2627E:280a-5: rdo rje bsdams pa nyid thal mor byas pa nor bu 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal mtshan gyi'o //
T02TD2627E:280a-6: de nyid bskor nas kha'i phyogs su gzhag pa ni bzhad pa'i'o //
T02TD2627E:280a-7: thal mo padmo bkug pa ni padmo'i'o //
T02TD2627E:280a-8: aa zhes bya ba dang aom zhes bya ba gnyis nang du bkug pa ni ral gri'o //
T02TD2627E:280a-9: gcig la gcig sbyar ba ni 'khor lo'i'o //
T02TD2627E:280a-10: snga ma las aom zhes bya ba gnyis khar gzhag pa ni 'byung ba ste zhes bya ba thal mo padmo dang mthe'u chung dang mthe bong bkug nas lhag ma ral gri dang thal mo sbyar ba dang /
T02TD2627E:280a-11: mthe bong gnyis khar gzhag pa ni go rims bzhin du chos dang rnon po dang /
T02TD2627E:280a-12: 'khor lo dang smra ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:280a-13: mdor na phyag rgya ni las kyi phyag rgya sbyin par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni yon tan mdor bsdu na las thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2627E:280a-14: de nyid bsdus mdud sprul mgor 'gyur //
T02TD2627E:280a-15: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo de nyid las mtshams gnyis bsdus la sor mo'i rtse mo bsdus nas btud de sprul mgo ltar byas pa ni klu dang chu lha'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:280a-16: kun du gnod sbyin mche ba 'dra //
T02TD2627E:280a-17: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis mche ba 'dra bar byas pa ni gnod sbyin no //
T02TD2627E:280a-18: srin po yi ni khrag 'phrog pa //
T02TD2627E:280a-19: zhes bya ba khrag 'thung pa ltar byed pa srin po'i'o //
T02TD2627E:280a-20: lag pa bskor ba rlung gi ste //
T02TD2627E:280a-21: dbyug to ldan pa gnod sbyin no //
T02TD2627E:280a-22: bum pa gzhag pa nor gyi'o //
T02TD2627E:280a-23: zhes bya ba ni lag pa bskor ba rlung lha'i'o //
T02TD2627E:280a-24: dbyug to ltar byed pa ni gnod sbyin gyi'o //
T02TD2627E:280a-25: lag pa gnyis bum pa ltar byed pa ni nor lha'i'o //
T02TD2627E:280a-26: mthe bong ne le'i rna 'drar bya //
T02TD2627E:280a-27: mgo bo thod pa nag po ste //
T02TD2627E:280a-28: bhridgi ri ti lag brkyang pa //
T02TD2627E:280a-29: pi wang g-yon thogs dri za'o //
T02TD2627E:280a-31: gung mo dbyug 'dra gshin rje yi //
T02TD2627E:280a-32: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo nyid mthe bong gnyis rna ba dang 'dra bar bya ba ni rnam thos bu'o //
T02TD2627E:280b-0: g-yon pa mgo thod mkhal ma'i phyogs su @280b 'jog pa ni nag po chen po'i'o //
T02TD2627E:280b-1: tha ma brkyang ba ni bhridgi ri ti'i'o //
T02TD2627E:280b-2: g-yon pa pi wang thogs pa ni dri za'i'o //
T02TD2627E:280b-3: lhag ma gnyis kyi sor mo me 'dra bar byas pa ni me lha'i'o //
T02TD2627E:280b-4: lag pa gnyis kyi gung mo dbyug pa 'dra bar byas pa ni gshin rje'o //
T02TD2627E:280b-5: rnal 'byor khro dang dbang sbyin pa //
T02TD2627E:280b-6: mthe'u chung ral gri mdzub gzhag can //
T02TD2627E:280b-7: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo las mthe'u chung gnyis ral gri ltar byas pa ni rna ba la gzhag la khro bo'i tshul du bya ba dang mdzub mo gnyis zhags pa ltar byas pa ste gzhan la dbang du byed pa sbyin pa dang bcas pa chu lha 'khor dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:280b-8: rlung gi rgyal mtshan rang gi gdong //
T02TD2627E:280b-9: zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bos mdzub mo mnan /
T02TD2627E:280b-10: sor mo lhag ma gsum pa ba dan ltar byas pa rang gi gdong du 'phyar ba ni rlung lha'i'o //
T02TD2627E:280b-11: de la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD2627E:280b-12: lag las skyes pas skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2627E:280b-13: zhes bya ba ni gong du bshad pa'i phyag rgya de la sogs pa phyag rgya sna tshogs pa rnams rgyu lag pa las skye zhing bcing bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:280b-14: lha rnams kyi thun mong du /
T02TD2627E:280b-15: padma'i phyag rgya bkra shis te //
T02TD2627E:280b-17: de ltar so ni gnod sbyin rnams //
T02TD2627E:280b-18: srin po rnams kyi mgo tshal pa //
T02TD2627E:280b-19: bud med rnams kyi sor bcu bsnol //
T02TD2627E:280b-20: gza' rnams kyi ni dbyug pa ste //
T02TD2627E:280b-21: aa rga dbul ba rgyu skar rnams //
T02TD2627E:280b-22: de dag kun gyis sems 'grub po //
T02TD2627E:280b-23: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i lha thams cad kyi thun mong du thal mo padmo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:280b-24: klu rnams kyi sor mo autpala ltar byas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:280b-25: gnod sbyin thams cad kyi sor mo rnams so ltar byas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:280b-26: srin po rnams kyi lag pa g-yas g-yon mgo po'i tshal ba ltar byas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:280b-27: bud med thams cad kyi sor mo bcu bsnol ba'o //
T02TD2627E:280b-28: gza' thams cad kyi lag pa g-yas g-yon dbyug pa ltar byas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:280b-29: aarga dbul bltar byas pa rgyu skar thams cad kyi ste de dag ni sems bskul ba 'grub bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:280b-30: mgo bo thod pa khar gzhag pa //
T02TD2627E:280b-31: phyag rgya 'di ni phra men ma //
T02TD2627E:280b-32: mgo thod lce yi phyag rgya ni //
T02TD2627E:280b-33: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yir bshad //
T02TD2627E:280b-34: de dag kun gyi thun mong du //
T02TD2627E:280b-35: phyag rgya chen po bshad par bya //
T02TD2627E:280b-36: thal mo brkyang ba bshad pa ni //
T02TD2627E:280b-37: yang na thal mo padmar bya//
T02TD2627E:281a-0: @281a * // zhes bya ba ni mgo bo'i thod pa khar gzhag pa ltar byas pa ni phra men ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:281a-1: mdzub mo dang mthe bong gnyis rtse sprad de srin lag dang mthe'u chung mig 'bras su byas pa gung mo lcer brkyang ba ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:281a-2: 'jig rten pa'i lha thams cad kyi thun mong du thal mo brkyang ba dang yang na padmor byas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:281a-3: rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas ni //
T02TD2627E:281a-4: aa zhes bya ba lu gu rgyud //
T02TD2627E:281a-5: h'um zhes bya ba gnyis bsgreng la //
T02TD2627E:281a-6: phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya yin //
T02TD2627E:281a-7: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas mkhrig ma bsnol te mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du sbrel mdzub mo bsgreng ba ni /
T02TD2627E:281a-9: rdo rje bsdams pa bsdams nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:281a-10: h'um dang aa gnyis gshibs te bsgreng //
T02TD2627E:281a-11: aom zhes bya ba ngos bcar ba //
T02TD2627E:281a-12: phyag rgya snang bar byed par dgongs //
T02TD2627E:281a-13: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo dang mthe chung gnyis gshibs te bsgreng /
T02TD2627E:281a-14: mthe bong ngos la bcar ba ni 'jig rten gsum snang gi'o //
T02TD2627E:281a-15: de la aa zhes bya ba bcings //
T02TD2627E:281a-16: zhes bya ba ni mthe chung nang du bkug pa ni 'jig rten gsum mthar byed kyi'o //
T02TD2627E:281a-17: aom zhes bya ba nang du bkug / aa zhes bya ba sngon bzhin sbyar//
T02TD2627E:281a-18: aom dang aa yang 'dra bar bya //
T02TD2627E:281a-19: zhes bya ba mthe bong gnyis nang du gzhug mthe chung gnyis ni nang du sbyar mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis 'dra bar sbyar ba ni mi g-yo mgon po'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:281a-20: tram zhes bya ba gshibs nas ni //
T02TD2627E:281a-21: ae dang aom gnyis lu gu rgyud //
T02TD2627E:281a-22: lhag ma gshibs pa'i phyag rgya 'di //
T02TD2627E:281a-23: bdud rtsi 'khyil par shes par bya //
T02TD2627E:281a-24: zhes bya ba ni gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng /
T02TD2627E:281a-25: mthe'u chung dang mthe bong lu gu rgyud du sprel /
T02TD2627E:281a-26: lhag ma gshibs pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i'o //
T02TD2627E:281a-27: tram zhes bya ba gshibs nas ni //
T02TD2627E:281a-28: h'um zhes bya ba de bzhin no //
T02TD2627E:281a-29: zhes bya ba gung mo dang mdzub mo gshibs pa ni be con sngon po'i'o //
T02TD2627E:281a-30: de ltar h'um zhes bya ba gshibs //
T02TD2627E:281a-32: rta mgrin phyag rgya gang yin pa //
T02TD2627E:281a-33: de yang las rnams kun la gsungs //
T02TD2627E:281b-0: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis gshibs te lhag ma 'od zer ltar byas pa @281b rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya ste las dang dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:281b-1: khro bo rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2627E:281b-2: spyan ni mig dang 'dra bar bshad //
T02TD2627E:281b-3: m'a ma k'i ni rdo rjer bshad //
T02TD2627E:281b-4: dkar mo padma nyid du bshad //
T02TD2627E:281b-6: ces bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung mig ltar byas pa ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi'o //
T02TD2627E:281b-7: mdzub mo rtse gug pa gung mor sbyar ba ni m'a ma k'i'o //
T02TD2627E:281b-8: gung mo dang srin lag padmo 'dra bar byas pa ni gos dkar mo'o //
T02TD2627E:281b-9: mdzub mo'i rtse mo bkug pas gung mo las dkris te /
T02TD2627E:281b-10: mthe bong ngos la bcar ba ni sgrol ma'i autpala'o //
T02TD2627E:281b-11: gang phyag rgya ma bshad pa thams cad ni de kho na nyid bsdus pa la sogs par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:281b-12: gzhan yang rtag pa thams cad kyi lha bskyed pa dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs gzhom pa dang brdung ba'i sngags ni badzra satva h'um /
T02TD2627E:281b-13: dzra r'a dza dza zhes bya ba la sogs pa bcu drug rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:281b-14: aom buddha lo ts'a na h'um /
T02TD2627E:281b-18: badzra panta re de hi de hi siddha bo dhi lo kotta ri bha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2627E:281b-20: aom badzra t'a re tu tt'a re tu re h'um h'um h'um sva sva sva sgrol ma'i'o//
T02TD2627E:281b-21: sems dpa' bcu drug gi snying po dang sbyar ba'i sham pa ta bcu drug zhi bar brdung ba'o //
T02TD2627E:281b-22: de bzhin sbyar ba ghum bcu drug rgyas pa'i brdung ba'o //
T02TD2627E:281b-23: de bzhin du ho sbyar ba bcu drug dbang gi brdung ba'o //
T02TD2627E:281b-24: de bzhin kha stam sbyar ba bcu drug mngon spyod kyi brdung ba'o //
T02TD2627E:281b-25: 'dir ma gsungs pa'i sngags pa thams cad yang gzhan dag las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:281b-26: ci'i phyir rgyud phyi ma'i bde ba chen po dang /
T02TD2627E:281b-27: de yang gtsug tor du gsang sngags dang phyag rgya'i khyad par gsungs she na /
T02TD2627E:281b-28: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad de gnyis kyi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:281b-29: de ltar rgyud phyi ma bshad nas da ni rgyud phyi ma'i yang phyi ma bshad pa'i phyir 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:281b-31: de nas lha rnams kun mgu nas //
T02TD2627E:281b-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
T02TD2627E:281b-33: 'dir ni khro bor gsungs pa ston te /
T02TD2627E:282a-0: de yang 'og nas khro bo'i skur 'gyur ba'i @282a * //
T02TD2627E:282a-2: de nas lha rnams kun mgu nas //
T02TD2627E:282a-3: phyag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD2627E:282a-4: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i phyir //
T02TD2627E:282a-6: zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud dang phyi ma'i rgyud bshad pas lha rnams mgu nas phyag 'tshal nas khros pas khro bo spangs pa'i phyir gsol ba 'de bas pa nyid du gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:282a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rang gi sku bor te zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i skur bor te'o //
T02TD2627E:282a-8: rdo rje sems dpa'i skur zhugs nas //
T02TD2627E:282a-9: zhes bya ba ni khro bo sems dpa'i skur gyur pa'o /
T02TD2627E:282a-10: 'dis ni sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin ston to //
T02TD2627E:282a-11: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa rnams kyis phyag na rdo rje'i skur bskyed la /
T02TD2627E:282a-12: 'og nas 'byung ba'i gsang sngags kyis khro bo'i skur bsgyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:282a-13: rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa zhes bya bas ni sems dang sems las byung ba gnyis su med pa thugs rje chen po mtshungs pa'i khro bo'o //
T02TD2627E:282a-14: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya ste /
T02TD2627E:282a-15: de'i snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon du mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2627E:282a-16: rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo zhes bya ba ni khro bo sems dpa' nyid do //
T02TD2627E:282a-17: me'i rdo rje nyi ma zhes bya ba ni khro bo lhag ma rnams te dbyer mi phyed pa'i 'od dan ldan pa'o //
T02TD2627E:282a-18: snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas byung ngo zhes bya ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i snying po'o //
T02TD2627E:282a-19: de nyid kyi nges pa'i ye shes las phyung ba'o //
T02TD2627E:282a-20: de nyid aom badzra kro dha aa na l'arka ma h'a badzra /
T02TD2627E:282a-21: badzra kro dha dra ba dra ba /
T02TD2627E:282a-22: bi dra ba bi dra ba /
T02TD2627E:282a-24: n'a sha ya n'a sha ya /
T02TD2627E:282a-25: ha ra ha ra phra nam h'um phat /
T02TD2627E:282a-26: khro bo rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD2627E:282a-27: aom tree lo kya ka ri h'um phat /
T02TD2627E:282a-29: aom tree lo kya da ma ka h'um phat /
T02TD2627E:282a-31: aom tree lo kya n'a sha h'um phat /
T02TD2627E:282a-33: aom tri lo kya ha na ta ka h'um phat /
T02TD2627E:282a-35: aom aa mri te h'um phat /
T02TD2627E:282a-37: aom k'a la danda h'um phat /
T02TD2627E:282a-39: aom ka la ha ni h'um phat /
T02TD2627E:282a-41: aom ha ya gr'i ba h'um phat /
T02TD2627E:282b-1: / aom ka la aangku sha h'um phat /
T02TD2627E:282b-3: aom ka la p'a sha h'um phat /
T02TD2627E:282b-5: aom ka la bahdha h'um phat /
T02TD2627E:282b-7: aom ka la gtanta h'um phat /
T02TD2627E:282b-9: aom ka la raksha si h'um phat /
T02TD2627E:282b-11: aom ka la danda h'um phat /
T02TD2627E:282b-13: aom ka la ra ti h'um phat /
T02TD2627E:282b-15: aom ka la ya ksha si h'um phat /
T02TD2627E:282b-17: 'di dag gis ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog bstan to //
T02TD2627E:282b-18: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog sgom pa rnams kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i thug su sngags bkod la bskyed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:282b-19: ting nge 'dzin gsum pa ni de bzhin du sngar bstan pa las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:282b-20: de nas dkyil 'khor mi zad pa //
T02TD2627E:282b-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las ston te /
T02TD2627E:282b-22: bsnyen pa dang lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga thams cad spyad pa /
T02TD2627E:282b-23: de nas khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yangs pa rtsibs bcu gnyis pa 'od zer 'bar bas dkrigs shing cher 'bar bar snga ma ltar phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris nas lte ba la rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:282b-24: dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2627E:282b-25: shar gyi rtsibs gnyis la gsum snang dang gsum 'dul /
T02TD2627E:282b-26: lho'i rtsibs gnyis la gsum 'jig dang gsum mthar byed /
T02TD2627E:282b-27: nub kyi rtsibs gnyis la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang be con sngon po /
T02TD2627E:282b-28: byang gi rtsibs gnyis la mi g-yo mgon po dang rta mgrin /
T02TD2627E:282b-29: me'i phyogs kyi rtsibs su srung ba'o //
T02TD2627E:282b-30: srin po'i phyogs kyi rtsibs la be con ma /
T02TD2627E:282b-31: rlung gi phyogs kyi rtsibs la dga' ba mo /
T02TD2627E:282b-32: dbang ldan phyogs kyi rtsibs la gnod sbyin mo //
T02TD2627E:282b-33: khro bo brgyad 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad mnan pa zhal 'jigs pa phyag brgya phrag du ma mnga' ba /
T02TD2627E:282b-34: sprul dang thod kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2627E:282b-35: stag lpags smad dkris byas pa /
T02TD2627E:282b-36: rgyu ma thogs ba sprul pa phyag dang dbu mtha' yas pa 'byung ba /
T02TD2627E:282b-37: de dag kyang mgo thod shas bkang ba phyag na thogs par bri /
T02TD2627E:282b-38: phyi rol na srin mo bdun cu la sogs pa gzhag / sgo ba rnams lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan thogs par bri /
T02TD2627E:283a-0: de nas bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa bcu drug gzhag bdug pa dang me tog dri mar me kha zas @283a * //
T02TD2627E:283a-1: kyis bkang ba'i gtor ma bsham /
T02TD2627E:283a-2: bza' ba dang bca' ba'i bdud rtsis mgo thod gang bar gyur pa rnams gzhag ces bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:283a-3: de nas slob dpon bdag nyid kyang //
T02TD2627E:283a-4: mgu nas mgo thod phyag rgyas gzhug / phyag rgya de dang de yis ni /
T02TD2627E:283a-5: sha rnams kun gyi dam tshig gsol //
T02TD2627E:283a-6: de nas 'dod ldan rnyed nas ni //
T02TD2627E:283a-7: zhes bya ba la de ltar dgongs ka'i dus mtshams la bab pa dang /
T02TD2627E:283a-8: slob dpon gyis mgo thod kyi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor du zhugs te chad pa dang lhag pa zhi bar bya /
T02TD2627E:283a-9: de nas ting nge 'dzin gsum sngon du 'gro bas sgo dbye /
T02TD2627E:283a-10: bsdu na nam mkha' la mgo thod kyi phyag rgya de dang /
T02TD2627E:283a-11: rnal 'byor de'i sha rnams kyi dam tshig gsol lo //
T02TD2627E:283a-12: de nas 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnyed nas h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags bcas pas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:283a-13: de nas sngags mkhan sgor sgo ma //
T02TD2627E:283a-14: de nyid dran byed bsnyen par bya //
T02TD2627E:283a-15: zhes bya ba ni lcags kyu la sogs pas las bya zhing bgegs bskrad bsrung /
T02TD2627E:283a-16: sgo bcad phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab dbang bskur zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:283a-17: des ni nges par dngos grub ster //
T02TD2627E:283a-19: dkyil 'khor du ni tshogs rnams dang //
T02TD2627E:283a-20: rang gi lha yi tshogs rnams la ;
T02TD2627E:283a-21: / rgyud las byung ba'i dam tshig brjod //
T02TD2627E:283a-22: ces bya ba ni dngos grub 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rang gi tshogs rtsa ba'i rgyud la 'byung ba'o //
T02TD2627E:283a-23: bzlas brjod kyi dam tshig thog ma dang tha ma med pa de srid kyi bar bar brjod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:283a-24: de nas mchod de langs nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:283a-25: tshogs can rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2627E:283a-26: tshul du gnas nas 'byung bar bya //
T02TD2627E:283a-27: zhes pa ni mchod pa dang /
T02TD2627E:283a-30: gnang ba nod pa'i mthar thug pa byas la /
T02TD2627E:283a-31: tshogs kyi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo'i tshul du gnas nas 'byung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:283a-32: de nas slob ma bsdus nas ni //
T02TD2627E:283a-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob ma gzhug pa la sogs ston te /
T02TD2627E:283a-34: slob ma rnams snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad byas te lag tu rin po che thogs su bcug la /
T02TD2627E:283a-35: aom badzra kro dha zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2627E:283b-0: aom badzra @283b kro dha sa ma ya ma ti kra ma h'um phat ces bya bas dkyil 'khor du bcug la /
T02TD2627E:283b-1: rtsa ba'i rgyud du gsungs pa bzhin du cho ga lhag ma rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2627E:283b-2: aom badzra kro dha sa ma ya aa bhi shinytsa h'um phat aa zhes bya ba 'dis khro bo'i bum pas dbang bskur la /
T02TD2627E:283b-3: dbang bskur ba nyi shu po kun rtsa ba'i rgyud du bshad pa bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:283b-4: de nyid du dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la dngos grub bstan pa'i phyir de nas de dag gi sgrub pa bshad de zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:283b-5: de dag gi sgrub pa bshad pa ni sngar bshad pa'i cho gas khro bo gang yang rung bar bskyed de /
T02TD2627E:283b-6: snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la rang gi yi ge la khro bo dpag tu med pa bsgoms nas yi ge dang khro bo gcig tu bsres te bsgom pa dang /
T02TD2627E:283b-7: dang po bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa bsgoms na nges par gsod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:283b-8: bdag nyid khro bor snyoms zhugs te //
T02TD2627E:283b-9: de nas snying gar nyi ma bsgom //
T02TD2627E:283b-10: rang gi chos kyi yi ge las //
T02TD2627E:283b-11: khros nas yang dang yang 'phros shing //
T02TD2627E:283b-12: de gnyis gcig tu bsgom par bya //
T02TD2627E:283b-15: khro bo'i las gsod pa kho na'am zhe na /
T02TD2627E:283b-17: khro bo'i rgyal po las dngos su ;
T02TD2627E:283b-18: / gsod par yin par bshad mod kyi //
T02TD2627E:283b-19: zhi dang dbang dang rgyas pa rnams //
T02TD2627E:283b-21: zhes bya ba yin te khro bo thams cad thun mong gi sgrub pa bstan to //
T02TD2627E:283b-22: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02TD2627E:283b-23: khro bo dkyil 'khor bsgom byas nas //
T02TD2627E:283b-24: sdug pa'i sems can 'dzin byed cing //
T02TD2627E:283b-25: mdor na dug rims gdon la sogs //
T02TD2627E:283b-26: de bzhin de dag thams cad ni //
T02TD2627E:283b-27: thabs la sogs pas 'jigs byed pa'i //
T02TD2627E:283b-29: bsad pa'i las la brtsam par bya //
T02TD2627E:283b-30: khros par gyur nas rgod pa'i las //
T02TD2627E:283b-31: sha dang khrag rnams 'jib byed cing //
T02TD2627E:283b-32: de dag 'tsho ba sreg par byed //
T02TD2627E:283b-33: bsams nas nges par brlag par 'gyur //
T02TD2627E:283b-34: zhes bya ba ni 'chi bdag 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa ltar rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2627E:284a-0: khro bo rdo rje sems dpar bskyed nas rang @284a * //
T02TD2627E:284a-1: gi snying gar khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms te gdug pa dang rims la sogs pa thugs rje chen po'i thabs khro bos 'joms par bsams nas /
T02TD2627E:284a-2: snying ga'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor las khro bo spros te bzhad pa'i zhal gyi sha dang khrag 'jib cing /
T02TD2627E:284a-3: srog dang bral bar bsnyen pa dang sgrub par bsams nas nges par brlag par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:284a-4: gzhan yang khro bo 'jig rten gsum snang kha dog dkar po bsgom zhing /
T02TD2627E:284a-5: de nas byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis khyab par bsams la 'od de phyung nas rims la sogs pa ring du dor la 'od las h'um byung rdo rjer bsam zhing 'od las h'um lta bu'i 'khor lor gyur pa go char bya /
T02TD2627E:284a-6: 'od zer gyi chus spyi bo nas dbang bskur /
T02TD2627E:284a-7: de nas ming nas smos shing bzlas brjod dang bsnyen pa dang bsgrub pa tshul bzhin du bsams na 'grub par 'gyur ba ni /
T02TD2627E:284a-8: khro bo 'jig rten gsum snang mdzad //
T02TD2627E:284a-9: zla ba 'dra ba'i dge bsams shing ;
T02TD2627E:284a-10: /'od zer phyung ba mang po yis //
T02TD2627E:284a-11: khyad par gyur par rnam bsam la //
T02TD2627E:284a-12: rims dang gdon dang dug la sogs //
T02TD2627E:284a-13: 'od zer des ni phyung nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:284a-14: de yi nad bgegs gnod pa sems //
T02TD2627E:284a-15: zhi bya'i phyir ni ring du dor //
T02TD2627E:284a-16: de nas h'um gi tshogs bzhag la //
T02TD2627E:284a-17: rdo rje lta bur lus bsam zhing //
T02TD2627E:284a-18: h'um gi 'khor los go char bya //
T02TD2627E:284a-19: 'od zer chu yis dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2627E:284a-20: de nas de yi ming smos shing //
T02TD2627E:284a-21: bzlas pa'i tshul gyis bsam par bya //
T02TD2627E:284a-23: sbyin sreg rnam pa gsum bstan pa ni de nas /
T02TD2627E:284a-24: khung bu gsum las rnam gcig ni //
T02TD2627E:284a-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dang po zhi ba bstan te /
T02TD2627E:284a-26: de yang zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang gsum las /
T02TD2627E:284a-27: zhi ba ni kha dog dkar po /
T02TD2627E:284a-31: rnal 'byor pa nges dang por sa rnams rab sbyangs te /
T02TD2627E:284a-32: 'khor lo'i steng na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa cig thab khung gi dbus su bri /
T02TD2627E:284a-33: de'i phyi rol gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa 'jig rten gsum snang la sogs pa'i phyag rgya 'od zer dkar por 'phrog 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rigs brgya 'joms pa bye brag tu phye ba bri /
T02TD2627E:284b-0: rgyal po bzhi'i phyag mtshan @284b phyogs skyong rnams kyi phyag mtshan phyogs phyogs su bri /
T02TD2627E:284b-1: lha chen po khyab 'jug la sogs pa rnams kyi phyag mtshan dkyil 'khor lta bur bri /
T02TD2627E:284b-2: dri zhim pa'i chus bkang ba'i mdog dkar po'i ras kyis dkris pa'i bum pa brgyad gzhag /
T02TD2627E:284b-3: 'bras chan dang zho dang mar dang dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dang /
T02TD2627E:284b-6: mar me dang me tog rnams kyang gzhag / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bla re dang /
T02TD2627E:284b-7: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang rnga ma la sogs pa gzhag /
T02TD2627E:284b-8: na ma re re ga pur dang bcas pa'i dri zhim po tsandan la sogs pa'i byug pas byugs kha shar du bltas te sbyin sreg bya /
T02TD2627E:284b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyil krung ngam sems dpa'i skyil krung gis gdan la 'dug / gzhan yang gos la sogs pa dkar po dang /
T02TD2627E:284b-11: sreg pa'i rdzas bstan pa ni mar me dan sprad rtsi dang /
T02TD2627E:284b-20: me tog dri zhim pa rnams ga bur dang bsres pa tsandan dkar pos bsgos pa gzhag go //
T02TD2627E:284b-21: yam shing dang bud shing ni 'dab ma brgyad pa me tog dang 'bras bu yod cing zho dang ldan pa'i yam shing la khung bu'i khyad par gyi sor gyis gzhal zhing /
T02TD2627E:284b-22: mchog sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi yan chad /
T02TD2627E:284b-23: sor bcu drug thab khung bar ma la /
T02TD2627E:284b-24: bcu gnyis dang brgyad tha ma la /
T02TD2627E:284b-25: gzhan yang bud shing zho dang ldan pa la dri'i chus bskus te /
T02TD2627E:284b-26: bud shing de la rgyun gzhag la sogs pa'i me bcug ste /
T02TD2627E:284b-27: dzva la dzva la h'um zhes pas rlung yab kyis sbar nas /
T02TD2627E:284b-28: dri'i chus bsang gtor byas te /
T02TD2627E:284b-29: de nas me lha bskyed pa ni kha dog dkar po phyag g-yas gnyis na padma dang nor bu /
T02TD2627E:284b-30: phyag g-yon gnyis na ril ba dang dbyug pa thogs pa /
T02TD2627E:284b-31: padma dkar po'i gdan gyi steng du de lta bu'i me lha bkug nas mchod yon dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:284b-32: sbyin sreg gi tshe na khyad par mchod pa'i lha kha dog dkar po 'gro ba la phan pa'i khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' padma dkar po la shar phyogs su bsams te /
T02TD2627E:284b-33: de'i thog tu spyan drangs nas gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:285a-1: par bya ba'i lus bzhag ste khro bo'i 'od zer gyis nyes pa drangs nas phyi rol du dor bar bsam mo //
T02TD2627E:285a-2: mchod pa'i dus su nang par snga bar khrus byas lus dris byug /'od zer bdud rtsi lta bur bsam zhing sbyin sreg bya ste dam tshig de ni 'da' bar mi bya ba kha na'o //
T02TD2627E:285a-3: de nas mchod pa'i rim pa ni /
T02TD2627E:285a-4: sha chen la sogs pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang por me lha la phul /
T02TD2627E:285a-5: de nas shar phyogs na bzhugs pa'i khro bo de'i thugs kar spyan drangs la dbul /
T02TD2627E:285a-6: de yang bsreg bya gsum du dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:285a-7: de nas de'i lus su sangs rgyas dkon mchog gsum spyan drangs la /
T02TD2627E:285a-8: dkon mchog gsum du dmigs la yang lan gsum du dbul /
T02TD2627E:285a-9: gshegs su gsol te yang me lha la dbul /
T02TD2627E:285a-10: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan drangs te rdo rje sems dpa' la dbul /
T02TD2627E:285a-11: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha re re la dbul /
T02TD2627E:285a-12: de nas bgegs la sogs pa thams cad la dbul /
T02TD2627E:285a-13: yang gshegs su gsol te rang gi lhag pa'i lha la dbul /
T02TD2627E:285a-14: de nas dang por khro bo'i sngags kyis btab nas sbyin sreg byas te rdzas thams cad gcig tu bsres nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis btab ste /
T02TD2627E:285a-15: sbyin sreg kun byas pa'i 'og tu brgya stong ngam brgya rtsa brgyad dam khro bo spyan drangs pa la phul la 'od zer 'byung bas bsgrub par bya ba dbang bskur zhing /
T02TD2627E:285a-17: mjug tu lha thams cad la mchod pa brgyad la sogs pas mchod nas /
T02TD2627E:285a-18: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya gyen du bkrol te /
T02TD2627E:285a-19: aom badzra mu: zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD2627E:285a-20: 'dis ni zhi ba'i las 'grub pa la the tshom med do //
T02TD2627E:285a-21: ci ste sdig pa can nam ting nge 'dzin dang mi ldan nas dngos grub mi thob na /
T02TD2627E:285a-22: dang po stong pa nyid du bsgoms la /
T02TD2627E:285a-23: de nas snga ma bzhin du thams cad byas nas gdon mi za bar dngos grub tu 'gyur te /
T02TD2627E:285a-24: zhi ba'i las 'di tsam gyis mthar thug go zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:285a-25: de nas rgyas pa bstan pa ni /
T02TD2627E:285a-26: 'bras bur ldan na ma nags tshal lam //
T02TD2627E:285a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
T02TD2627E:285b-0: 'bras bur ldan pa'am nags tshal lam gnas sam rgyal po dang rje'u rigs kyi khyim du rgyas pa la dga' ba'i sems @285b kyis bya ste /
T02TD2627E:285b-1: thab khung chung du khru do //
T02TD2627E:285b-3: mchog khru brgyad pa gang yang rung ba cig tu byas pa'i las bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:285b-4: gzhan yang stegs bu dan phyag rgya bstan pa ni thab khung las stegs bu dpag pas shes par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:285b-5: thab khung khru do la stegs bu khru brgyad /
T02TD2627E:285b-6: thab khung khru bzhi la stegs bu khru bcu gnyis /
T02TD2627E:285b-7: thab khung khru brgyad la stegs bu khru bcu drug ga ma nyi shu rtsa bzhir bya'o //
T02TD2627E:285b-8: thab khung khru do la mu khyud sor brgyad /
T02TD2627E:285b-9: thab khung khru bzhi la mu khyud sor bcu drug /
T02TD2627E:285b-10: thab khang khru brgyad la mu khyad sor sum cu rtsa gnyis su bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:285b-11: de'i phyi rol du padma sna tshogs pas brgyan par bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:285b-12: de'i dbus su rin po che dang padma sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:285b-13: de'i dbus su thab brko ba ni zabs su rgya'i phyed kyi tshad gru bzhi pa'am /
T02TD2627E:285b-14: khru brgyad gang yang rung bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:285b-15: 'jim pa ser pos bskus shing gur kum la sogs pas byugs nas tshon ser pos bskus te gser 'od dang 'dra bar bsam zhing bya'o //
T02TD2627E:285b-16: de nas tshon dmar ser gyis rin po che dang /
T02TD2627E:285b-17: padma la sogs pa phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'khor yug nyid du gnas pa bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2627E:285b-18: nang gi dkyil 'khor dang phyi'i dkyil 'khor rim pa gnyis sam /
T02TD2627E:285b-19: thab khung dang mu khyud dang nang gi dkyil 'khor dang phyi'i dkyil 'khor te bzhi'am nang gi 'khor yug dang mu khyud dang 'khor lo dang lha'i gnas dan mu ran dkar po'i nang dan phyi rol dang 'gro ris kyi gnas dan /
T02TD2627E:285b-20: yang na rim pa brgyad dang ldan par bri'o //
T02TD2627E:285b-21: sgo ba nyid kyang phyag rgya'i gzugs su bri'o //
