T02TD2627E:285b-22: bum pa kha dog ser po dri chus bkang ba brgyad dam /
T02TD2627E:285b-25: sum cu rtsa gnyis te bkra shis pa'i dar ser pos dkri /
T02TD2627E:285b-26: kha rgyan yal ga dang me tog can dri zhim po'i me tog dang bdug pa dang phreng ba dang mar me dang rgyan rnams dan rgyal mtshan dan 'phan dag bla re dang gdugs rnams ser so brgyan pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:285b-27: lha'i rnal 'byor bstan pa ni bdag nyid gos dang rgyan dang me tog la sogs pa ser pos brgyan /
T02TD2627E:285b-28: byang phyogs su kha bltas te 'dug nas khro bo rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byed cing zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:286a-0: gzhan yang de nyid kyi tshe na mchod pa'i lha byang phyogs su nam mkha' @286a * //
T02TD2627E:286a-1: la lha'i bu yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan mdog ser po 'dra ba dang /
T02TD2627E:286a-2: lha'i bu dang nyi ma dang zla ba dang ku be ra dang nor sbyin dang /
T02TD2627E:286a-3: dzambha la kun kyang 'od zer gser lta bu 'bebs shing yid kyi dgos pa skong bar mdzad pa 'od zer chu yis dbang bskur bar bsam mo /
T02TD2627E:286a-4: de nas dbang thob nas lus rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2627E:286a-5: yang rgyas par bya ba'i phyir de'i ming dang gung gung zhes bya ba rtsa brgyad dang stong phrag brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2627E:286a-6: de nas sbyin sreg bya ba ni byang phyogs su seng ge'i stan gyi thog na rin po che'i khri /
T02TD2627E:286a-7: yang na padma dang nyi ma dang zla ba'i gdan khri'i steng na rdo rje rin chen dang /
T02TD2627E:286a-10: rdo rje bzhad pa dang bzhi rgyan kun gyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2627E:286a-11: phyag rgya mchog sbyin mdzad pa rin po che'i char dang 'od zer gyi phreng bas bsgrub par bya ba la khyab par bsam mo //
T02TD2627E:286a-12: dung dang cang te'u dang pi wang dang /
T02TD2627E:286a-13: sil snyan dang glu dang gar gyis de rnams mchod par bya ste /
T02TD2627E:286a-14: de'i 'og tu sbyin sreg gi las brtsam mo /
T02TD2627E:286a-15: yam shing dang bung shing bstan pa ni /
T02TD2627E:286a-16: khung bu'i khyad par las yam shing dang bud shing dbye ste mdzub gang ba dang khru gang ba ni chung du yin no //
T02TD2627E:286a-18: khru bzhi pa ni mchog go //
T02TD2627E:286a-19: me tog dang 'bras bur bcas pa rtse mo sbrang rtsis byug pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:286a-20: bsreg par bya ba'i rdzas 'bru dang me tog dang 'bras bu ser po dang /
T02TD2627E:286a-21: mar dang sbrang rtsir bsres nas dpal gyi 'bras bu lta bur byas pa yin no //
T02TD2627E:286a-22: mchod pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2627E:286a-23: me lha kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa /
T02TD2627E:286a-24: phyag mtshan sngar zhib par bshad pa bzhin padmo'i gdan la zhugs pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa spyan drangs te bsreg bya dbul /
T02TD2627E:286a-25: de nas de nyid 'bar bar bzhugs pa'i lus su khro bo'i rgyal po bcug nas /
T02TD2627E:286a-26: sngon bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba dran par byed cing sbyin sreg dbul pa ni 'bum ma ma nyis 'bum gyis nges par dngos grub 'grub bo //
T02TD2627E:286a-27: 'bum phrag brgyas ni rgyal srid la dbang ba'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa 'grub bo //
T02TD2627E:286a-28: de nas mjug tu 'od zer gyis dbang bskur zhing bsrungs na rgyas par 'gyur te /
T02TD2627E:286b-0: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin no zhes @286b bya ba yin la /
T02TD2627E:286b-1: 'di tsam gyis ni rgyas pa'i las mthar thug go zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:286b-2: dbang ni chags ba'i sems kyis kyang //
T02TD2627E:286b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbang gi las ston te /
T02TD2627E:286b-4: dbang ni chags pa'i sems dang ting nge 'dzin gyis bya ba ste /
T02TD2627E:286b-5: chags pa rdo rje can dang /
T02TD2627E:286b-6: rdo rje chags pa de las byung zhing khams gsum chags par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2627E:286b-7: padma'i sems dpa' rtag tu chags pa de bas na dbang du bya ba'i las grub par bshad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:286b-8: gnas ji lta bu zhig tu bya zhe na /
T02TD2627E:286b-9: chags dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs sam //
T02TD2627E:286b-10: chags par byed pa'i khyim du shes //
T02TD2627E:286b-11: bco blag mkhan nam zla mtshan can dag gi / khyim du chags pa'i las rnams bya ba yin //
T02TD2627E:286b-12: rdo rje chags pa'i gnas kyang rung //
T02TD2627E:286b-13: phyag na padmo'i gnas nyid du //
T02TD2627E:286b-14: rtag tu rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas //
T02TD2627E:286b-15: bde chen gyi ni gnas chen dang //
T02TD2627E:286b-17: bandu ka yi me tog gnas //
T02TD2627E:286b-18: me tog 'bras bu dmar tshal ni //
T02TD2627E:286b-19: yid 'ong sems ni chags byed pa //
T02TD2627E:286b-20: der ni zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:286b-21: stegs bu dang thab khung bstan pa ni stegs bu khru brgyad ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2627E:286b-22: stegs bu khru brgyad dam bcu drug pa rnams byas /
T02TD2627E:286b-23: de'i dbus su hom khung bya ba ni go rims bzhin du khru do dang /
T02TD2627E:286b-25: dbyibs ni gzhu dang 'dra ba dang /
T02TD2627E:286b-29: zla ba kham pa 'dra ba dang /
T02TD2627E:286b-30: padma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar byas la zheng du mchu'i phyed kyi tshang zhing gi phyed kyi tshad zabs su brko /
T02TD2627E:286b-31: mu khyud sor bzhi pa dang sor brgyad pa dang /
T02TD2627E:286b-35: mchog gi khyad par lags so //
T02TD2627E:286b-36: yam shing dang bud shing ni so sor nges par bya bzhi ba'i skabs su gsungs pa ltar byas la /
T02TD2627E:286b-37: shin tu dmar ba'i tsandan dang /
T02TD2627E:286b-41: gur kum dang bcas pas bud shing dang yam shing la bsku'o //
T02TD2627E:286b-42: gzhan yang rdzas bstan pa ni /
T02TD2627E:287a-2: lan tshva dang til dang zhim thig le'i 'bru dang /
T02TD2627E:287a-3: la phug dang nyungs rdog dang /
T02TD2627E:287a-4: khrag dang rdul chen po dang bcas pa kun bsres par bya ba'i phyir bsdus nas btsag la sogs pas bskus nas /
T02TD2627E:287a-5: khro bo'i sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2627E:287a-6: ba dang ra las bzhos pa'i bsrubs ma thag pa'i mar sar dang /
T02TD2627E:287a-7: mar dang til mar rnams ga bur la sogs pas bskus nas bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis btab ste gzhag go //
T02TD2627E:287a-8: de nas hom khung dmar por bsams nas spos dmar po la sogs pas byug cing bsku bar bya'o //
T02TD2627E:287a-9: gzhan yang thab khung dang phyag rgya bstan pa ni /
T02TD2627E:287a-10: gur kum gyis bsres pa'i tshon gyis hom khung gi nang du padma bri /
T02TD2627E:287a-11: de'i lte ba la mda' dang gzhu bri /
T02TD2627E:287a-12: de'i dbus su rdo rje bri /
T02TD2627E:287a-13: nang gi 'khor yug tu padma bri /
T02TD2627E:287a-14: mu khyud la mda' dang gzhu bri /
T02TD2627E:287a-15: de'i phyi rol gyi 'khor yug la padma nyid mda' dang bcas pa bri /
T02TD2627E:287a-16: de'i phyi rol 'khor lo'i rtsibs la dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang mnga' gzhu dang gsum shar gyi rtsibs la /
T02TD2627E:287a-17: lho phyogs kyi rtsibs la rin chen dang rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD2627E:287a-19: nub phyogs kyi rtsibs la padma dang /
T02TD2627E:287a-22: byang phyogs kyi rtsibs la sna tshogs rdo rje dang mche ba dang /
T02TD2627E:287a-24: grva rnams su spos la sogs pa phyag rgya'i gzugs bri /
T02TD2627E:287a-25: de nas me tog la sogs thams cad kyis snga ma bzhin du mchod do //
T02TD2627E:287a-26: gos dang phreng ba dmar po dang dmar po'i dris bskus nas dmar thag ma chad bar du las brtsams te bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:287a-27: khyad par dbang la byin gyis brlabs /
T02TD2627E:287a-28: padma dmar po'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
T02TD2627E:287a-29: rab chags phyag na padma bsnams //
T02TD2627E:287a-30: g-yon du rdo rje chags pa la //
T02TD2627E:287a-31: g-yas su bde ba chen po ste //
T02TD2627E:287a-32: bsams nas de yi dbus su ni //
T02TD2627E:287a-33: chu srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa gzhag rdo rje gzhu dang g-yon 'gying ma //
T02TD2627E:287a-34: me tog dmar brgyan rab dgyes ma //
T02TD2627E:287a-35: zhes bya ba la nub kyi padma'i cha la rab chags phyag na padma bsnams pa'i spyan ras gzigs bri /
T02TD2627E:287a-36: g-yon du rdo rje chags pa /
T02TD2627E:287a-37: g-yas par bde ba chen po yid kyis bri zhing bsams nas /
T02TD2627E:287b-0: lte ba la @287b chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan ma dang /
T02TD2627E:287b-1: lha mo rdo rje glu dang /
T02TD2627E:287b-2: lha mo rdo rje g-yon 'gying ma dang rab dgyes ma dang bcas pa bsam mo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:287b-3: dri la sogs pas rab mchod de //
T02TD2627E:287b-4: zhes bya ba la snga ma bzhin du glu dang rol mos mchod nas /
T02TD2627E:287b-5: badzra satva h'um ho h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing dbang du byas pa'i phyir brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:287b-6: mchod pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2627E:287b-7: mda' dang gzhu thogs de bzhin du //
T02TD2627E:287b-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
T02TD2627E:287b-9: 'dir me lha phyag gnyis na mda' gzhu thogs pa phyag gnyis na padma dmar po dang dbyug pa thogs pa /
T02TD2627E:287b-10: de lta bu'i me lha bcug nas dang por mchod de /
T02TD2627E:287b-11: de'i lus su khro bo'i rgyal po bcug ste mchod /
T02TD2627E:287b-12: 'od zer dmar po byung nas de las lcags kyu dang zhags pas bsgrub par bya ba bkug cing bcings la spyi bo zhabs drung du bzhag par bsam /
T02TD2627E:287b-13: de ltar bsams na lha yang dbang du 'gyur na mi dang mi min lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T02TD2627E:287b-14: las zin par gyur pa dang chags pa'i sems su bcas nas spyi bo nas 'od zer gyis dbang bskur zhing ham gi go chas bsrung bar bya ba ste /
T02TD2627E:287b-15: rdo rje chos kyi rnal 'byor gyis lha rnams mchod de /
T02TD2627E:287b-16: dam tshig phyag rgya gyen du bkrol la gshegs su gsol la rdo rje srung bas bsrungs te ;
T02TD2627E:287b-17: rdo rje 'dod pa ham zhes bya ba bzlas nas langs la ci bder gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2627E:287b-18: 'di tsam gyis ni dbang gi las mthar thug go zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:287b-19: rtog pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la yang thog mar mchod pa rnams kyis mchod de bstod nas /
T02TD2627E:287b-20: phyag rgya bkrol te gshegs su gsol ba ni /
T02TD2627E:287b-21: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston pas /
T02TD2627E:287b-22: de nas brgya byin la sogs lhas //
T02TD2627E:287b-23: yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD2627E:287b-24: rin chen gdugs la sogs mchog gi //
T02TD2627E:287b-25: mchod pa sna tshogs byas nas kyang //
T02TD2627E:287b-26: phyag na rdo rje rgyal dbang la //
T02TD2627E:287b-27: dga' ba'i sems kyis stod par byed //
T02TD2627E:287b-29: de nas zhes bya ba ni bar ma chad pa ste /
T02TD2627E:287b-30: khro bo rdo rje 'dzin pas rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma dbang gi las la thug gi bar bshad pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2627E:287b-31: brgya byin la sogs lha zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2627E:288a-0: brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs @288a * //
T02TD2627E:288a-1: pa dkyil 'khor du bkod pa'i lha rnams kyis zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2627E:288a-2: yang dang yang du phyag byas shing rin po che'i gdugs la sogs pas mchod pa ni mchod par byas pa'o //
T02TD2627E:288a-3: de yang gsang sngags kyi spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba la sogs pa rdzogs nas mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas bstod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:288a-4: phyag na rdo rje rgyal dbang la //
T02TD2627E:288a-5: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor dgu'i bdag po'i rdo rje 'dzin pa zhi ba dang khro bo la zhes ston to //
T02TD2627E:288a-6: dga' ba'i sems kyis stod par byed //
T02TD2627E:288a-7: ces bya ba ni yid bde ba'i sems kyis 'og nas 'byung ba rnams brjod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:288a-8: de yang gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor dgu'i skabs su 'dis bstod do zhes ston to //
T02TD2627E:288a-9: bstod pa'i rang gi ngo bo ston pa ni /
T02TD2627E:288a-10: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2627E:288a-11: sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas //
T02TD2627E:288a-12: zhes bya ba ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:288a-13: mi shes dri ma kun bcom pa //
T02TD2627E:288a-14: zhes bya ba ni 'dres pa'i ma rig pa spangs pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:288a-15: rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po //
T02TD2627E:288a-16: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems dang rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:288a-17: rdo rje rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2627E:288a-18: zhes bya ba ni sku gsum gyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:288a-19: rdo rje sku ste sku che ba //
T02TD2627E:288a-20: zhes bya ba ni sku phyag rgya chen po'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:288a-21: phyag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2627E:288a-22: ces bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:288a-23: rdo rje yan lag rdo rje mchog / ces bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad du snang ba'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:288a-25: zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa sreg pa'i tshul gyis so //
T02TD2627E:288a-26: rdo rje shugs te shugs che ba //
T02TD2627E:288a-27: zhes bya ba ni thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyi sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:288a-28: rdo rje mtshon cha mtshon rnon po //
T02TD2627E:288a-29: zhes bya ba ni thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa'i shes rab kyi sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:288a-30: phyag na rdo rje phyag chen po //
T02TD2627E:288a-31: zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:288a-32: rdo rje mda' ste rab 'bigs pa //
T02TD2627E:288b-0: zhes bya ba @288b ni chos kyi sgo 'dod pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:288b-1: rdo rje rnon po rno ba che //
T02TD2627E:288b-2: zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyi sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:288b-3: che ba chen po rgya mtsho che //
T02TD2627E:288b-4: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis so //
T02TD2627E:288b-5: rdo rje padma byang chub che //
T02TD2627E:288b-6: zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba'i nyes skyon dang bral ba'i tshul gyis so //
T02TD2627E:288b-7: sangs rgyas byang chub rang byung ba //
T02TD2627E:288b-8: zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po kho nar nges pa'i tshul gyis so //
T02TD2627E:288b-9: rdo rje rgya chen rgya chen te //
T02TD2627E:288b-10: zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'i tshul gyis so //
T02TD2627E:288b-11: rdo rje sgyu ma rnam sbyong ba //
T02TD2627E:288b-12: zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi tshul gyis so //
T02TD2627E:288b-13: rdo rje rgyu ste gnod sbyin che //
T02TD2627E:288b-14: zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa zad par byed pa'i rgyu'i tshul gyis so //
T02TD2627E:288b-15: rdo rje padma rnam sbyong ba //
T02TD2627E:288b-16: zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi nyes pa dag par byed pa'i tshul gyis so //
T02TD2627E:288b-17: rdo rje khro bo drag po che //
T02TD2627E:288b-18: zhes pa ni khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba'i tshul gyis so //
T02TD2627E:288b-19: rdo rje dgra sdang 'joms pa'i gtso //
T02TD2627E:288b-20: zhes bya ba ni h'um mdzad du snang ba'i tshul gyis so //
T02TD2627E:288b-21: rdo rje 'jigs pa srung ba che //
T02TD2627E:288b-22: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje srung ba'i rang bzhin gyis so //
T02TD2627E:288b-23: rdo rje lcags kyu don yod byed //
T02TD2627E:288b-24: ces bya ba ni rgyal po'i rang bzhin gyis so //
T02TD2627E:288b-25: rdo rje ro langs ro langs che //
T02TD2627E:288b-26: zhes bya ba ni ma h'a de bar sprul pa'i tshul gyis so //
T02TD2627E:288b-27: rdo rje srin po za ba po //
T02TD2627E:288b-28: zhes pa srin por snang ba'i tshul gyi sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:288b-29: rdo rje gnod sbyin gnod sbyin che //
T02TD2627E:288b-30: zhes bya ba gnod sbyin du sprul pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:288b-31: rdo rje gdon te gdon gyi mchog / ces pa ni gdon du sprul pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:288b-32: 'jigs byed dag byed drag po che //
T02TD2627E:288b-33: zhes bya ba ni dri ma 'khru ba zag pa med pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:288b-34: rdo rje 'jigs byed rngam byed pa //
T02TD2627E:288b-35: zhes pa ni phyi rol mu stegs 'joms pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:288b-36: bsgrub dka' bsgrub pa legs pa ste //
T02TD2627E:288b-37: zhes pa ni dga' ba spyod pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:288b-38: rdo rje legs pa dgyes mdzad pa //
T02TD2627E:288b-39: zhes pa ni rdo rje legs pa'i rang bzhin gyis so //
T02TD2627E:288b-40: rdo rje dga' ba dga' ba che //
T02TD2627E:288b-41: zhes pa ni zag pa med pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis so //
T02TD2627E:288b-43: zhes pa ni zag pa med pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis so //
T02TD2627E:288b-44: dga' ba'i rdo rje dbang byed pa //
T02TD2627E:289a-1: bya ba ni byas pa'i dngos po bzhi'i rang bzhin gyis so //
T02TD2627E:289a-2: 'od sdug pas ni sdug pa che //
T02TD2627E:289a-3: zhes pa ni gzi brjid rang bzhin gyis so //
T02TD2627E:289a-4: nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'o //
T02TD2627E:289a-5: zhes pa sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyis so //
T02TD2627E:289a-6: re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa ;
T02TD2627E:289a-7: / zhes pa ni byams pa'i rang bzhin gyis so //
T02TD2627E:289a-8: rdo rje dbang bskur rin chen mchog / rdo rje rgyal mtshan yon tan gtso //
T02TD2627E:289a-10: rgyal mtshan gyi rang bzhin gyis so //
T02TD2627E:289a-11: rdo rje ye shes ye shes che //
T02TD2627E:289a-12: zhes pa ni ye shes lnga'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:289a-13: rig pa bye ba tshogs kyi mchog / ces bya ba lha mo rnams kyi bdag por snang ba'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:289a-14: ha la ha la nag po che //
T02TD2627E:289a-15: zhes pa ni klu chen po'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:289a-16: dgra che zhing ni 'joms pa can //
T02TD2627E:289a-17: zhes pa ni 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:289a-19: zhes pa ni rdo rje chos su snang ba'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:289a-20: rnyog ma dus ngan rnam 'joms pa //
T02TD2627E:289a-21: zhes pa ni 'chi bdag 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:289a-22: skad cig g-yo ba'i the tshom gcod //
T02TD2627E:289a-23: ces pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:289a-24: glog bzhin zhal gyi ljags las 'phro //
T02TD2627E:289a-25: zhes pa ni chos myur du gsungs pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:289a-26: rdo rje me ste ma rungs 'dul //
T02TD2627E:289a-27: zhes pa ni me ltar 'bar ba'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:289a-28: drag po rab snang snang mdzad pa //
T02TD2627E:289a-29: zhes pa ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i sgo gnas so //
T02TD2627E:289a-30: nyi ma stong gis gdungs pa'i zhal //
T02TD2627E:289a-31: zhes pa ni gzi brjid chen po'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:289a-32: spyan dmar 'jigs par mdzad pa po //
T02TD2627E:289a-34: phyag rnams du ma mtshon cha brgya //
T02TD2627E:289a-35: du ma'i zhal te sku yang stong //
T02TD2627E:289a-37: zhes pa ni khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:289a-38: sems kyi chos pas sku mi mnga' //
T02TD2627E:289a-39: rnam par rtog pa ma lus spangs //
T02TD2627E:289a-40: zhes pa ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02TD2627E:289a-41: ma rig 'joms pa'i tshangs pa ste //
T02TD2627E:289b-0: 'dod chags zhe sdang srid mthar @289b mdzad //
T02TD2627E:289b-1: ces pa nyon mongs pa gsum spong ba'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:289b-2: sgyu ma khyab 'jug rdo rje can //
T02TD2627E:289b-4: zhes pa ma h'a de ba dang khyab 'jug dang brgya byin chung ma dang bcas par snang ba'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:289b-5: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che //
T02TD2627E:289b-6: zhes pa kun rig la sogs pa 'dod chags kyis 'dul ba la sogs pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:289b-7: srid dang srid min rnam sbyong ba //
T02TD2627E:289b-8: zhes mos pa rab 'bring rnam pa gsum la snang ba'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:289b-9: zhi zhing dul la dga' ba che //
T02TD2627E:289b-10: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rab rtogs pa //
T02TD2627E:289b-11: sangs rgyas bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku //
T02TD2627E:289b-12: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsdus pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:289b-13: rdo rje rab skyes rdo rje sems //
T02TD2627E:289b-14: kun du bzang po cher bzang ba //
T02TD2627E:289b-15: zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa' dang kun du bzang po'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:289b-16: mtshan rnams dam pas rnam brgyan pa //
T02TD2627E:289b-17: zhes pa ni mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i sgro nas so //
T02TD2627E:289b-18: khams gsum bdag nyid khyab pa po //
T02TD2627E:289b-19: zhes pa khams gsum du snang ba'i tshul gyis so //
T02TD2627E:289b-20: thams cad rdo rje bdag nyid gtsang //
T02TD2627E:289b-21: zhes pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2627E:289b-22: rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid snang ba'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2627E:289b-23: de ltar bstod pa bstan nas phan yon ni gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston te skyes pa dang bud med gang gis so //
T02TD2627E:289b-24: 'di bris zhes bya ba ni ras la sogs pa la bris pa'o //
T02TD2627E:289b-25: klog 'gyur tam zhes pa klog pa dang kha don byed pa'o //
T02TD2627E:289b-26: rtag tu de dag 'chang byed dam //
T02TD2627E:289b-27: zhes pa ni bsam pa dang sgom pa'i tshul gyis so //
T02TD2627E:289b-28: dran nas nyan par byed kyang rung //
T02TD2627E:289b-29: zhes pa ni dran pa sngon du 'gro bas nyan pa'o //
T02TD2627E:289b-30: kyang zhes bya ba ni rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la 'dogs pa dang /
T02TD2627E:289b-31: mchod pa la sogs pa yang bsdu ste de lta bu dag kyang ngo //
T02TD2627E:289b-32: dgos pa ni ci zhig yod ce na /
T02TD2627E:290a-0: zhes gsungs te rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas dga' ba dang rjes su yi rang ba @290a * //
T02TD2627E:290a-2: de yang gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo zhing rjes su yi rang ste /
T02TD2627E:290a-3: sprul pa'i tshogs lus la bsdus la sprul pa bya ba nas ci bder gnas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:290a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba ni sh'akya thub pa dang /
T02TD2627E:290a-5: des byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02TD2627E:290a-6: rdo rje 'dzin pa khro bo rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2627E:290a-7: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes pa ni rtsa ba'i rgyud dang /
T02TD2627E:290a-10: brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i 'khor rnams dang /
T02TD2627E:290a-11: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri za dang gnod sbyin dang srin po la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni ming zhes bya ba yang shas che ba ste /
T02TD2627E:290a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang ngo zhes bya ba 'bras bu thob pas mngon par dga' ste /
T02TD2627E:290a-14: rgyud sprul pas bshad pa la rjes su yi rang ba'o //
T02TD2627E:290a-15: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa zhes bya ba sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
T02TD2627E:290a-16: phyogs gcig pa zhes bya ba de kho na nyid bsdus pa dang /
T02TD2627E:290a-18: rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa las le'u 'di phyogs gcig tu byas sheng dum bur bkol ba las 'dir 'dus par bstan zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / ngan song rnam par sbyong byed pa'i //
T02TD2627E:290a-19: gzi brjid rgyal po snang brtsams pas //
T02TD2627E:290a-20: dge ba bdag gis ci bsags pa //
T02TD2627E:290a-21: 'gro kun ngan song rnams sbyangs te //
T02TD2627E:290a-22: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid gyur cig / ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po brtag pa snang ba'i rkyan zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
T02TD2627E:290a-24: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su bidya ka ra barma dang /
T02TD2627E:290a-25: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong dbang phyug rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
